"Installation Information" for a User Product means any methods, procedures, authorization keys, or other information required to install and execute modified versions of a covered work in that User Product from a modified version of its Corresponding Source.

"Installation Information" for a User Product means any methods, procedures, authorization keys, or other information required to install and execute modified versions of a covered work in that User Product from a modified version of its Corresponding Source.

"Knowingly relying" means you have actual knowledge that, but for the patent license, your conveying the covered work in a country, or your recipient's use of the covered work in a country, would infringe one or more identifiable patents in that country that you have reason to believe are valid.

"Knowingly relying" means you have actual knowledge that, but for the patent license, your conveying the covered work in a country, or your recipient's use of the covered work in a country, would infringe one or more identifiable patents in that country that you have reason to believe are valid.
"Levelling" the formatting means applying the format of the first character in a selection of text (such as a whole paragraph) to all subsequent characters.
"Nivellar" le formato significa applicar le formato del prime character in un selection de texto (assi como un integre paragrapho) a omne characteres subsequente.
"Licensees" and "recipients" may be individuals or organizations.
"Licensees" and "recipients" may be individuals or organizations.

' levelformat macro<br3/>

'*' matches zero or more characters ('run*' matches 'run', 'runs', and'running', etc.) '?' matches exactly one character ('run?' matches 'runs' and 'rung', but not 'run' or 'running').
'*' concorda zero o plus de characteres ('run*' concorda 'run', 'runs', 'running', et cetera.) '?' concorda exactemente un character ('run?' concorda 'runs' e 'rung', ma non 'run' o 'running').
'*' matches zero or more characters, from the current position in a given word to its end.
'*' concorda zero o plus characteres, ab le position actual in un date parola al su fin.
'?' matches any single character.
'?' equala omne singule character.
'{0}' menu selected
'{0}' menu seligite
( <l0>OmegaT</l0> and <l1>OmegaT SL Localization </l1>in the example used here)
( <l0>OmegaT</l0> e <l1>Localisation OmegaT SL</l1>in le exemplo utilisate ci)
(#N is a digit from 1 to 5) - Selects the Nth fuzzy match displayed in the match viewer to replace or insert it to the segment.
(#N es un cifra de 1 a 5) - Selige le concordantia partial #N monstrate in le quadro del concordantia pro reimplaciar o inserer lo al segmento.
(+{0}more)
(+{0}plus)

(Additional permissions may be written to require their own removal in certain cases when you modify the work.) You may place additional permissions on material, added by you to a covered work, for which you have or can give appropriate copyright permission.

(Do not confuse this folder with the "dictionary" folder in OmegaT projects.) Then select the URL (website address) of an online repository from which to download the dictionary or dictionaries, and paste this URL into the "URL of online dictionaries" field.

(Non confunder iste plica con le plica "dictionary" in le projectos de OmegaT.) Deinde selige le URL (adresse de un sito web) de un repositorio in Internet ex le qual discargar le dictionarios, e colla iste URL in le campo "URL de dictionarios in Internet".
(Download from the links provided; Linux users may prefer to install from their distribution's repositories, where this is possible)
(Discargar ex le ligamines fornite; le usatores de Linux pote preferer de installar lo ex lor repositorios de distribution, ubi isto es possibile.)
(For more detailed instructions, refer to your instruction manual or click <a0>here</a0> or <a1>here</a1>.)
(Pro altere detaliate instructiones, refere a tu de instruction manual o clicca <a0>ci</a0> o <a1>ci</a1>.)
(If Options > View > "Include the first non-unique segment when marking non-unique segments" is selected, all non-unique segments including the first are marked in this way.)

(Si Optiones > Preferentias > Vista > "Includer le prime segmento non unic quando es marcate le segmentos non unic" es seligite, omne segmentos non unic includente le primo es marcate in iste maniera).
(If you have translated into a language which is not your operating system language, see below, "How OmegaT handles localized versions".)
(Si tu ha rendite in un lingua que non es le lingua del systema operative, vide sub, "Como OmegaT tracta le versiones localisate".)
(If you think you have significantly contributed to the OmegaT Project but you (don't see your name on the lists, feel free to contact us.)
(si tu pensa que tu ha significativemente contribuite al projecto OmegaT ma tu non vide tu nomine in le listas, senti te libere de nos continger.)
(If you think you have significantly contributed to the OmegaT Project but you don't see your name on the lists, feel free to contact us.)
(Si tu pensa que tu ha significativemente contribuite al projecto OmegaT ma tu non vide tu nomine in le listas, senti te libere de nos continger.)
(If you wish to launch OmegaT with a user interface language other than English, make the same change in the relevant localized Bundle.properties file.)
(Si tu vole lancear OmegaT con un lingua de interfacie del usator altere que le anglese, face le identic cambio in le apposite file localisate Bundle.properties file.)
(In English)
(In anglese)
(In Italian)
(In italiano)
(In Russian)
(In russo)

(In the user's manual, see 'Files to translate' > 'File formats' for a list of supported file formats.) To add files to the project, click on the Copy Files to Source Folder... button in the Project Files window or call this action from the Project menu and select the source files you want to copy.

(In le manual del usator, vide 'Files a render' > 'Formatos del file' pro un lista del formatos de file supportate.) Pro adder files al projecto, clicca sur le button "Copia files fonte..." in le fenestra "Files del projecto" o commanda iste action per le menu "Projecto" e selige le files fonte que tu vole copiar.
(Infix is also reported to work on WINE.)
(il es alsi reportate que Infix opera sur WINE.)
(It will, of course, check for Bolivian rather than Mexican Spanish!)
(Illo, naturalmente, controlara pro le boliviano plus tosto que pro le espaniol mexicano!)
(Leave the Password empty if you are using an API Key.)
(Lassa le contrasigno vacue si tu usa un clave API.)
(Not to be confused with the "Text Export" feature, which also enables scripts to be used with OmegaT, but on a more basic level.)
(non esser confuse con le characteristica de "Text Export", que alsi habilita le scripts a esser usate con OmegaT, ma sur un nivello plus basic.)
(Note to Ubuntu users: the font implementation of the default tcl/tk installation in Ubuntu at the present time (version 9.10) is appalling, but can be rectified.)
(Nota pro le usatores de Ubuntu: le implementation del typo de character del installation base de tcl/tk in Ubuntu al presente tempore (version 9.10) es horrific, ma pote esser rectificate.)
(Note: these are the English files.
(Nota: istos es files in lingua anglese.

(OmegaT is far from unique in this respect: many other CAT tools convert source files to a different format, in some cases in the background without the translator being aware of the fact, before they are translated.)

(OmegaT es ben altere que unic in iste respecto: multe altere applicationes CAT converte le files origine in un formato differente, in alicun casos per labor de fundo, sin que le traductor es al currente del facto, ante que illo sia rendite.)
(Other methods of closing Priorview will not delete the temporary files.)
(Altere methodos de clauder Priorview non delera le files temporari.)
(Record as described above, but only recording the command Ctrl+C followed by Ctrl+V.) You can then highlight text between the points at which formatting changes.
(Registra como describite precedentemente, ma registrante sol le commando Ctrl+C sequite per Ctrl+V.) Tu pote dunque marcar le texto inter le punctos ubi cambia le formato.
(Refer to the "Downloads" page on the OmegaT website for details of the differences.)
(refere al pagina "Discargas" sur le sito web de OmegaT pro detalios del differentias.)
(See screenshot: only the first three segments have been translated.)
(Vide imagine del schermo: so le prime tres segmentos esseva rendite.)
(Since this is now the standard format, it is simply described as Word, Excel or Powerpoint in MS Office 2007).
(Pois que isto es ora le formato standard, illo es simplemente describite como Word, Excel o Powerpoint in MS Office 2007).
(Software that does this is called "machine translation", and you will have to look elsewhere for it.)
(Le software que face isto es nominate "traductor automatic", pro illo tu debera querer alibi.)
(The Java executable file is the file java on Linux and java.exe on Windows.
(Le file executabile Java es le file java sur Linux e java.exe sur Windows.
(The definition of unique is case-sensitive: "Run" and "run" are treated as being different)
(Le definition de unic is sensibile al majusculas e minusculas: "Run" e "run" es tractate como si es differente)
(The greater ease of tag handling with .docx files comes at the cost of a slight loss in control over formatting.
(Le major facilitate de tractar le tag con le files .docx veni a costo de un leve perdita in controlo re le formato.

(The tokenizer can be used with versions 2.0.x and 2.1.0, but this requires both a different version of the tokenizer, and a different installation procedure.) Users are advised to upgrade to the latest beta version of OmegaT.

(Le tokenizer pote esser usate con le versiones 2.0.x e 2.1.0, ma isto necessita ambe un differente version del tokenizer, e un differente procedura de installation.) Le usatores es consiliate de promover al ultime version beta de OmegaT.
(This incidentally is a limitation of Java, not of OmegaT itself.)
(Isto incidentalmente es un limitation de Java, non de OmegaT ipse.)
(This is not the case for the website localization files.)
(Isto non es le caso pro le files de localisation del sito web.)

- (X)HTML (*.html, *.xhtml,*.xht)

<e0>Preservar spatios pro tote le tags</e0>: si marcate, le "spatio blanc" (i.e. spatios e nove-lineas) sera preservate, mesmo si iste option non es definite in le documento.
<e0>Preserve spaces for all tags</e0>: if checked, "white space" (i.e., spaces and newlines) will be preserved, even if not set technically in the document
<e0>Retene spatios pro tote le tags</e0>: si marcate, le "spatio blanc" (id es, spatios e nove lineas) essera conservate, etiam si non imponite technicamente in le documento

<e0>Project properties</e0>, <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2> Files and Folders:</e1> a project in the context of OmegaT is the piece of work that OmegaT as a CAT tool is able to handle.
<e0>Proprietates del projecto </e0>, <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2> Files e Plicas:</e1> un 'projecto', in le contexto de OmegaT, es le parte del obra que OmegaT tracta qual application CAT.
<e0>Remove HTML comments in translated document</e0>: all commented parts (between <!-- and -->) won't be copied in the translated document.
<e0>Remover le commentos HTML in le documento traducite</e0>: tote le partes commentate (inter <!-- e -->) non essera copiate in le documento traducite.
<e0>Remove HTML comments in translated document</e0>: commented parts (between <!-- and -->) will not be copied into the translated document.
<e0>Remover commentos HTML in documento traducite</e0>: le partes commentate (inter <!-- e -->) non sera copiate in le documento traducite.
<e0>Replace All:</e0> operates replacement of all occurrences (after displaying a confirmation window where the number of occurrences is shown).
<e0>Reimplaciar toto:</e0> opera le replaciamento de tote le occurrentias (post los haber displicate un fenestra de confirmation ubi es monstrate le numero de occurrentias).
<e0>Replace:</e0> operates a "one by one" replacement, by the mean of buttons in the <e1>header of the Editor pane</e1>.
<e0>Reimplaciar:</e0> opera un replaciamento "uno a uno", per le buttones al <e1>testa del quadro Modificar</e1>.
<e0>Sample text:</e0> field for immediate preview of the selected font
<e0>Texto monstra:</e0> campo pro vista preliminar immediate del typo de character seligite
<e0>Search in Files: </e0>search in a single file or a folder containing a set of files.
<e0>Recerca in le files: </e0>recerca in un file singule o in un plica continente un collection de files.
<e0>Search in Project</e0>: check <e1>Memory</e1> to include the project memory (project_save.tmx file) in the search.
<e0>Cercar in le projecto</e0>: marcar <e1>Memoria</e1> pro includer le memoria de traduction del projecto (le file project_save.tmx) in le recerca.
<e0>Searches</e0> and<e1> </e1><e2>Regular expressions</e2>: Searches in OmegaT can be as simple as "<e3>list segments with </e3><e4>the word 'kangaroo' ".
<e0>Recercas</e0> e<e1> </e1><e2>Expressiones regular</e2>: le recercas in OmegaT pote esser simple como "<e3>lista le segmentos con </e3><e4>le parola 'kangaroo' ".
<e0>Segmentation</e0>:translation memory tools work with textual units called segments.
<e0>Segmentation</e0>: le applicationes pro memoria de traduction functiona con elementos textual nominate segmentos.
<e0>Shortcuts customization:</e0> shortcuts can be customized to your personal preferences
<e0>Personalisation del Vias breve:</e0> le vias breve del claviero pote esser personalisate pro adaptar las al proprie preferentias personal
<e0>Size:</e0> edit to change font size
<e0>Mesura:</e0> rediger pro cambiar le mesura del typo de character
<e0>Skip text matching regular expression</e0>: any text matching the regular expression is skipped.
<e0>Saltar texto concordante expression regular</e0>: ulle texto concordante le expression regular es saltate.
<e0>Skip text matching regular expression</e0>: the text matching the regular expression gets skipped.
<e0>Salta le texto que concorda le expression regular</e0>: le texto que concorda le expression regular es saltate.
<e0>Space matches nbsp</e0>: when this option is checked, a space character put in search entry can match either a normal space character or a non-breacking space (\u00A) character.

<e0>Concordantias del spatio nbsp</e0>: quando es marcate iste option, un character spatio del fila de recerca concorda sia un normal character de spatio que un character (\u00A) de spatio ininterrumpibile.

<e0>Recerca del terminologia TaaS</e0>: quando controlate, permittera querer a TaaS datos sur le base de segmento per segmento.
<e0>Terminology management</e0>: Terminology management is important for translation consistency.
<e0>Le gestion del terminologia</e0>: le gestion del terminologia es importante pro le consistentia del traduction.

<e0>The user interface</e0>,<e1>Main Menu and Keyboard Shortcuts</e1>: these two chapters are likely to be heavily consulted, since they explain the user interface of OmegaT and the functions available via the main menu and the keyboard shortcuts.

<e0>Le interfacie del usator</e0>,<e1>Menu Principal e Vias Breve del claviero</e1>: iste duos capitulos debe probabilemente esser pesantemente consultate, pois que illos explica le interfacie del usator de OmegaT e le functiones del menu principal e per le Vias Breve del claviero.
<e0>Translate the following attributes</e0>: the selected attributes will appear as segments in the Editor window.
<e0>Rende le attributos sequente</e0>: le attributos seligite apparera como segmentos in le Fenestra de Modifica.
<e0>Translated or untranslated: </e0>search in both translated and untranslated segments.
<e0>Rendite o non rendite: </e0>recerca in ambe le segmentos rendite e non rendite.
<e0>Translated: </e0>search only in translated segments.
<e0>Rendite: </e0>recerca sol in le segmentos rendite.
<e0>Translation memories: </e0> explains the role of the various subfolders containing translation memories, and provides information on other important aspects relating to translation memories.
<e0>Memorias de traduction: </e0> explica le rolo del varie sub-plicas continente memorias de traduction, e provide information re altere importante aspectos relative al memorias de traduction.
<e0>Translation memory:</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1> stores your translations in a translation memory file.
<e0>Memoria de traduction</e0> - <a1> OmegaT </a1>archiva tu traductiones in un file typo memoria de traduction.
<e0>Translation process:</e0> Imagine having to translate something; from a single file to a folder containing subfolders each with a number of files in a variety of formats.
<e0>Processo de traduction:</e0> Figura te de deber traducer alique, a partir de un sol file usque a un plica continente sub-plicas, cata plica con plure files in plure formatos.
<e0>Untranslated: </e0>search only in untranslated segments.
<e0>Non rendite: </e0>recerca sol in le segmentos non rendite.
<e0>VCS client: </e0>To interface with the server an SVN or Git client must be installed on computers of "project managers" involved in the OmegaT project.
<e0>Le cliente VCS: </e0>Pro tu interfacie con le servitor debe esser installate un cliente de SVN o de Git sur le computatores del "administratores del projecto" implicate in le projecto OmegaT.
<e0>VCS server - </e0>i.e. SVN or Git server is the environment where the common material is kept and maintained on the net.
<e0>Le servitor de VCS - </e0>id es le servitor de SVN o de GIT, es le ambiente ubi le material commun es conservate e mantenite sur le rete.
<e0>Warning!</e0> Should you change filter options whilst a project is open, you must reload the project in order for the changes to take effect.
<e0>Advertimento!</e0> si tu cambia le optiones del filtro con un projecto aperte, postea tu debe recargar le projecto pro que le cambios sume effecto.
<e0>Warning: </e0>because the text will segment differently after filter options have been changed, so you may have to start translating from scratch.
<e0>Advertimento: </e0>viste que le texto essera segmentate differentemente postquam le optiones del filtro esseva cambiate, ergo tu pote deber initiar a render de zero.
<e0>Word:</e0> non-visible instruction text, comments, footnotes, endnotes, footers
<e0>Word:</e0> texto de instruction non-visibile, commentos, notas a pede de pagina, notas final, pedes de pagina

<e0>add the copied files to the local version of the repository:</e0> right-click on the local checkout folder and select <g1>TortoiseSVN > Add.</g1> In the dialog that opens, leave all options as per default and click<g2> OK</g2>.

<e0>adde le files copiate al version local del repositorio:</e0> clicca con le dextero sur le plica checkout local e selige <g1>TortoiseSVN > Add.</g1> In le fenestra de dialogo que se displica, lassa omne optiones como jam predisponite e clicca<g2> OK</g2>.
<e0>administrator: </e0>the person responsible for the creation and maintaining of the repository, i.e. taking care of the server side of the task.
<e0>administrator: </e0>le persona responsabile del creation e del mantenimento del repositorio, id es le cura del labor del latere del servitor.
<e0>case sensitive</e0>: the search will be performed for the exact string specified; i.e. capitalization is observed.
<e0>sensitive al majusculas e minusculas</e0>: le recerca essera effectuate pro le exacte linea de characteres specificate; id es es observate le capitalisation.
<e0>checkout:</e0> the operation that creates a working copy from the repository to your local computer.
<e0>checkout:</e0> le operation que crea un copia functionante ex le repositorio, in tu computator local.
<e0>commit local changes to the server: </e0>right-click on the local checkout folder and select <g1>SVN Commit....</g1> The Commit window - see below opens.
<e0>committer le cambios local al server: </e0>clicca con le dextero sur le plica del checkout local e selige <g1>SVN Commit....</g1> Le fenestra de Commit - se displica, vide in sequito.
<e0>commit: </e0>once a new local version of the checked-out material is ready, it can be committed to the repository and thus made available to the rest of the team.
<e0>commit: </e0>un vice que un nove version local del material discargate es preste, on pote lo consignar al repositorio e assi lo render disponibile al resto del equipa
<e0>in comments: </e0>search in comments to segments
<e0>in le commentos: </e0>cerca in le commentos del segmentos
<e0>in notes: </e0>search in notes to segments
<e0>in le notas: </e0>cerca in le notas del segmentos
<e0>in source: </e0>search in the source segments
<e0>in le fonte: </e0>cerca in le segmentos fonte
<e0>in translations: </e0>search in the target segments
<e0>in le traductiones: </e0>cerca in le segmentos final
<e0>repository: </e0>the place where the shared material is saved and maintained, either on a local access network or in Internet.
<e0>repositorio: </e0>le loco ubi le material in commun es salvate e mantenite, sia sur un rete a accesso local sia in Internet.
<e0>several projects on the same subject: </e0>keep the project structure, and change source and target folders (Source = source/order1, target = target/order1 etc).
<e0>plure projectos sur le mesme subjecto: </e0>retene le structura del projecto, e cambia plicas fonte e destination (Fonte = source/order1, destination = target/order1 etc).
<e0>several translators working on the same project:</e0> split the source files into source/Alice, source/Bob... and allocate them to team members (Alice, Bob ...).
<e0>plure traductores laborante sur le mesme projecto:</e0> finde le files fonte in source/Alice, source/Bob... e ubica los a membros del equipa (Alice, Bob ...).
<e0>update local files from the local repository copy</e0> - the changes received from the server repository reside within the .svn subfolder but not yet in the files and folders themselves.
<e0>actualisa le files local ex le copia local del repositorio</e0> - le cambios recipite del repositorio del servitor resta intra le sub plica .svn ma non ancora in le files e plicas ipse.
<e0>user</e0>: a member of the team, collaborating on the common project.
<e0>usator</e0>: un membro del equipa, que collabora sur le projecto commun.

<g0>Add or rewrite encoding declaration in HTML and XHTML files</g0>: the target files often need to have a different character set encoding from the one in the source file (whether it is explicitly defined or implied).

<e0>Adder o rescriber declaration de codification in files HTML e XHTML</e0>: le files de destination sovente debe haber un codification del collection de characteres differente de illos in le file fonte (si il es explicitemente definite o implicite).
<g0>Aggregate tags</g0>: if checked, tags with no translatable text between them will be aggregated into a single tag.
<g0>Aggregar tags</g0>: si marcate, le tags con nulle texto traducibile inter illos sera aggregate in un singule tag.
<g0>Allow blank translations in the target file</g0>:
<g0>Permitte le traductiones blanc in le file de destination</g0>:
<g0>Close</g0>: close the window without any change.
<g0>Clauder</g0>: claude le fenestra sin cambiamentos.
<g0>Compress whitespace in translated document</g0>: multiple continuous whitespace characters will be converted into one single whitespace in the translated document.
<g0>Comprimer spatios blanc in documento traducite</g0>: plure characteres spatio blanc continue sera convertite in un singule spatio blanc in le documento traducite.
<g0>Ctrl+Shift+V</g0>: Checks for missing or displaced tags in formatted files.
<g0>Ctrl+Shift+V</g0>: controla pro tags mancante o displaciate in le files formattate.
<g0>Display: all matching segments</g0>: if checked, all the segments are displayed one by one, even if they are present several times in the same document or in different documents.
<g0>Monstrar: tote le segmentos concordante</g0>: si marcate, tote le segmentos es monstrate uno per uno, etsi si illos es presente plure vices in le mesme documento o in documentos differente.
<g0>Display: file names</g0>: if checked, the name of the file where each segment is found is displayed above each result.
<g0>Monstrar: le nomines de file</g0>: si marcate, le nomine de file ubi cata segmento es trovate, es monstrate ante cata resultato.
<g0>Do not translate the content attribute of meta-tags ...:</g0> The meta-tags in the box will not be translated.
<g0>Non traducer le attributo de contento del meta-tags ...:</g0> le meta-tags in le cassa non sera traducite.
<g0>Do not translate the content attribute of meta-tags ...</g0>: the meta-tags in the box will not be translated.
<g0>Non traducer le attributo de contento del meta-tags ...:</g0> le meta-tags in le cassa non sera traducite.

tu.note: Proque "essera" in iste segmento, ma "sera" in le previe segmento? Il deberea esser consistentia in le uso de terminos, nonne?

tuv.seg: <g0>Do not translate the content of tags with the following attribute key-value pairs (separate with commas)</g0>: if a tag matches the list of key-value pairs, its content will be ignored.

<g0>Non traducer le contento de tags con le sequente pares de valores clave de attributo (separar con virgulas)</g0>: si un etiquetta concorda le lista del pares de valores clave, su contento essera ignorate.
<g0>Ignore file context when identifying segments with alternate translations</g0>: by default, OmegaT uses the source file name as part of the identification of an alternative translation.

<g0>Ignora le contexto del file pro identificar le segmentos con traductiones alternative</g0>: per option predefinite, OmegaT usa le nomine del file fonte qual parte del identification de un traduction alternative.
<g0>LanguageTool Issues</g0> (optional).
<g0>Problemas de LanguageTool</g0> (optional).
<g0>Preserve spaces for all tags</g0>: check this option if the source documents contain significant spaces used to control the layout that must not be ignored.
<g0>Preservar spatios pro tote le etiquettas</g0>: marcar iste option si le documentos primari contine grande spatios usate pro controlar le arrangiamento que non debe esser ignorate.
<g0>Preserve spaces for all tags</g0>: if checked, "white space" (i.e. spaces and newlines) will be preserved, even if this option is not defined in the document.
<g0>Preservar spatios pro tote le tags</g0>: si marcate, le "spatio blanc" (i.e. spatios e nove-lineas) sera preservate, mesmo si iste option non es definite in le documento.
<g0>Project</g0> <g1>New...</g1>
<g0>Projecto</g0> <g1>Nove...</g1>
<g0>Remove HTML comments in translated document</g0>: commented parts (between <!-- and -->) will not be copied into the translated document.
<g0>Remover commentos HTML in documento traducite</g0>: le partes commentate (inter <!-- e -->) non sera copiate in le documento traducite.
<g0>Remove leading and trailing tags</g0>: uncheck this option to display all the tags, including tags at the beginning and end of the segment.
<g0>Remover etiquettas initial e final</g0>: dismarca iste option pro monstrar tote le etiquettas, includente etiquettas al initio e fin del segmento.
<g0>Remove leading and trailing whitespace in non-segmented projects</g0>: by default, OmegaT removes leading and trailing whitespace.
<g0>Remove le spatios blanc initial e final in le projectos non-segmentate</g0>: per option predefinite, OmegaT remove le spatios blanc initial e final.
<g0>Replace All</g0>: operates replacement of all occurrences (after displaying a confirmation window where the number of occurrences is shown).
Reimplaciar toto: opera le replaciamento de tote le occurrentias (post los haber displicate un fenestra de confirmation ubi es monstrate le numero de occurrentias).
<g0>Replace:</g0> operates a "one by one" replacement, by the mean of buttons in the header of the Editor pane.
<g0>Reimplaciar:</g0> opera un replaciamento "uno a uno", per le buttones al testa del quadro Modificar.
<g0>Search in Files</g0>: search in a single file or a folder containing a set of files.
<g0>Recerca in le files</g0>: recerca in un file singule o in un plica continente un collection de files.
<g0>Search in Project</g0>: check <g1>Memory</g1> to include the project memory (<f2>project_save.tmx</f2> file) in the search.
<g0>Cercar in le projecto</g0>: marcar <g1>Memoria</g1> pro includer le memoria de traduction del projecto (le file <f2>project_save.tmx</f2>) in le recerca.
<g0>Skip text matching regular expression</g0>: any text matching the regular expression is skipped.
<g0>Saltar texto concordante expression regular</g0>: ulle texto concordante le expression regular es saltate.

tu.note: "....can match either a normal space...." "....concorda sia un normal character de spatio...." Esque illo es correcte?

tuv.seg: <g0>Space matches nbsp</g0>: when this option is checked, a space character put in search entry can match either a normal space character or a non-breacking space (\u00A) character.

<g0>Concordantias del spatio nbsp</g0>: quando es marcate iste option, un character spatio del fila de recerca concorda sia un normal character de spatio que un character (\u00A) de spatio ininterrumpibile.
<g0>Spelling Issues</g0> (optional).
<g0>Problemas de orthographia</g0> (optional).

Start a new paragraph on: the
HTML tag will constitute a paragraph break for segmentation purposes.

Initiar un nove paragrapho sur: le tag HTML
constituera un interruption de paragrapho pro propositos de segmentation.
<g0>Terminology Issues</g0> (optional).
<g0>Problemas de terminologia</g0> (optional).
<g0>Translate the following attributes</g0>: the selected attributes will appear as segments in the Editor window.
<e0>Rende le attributos sequente</e0>: le attributos seligite apparera como segmentos in le Fenestra de Modifica.
<g0>Translated or untranslated</g0>: search in both translated and untranslated segments.
<g0>Rendite o non rendite</g0>: recerca in ambe le segmentos rendite e non rendite.
<g0>Translated</g0>: search only in translated segments.
<g0>Rendite</g0>: recerca sol in le segmentos rendite.
<g0>Untranslated</g0>: search only in untranslated segments.
<g0>Non rendite</g0>: recerca sol in le segmentos non rendite.
<g0>case sensitive</g0>: the search will be performed for the exact string specified; i.e. capitalization is observed.
<g0>sensitive al majusculas e minusculas</g0>: le recerca essera effectuate pro le exacte linea de characteres specificate; id es es observate le capitalisation.
<g0>in comments</g0>: search in comments to segments
<g0>in le commentos</g0>: cerca in le commentos del segmentos
<g0>in notes</g0>: search in notes to segments
<g0>in le notas</g0>: cerca in le notas del segmentos
<g0>in source</g0>: search in the source segments
<g0>in le fonte</g0>: cerca in le segmentos fonte
<g0>in translations</g0>: search in the target segments
<g0>in le traductiones</g0>: cerca in le segmentos final

<l0>.utf8</l0> files are interpreted by <a1>OmegaT</a1> as being encoded in UTF-8 (an encoding that covers almost all languages in the world).

<r0>Note:</r0> On an Apple Mac, use the <k1>Command</k1> key instead of the <k2>Control</k2> key.

<r0>Note:</r0> it is possible to inhibit the window displaying at opening, by setting <e1>project_files_show_on_load</e1> to <e2>false</e2> in <f3>omegat.prefs</f3> file (accessible by <m4> <g5>Options</g5> <g6>Access Configuration Folder</g6> </m4> menu).

<r0>Nota:</r0> il es possibile inhibir le fenestra monstrate al apertura, definiente le parametro <e1>project_files_show_on_load</e1> a <e2>false</e2> in le file <f3>omegat.prefs</f3> (accessibile per menu <m4> <g5>Optiones</g5> <g6>Acceder al plica del configuration</g6> </m4>).

<r0>Note:</r0> it is possible to inhibit this Project Files window displaying, by setting <e1>project_files_show_on_load</e1> to <e2>false</e2> in <f3>omegat.prefs</f3> file (accessible by Options / Access Configuration Folder menu).

<r0>Nota:</r0> Il es possibile inhibir de monstrar ce fenestra Files del projecto, per le fixation de <e1>project_files_show_on_load</e1> a <e2>false</e2> in le file <f3>omegat.prefs</f3> (accessibile per le menu Optiones / Acceder le plica de configuration).

<s0>Linux users</s0>: most Linux distributions are supplied with a Java Runtime Environment, but some open-source implementations do not work properly with OmegaT (although this may not be immediately apparent).

<s0>Usatores de Linux</s0>: le major parte del distributiones de Linux es supplite con JRE, ma ulle installationes open-source non functiona debitemente con OmegaT (ben que isto pote non parer subito).
<s0>Linux versions/systems</s0>: locate your OmegaT launch script file (OmegaT or OmegaT.sh).
<s0>Versiones/systemas Linux</s0>: loca tu file script de lanceamento de OmegaT (OmegaT o OmegaT.sh).
<s0>Mac OS X users</s0>: the JRE is installed on Mac OS X by default; there is therefore no version for Mac OS X with the JRE.
<s0>Usatores de Mac OS X</s0>: JRE es ja installate normalmente sur Mac OS X; in consequentia non ha ulle version con JRE pro iste systema operative.
<s0>OmegaT version 2.1.0 and older</s0>: the current tokenizer is not compatible with these versions.
<s0>OmegaT version 2.1.0 e precedente</s0>: le actual tokenizer non es compatibile con iste versiones.
<s0>OmegaT</s0> is a free translation memory application that works on Windows, macOS, Linux...
<s0>OmegaT</s0> es un gratuite application de memoria de traduction que functiona sur Windows, macOS, Ubuntu, Linux Mint...
<s0>OmegaT</s0> is a free translation memory application written in Java.
<s0>OmegaT</s0> es un programma gratuite pro memoria de traduction, scribite in Java.
<s0>OmegaT</s0> is available in many different versions in order to suit a range of user requirements.
<s0>OmegaT</s0> es disponibile in multe distincte versiones pro convenir a numerose requisitos del usatores.
<s0>Platform-neutral version (on Windows)</s0>: locate your OmegaT launch script file (OmegaT.bat).
<s0>Le version Platteforma neutre (sur Windows)</s0>: loca tu file script de lanceamento de OmegaT (OmegaT.bat).
<s0>Webstart version of OmegaT</s0>: the tokenizer is not compatible with the Webstart version of OmegaT.
<s0>Version Webstart de OmegaT</s0>: le tokenizer non es compatibile con le version Webstart de OmegaT.
<s0>Windows versions of OmegaT</s0>: in order for OmegaT (any version) to be used with the tokenizer, it must be launched from a launch script file.
<s0>Versiones Windows de OmegaT</s0>: pro usar OmegaT (omne version) con le tokenizer, illo debe esser lanceate ab un file script de lanceamento.

<s1>In order to prevent two or more translators from working on the same language at the same time, it is therefore very important that you make an entry in the localization plan when you begin work on a translation.</s1>

<s1>Al fin de evitar que duo o plus traductores labora al mesme tempore sur le mesme lingua, es ergo assatis importante se signar in le plan de localisation quando on initia a laborar sur un traduction.</s1>
<s1>The benefit</s1>: once launched, future updates of the Web Start version will be installed automatically on your computer.<br2/>
Le beneficio: un vice lanceate le version Web Start, su futur actualisationes essera installate automaticamente sur tu computator.<br1/>
<s3>The drawback</s3>: at present, this version cannot be used in conjunction with plug-ins, so not all functions are available.
<s3>Le disavantage</s3>: actualmente iste version non pote ser usate con le plugins, assi non tote le functiones es disponibile.
<shortcut> must be of the following form: 0 or more <c0><modifier></c0> followed by 0 or 1 <c1><event></c1> followed by 1 <c2><key></c2>, where:

<u0>Apertium</u0> is a free/open-source machine translation platform, initially aimed at related-language pairs, like CA, ES, GA, PT, OC and FR but recently expanded to deal with more divergent language pairs (such as English-Catalan).

<u0>Apertium</u0> es un platteforma de traductor automatic gratuite, open source, finalisate initialmente a pares de linguas relative, como CA, ES, GA, PT, OC e FR ma in le ultime tempore expandite pro tractar con plus pares de linguas divergente (assi como anglese-catalano).
<u0>Belazar</u0> is a Machine language translation tool for the Russian-Belarusian language pair.
<u0>Belazar</u0> es un application pro le traduction automatic pro le par del lingua russo-bielorusso.

<u0>LanguageTool</u0> is an Open Source style and grammar proofreading software for English, French, German, Polish, Dutch, Romanian, and a number of other languages - see the <u1>list of supported languages</u1>.

<u0>LanguageTool</u0> es un software open source, corrector de stilo e grammatica pro anglese, francese, germano, polaco, nederlandese, romaniano, e plure altere linguas - vide le <u1>lista del linguas supportate</u1>.
<u0>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> <i1/> can be downloaded in nearly 100 languages and can serve as a cornerstone IT glossary.
On pote discargar le <u0>Collection de terminologia Microsoft</u0> <i1/> in quasi 100 linguas e pote servir como glossario, petra angular del technologia informatic (IT).
<u0>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> can be downloaded in nearly 100 languages and can serve as a cornerstone IT glossary.
On pote discargar le <u0>Collection de terminologia Microsoft</u0> <i1/> in quasi 100 linguas e pote servir como glossario, petra angular del technologia informatic (IT).

Si toto vade ben, Priorview deberea apparer quando lanceate como ante describite.
All being well, your translation will come out looking like the original, but translated.

Tote le collectiones (public e private) essera querite pro le linguas fonte e de destination.
All domains
Omne dominios
All glossaries must be located in the <l0/> folder.
Tote le glossarios debe esser ubicate in le <l0/> plica.
All of OmegaT's functions are available through the menu bar at the top of the Editor window.
Omne le functiones de OmegaT es disponibile per le barra del menu al summitate del fenestra del editor.
All other characters represent themselves.
Omne le altere characteres representa se ipse.
All other files are read-only.
Tote le altere files es a sol lectura.
All other files will be replaced by the files in the remote repository.
Tote le altere files sera supplantate per le files in le repositorio remote.
All other instances of the same segment that were previously the "default translation" will now be brought into line with this translation.
Omne altere occurrentias del identic segmento que esseva previemente le "traduction base" ora essera alineate con iste traduction.
All other local changes to the project are reverted.
Tote le altere cambiamentos local al projecto es revertite.
All other non-permissive additional terms are considered "further restrictions" within the meaning of section 10.
All other non-permissive additional terms are considered "further restrictions" within the meaning of section 10.
All preferences protected by the master password will be reset.
Tote le preferentias protegite per le contrasigno principal essera restabilite.
All rights granted under this License are granted for the term of copyright on the Program, and are irrevocable provided the stated conditions are met.
All rights granted under this License are granted for the term of copyright on the Program, and are irrevocable provided the stated conditions are met.
All segmentation rule sets for a matching language pattern are active and are applied in the given order of priority, so rules for specific language should be higher than default ones.

Omne le collectiones de regula de segmentation pro un modello de lingua que concorda son active e son applicate in le ordine de prioritate date, assi regulas pro lingua specific deberea esser superior in ordine de prioritate quam los base.
All terms in a segment with a match in <e0>any</e0> of the glossaries will be displayed in the <l1/> pane.
Tote le terminos que ha un concordantia in <e0>ulle</e0> del glossarios essera monstrate in le <l1/> pannello.
All the changes will be synchronised the next time a connection is available.
Tote le cambiamentos sera synchronisate le proxime vice que un connexion es disponibile.
All the contents of <f0>https://repo_for_All_OmegaT_team_project_sources</f0> are mapped to the local OmegaT project source folder, except all *.bak files but readme.bak.
Tote le contentos de <f0>https://repo_for_All_OmegaT_team_project_sources</f0> es mappate al plica source local del projecto OmegaT, excepte tote le files *.bak, salvo readme.bak.

Tote le contentos de <f0>https://repo_for_All_OmegaT_team_projects/En-US_DE_project</f0> es mappate in le projecto OmegaT local

All the tags that are marked with <c0>translate="no"</c0> will be ignored.
Tote le tags que es marcate con <c0>translate="no"</c0> essera ignorate.

Omne le files del manual del usator pote esser trovate in iste plica.

Omne le traductiones ex le documentos fonte son alsi monstrate in le quadro del Commento, in ultra al quadro del Concordantia.

Permitte al usator de crear un entrata in le file glossario base.

Allows the user select the interval - in minutes and seconds - between consecutive automatic saves of the project.

Allows you to activate/deactivate <e0>TransTips </e0>feature and set its option<e1> Exact Match.</e1> With <e2>TransTips</e2> activated a right click on a highlighted word in the source will open a pop up menu with the glossary entries for the word you clicked.

Permitte te de activar/disactivar le characteristica <e0>TransTips </e0>e fixar su option<e1> Concordantia Exacte.</e1> Con <e2>TransTips</e2> activate un clic dextre sur un parola marcate in le fonte aperira un menu con le entratas del glossario por le parola que tu ha cliccate.
Allows you to activate/deactivate the Machine Translation tools offered.
Permitte te de activar/disactivar le applicationes de Traduction Automatic offerite.
Allows you to choose different colours for each part of the User Interface.
Permitte eliger colores differente pro cata parte del Interfacie del Usator.

Quasi omne version actual de Tcl/Tk essera probabilemente commode, ma tu debe haber tote le duo Tcl (le interprete del script) e Tk (le componente graphic).

Le alternativas comprende un pacchetto .tar Linux, un installator Windows con o sin un Java Runtime Environment (JRE) , un installator Mac OS X, e un pacchetto codice fonte pro le disveloppatores.

Although it is debatable whether the results of this procedure will be comparable to re-layouting of the translation by a DTP professional, they are likely to be much better than conversion to completely different formats (such as RTF).

Ben que sia discutibile si le resultatos de iste procedura essera comparabile a re arrangiar le traduction con un DTP professional, illos essera probabilemente multo melio que le conversion a formatos completemente differente (assi como RTF).

Although it might seem strange to want to translate TMX files (the usual reason for creating a file filter), the addition of a TMX filter has the interesting effect that it enables TMX files in any location to be searched for from within any OmegaT project using the "Search Files" function, something not possible in the standard OmegaT build.

Ben que il poterea parer singular voler traducer le files TMX (le ration consuete pro crear un filtro de file), le addition de un filtro TMX ha Le interessante effecto que illo habilita le files TMX in omne location e esser cercate ab intra omne projecto OmegaT usante le function "Cerca files", alco non possibile in le compilation standard de OmegaT.
Although many users are aware of this, their reaction is often "But I can't program!".
Etiam si multe usatores es al currente de isto, lor reaction is frequentemente "Ma io non pote programmar!".

Ben que non essential, il es convenibile anque adherer al <a0>Lista postal del localisatores de OmegaT</a0> (etiam note como "OmT-l10n").

Ben que isto ha multe avantages, pote ser multo utile al traductor vider durante le traduction le ultime arrangiamento e formato.

Apertium Plugin
Le plugin Apertium

Apertium uses a shallow-transfer machine translation engine which processes the input text in stages, as in an assembly line: de-formatting, morphological analysis, part-of-speech disambiguation, shallow structural transfer, lexical transfer, morphological generation, and re-formatting.

Apertium usa un machina automatic a traduction superficial le qual processa le texto fonte in stages, como in un linea de montage: de-formattation, analyse morphologic, disambiguation del parte del discurso, traduction structural superficial, traduction lexical, generation morphologic, e re-formattation.

As elsewhere in the OmegaT project, the work of programming OmegaT is done by volunteers, and in keeping with the project philosophy, the developments and improvements they make to OmegaT are ultimately at their discretion.

Como alterubi in le projecto OmegaT, le labor de programmation de OmegaT es facite per voluntarios, e in harmonia con le philosophia del projecto, le disveloppamentos e le meliorationes que illes face a OmegaT es definitivemente a lor discretion.

As far as categories are concerned, the de facto industry standard of classifying matches into the following groups is used: Repetitions, Exact match, 95%-100%, 85%-94%, 75%-84%, 50%-74% and No match.

Re quanto concerne le categorias, es usate le standard del industria re le classification del concordantias in le gruppos sequente: Repetitiones, Concorda exacte, 95%-100%, 85%-94%, 75%-84%, 50%-74% e Nulle concordantia.

As opposed to user-generated translation memories (as in the case of <a0>OmegaT</a0>) Machine translation (MT) tools use rule-based linguistic tools to create a translation of the source segment without the need for a translation memory.

Al contrario del memorias de traduction generate per le usator (como in le caso de <a0>OmegaT</a0>) le applicationes de Traduction Automatic usa instrumentos linguistic basate sur regulas pro crear un traduction del segmento fonte sin le necessitate de un memoria de traduction.

By default the editor displays 2,000 of initial segments, and progressively loads more as you scroll up or down.
Per option predefinite le editor monstra 2,000 del initial segmentos, e progressivemente carga los que necessita quando tu rola in alto o in basso.
By default, 1024 MB are assigned, so there is no advantage in assigning less than this figure.
1024 MB es predefinite, assi il non ha beneficio assignar minus de iste cifra.
By default, 512 MB are assigned, so there is no advantage in assigning less than this figure.
Per arrangiamento base, son assignate 512 MB, assi il non ha beneficio assignar minus de iste cifra.
By default, MyMemory allows a maximum of 100 requests per day.
Per option predefinite, MyMemory consenti un maximo de 100 requestas per die.

By default, OmegaT does not execute the commands specified in the project-specific settings (the <f0>finder.xml</f0> file in the <f1>omegat</f1> folder), because they may have a critical impact on the machine's security.

De ordinario, OmegaT non exeque le commandos specificate in le parametros specific-del-projecto (le file <f0>finder.xml</f0> in le plica <f1>omegat</f1>), perque illos pote haber un impacto critic sur le securitate del machina.
By default, OmegaT does not execute the commands specified in the project-specific settings (the <f0>omegat.project</f0> file), because they may have a critical impact on the machine's security.

De ordinario, OmegaT non exeque le commandos specificate in le parametros specific-del-projecto (le <f0>omegat.project</f0> file), perque illos pote haber un impacto critic sur le securitate del machina.
By default, OmegaT removes any leading and trailing whitespace from the translatable contents.
De ordinario, OmegaT remove ulle spatio blanc initial o final ab le contentos traducibile.
By default, OmegaT uses automatic match propagation.
Per predisposition initial, OmegaT usa le propagation del concordantia.
By default, all files that are not excluded are included.
De ordinario, tote le files que non es excludite es includite.
By default, each project contains a <l0/> folder to store the writable glossary and any reference glossaries you want to add to the project.
De ordinario, cata projecto contine un <l0/> plica pro immagazinar le glossario scribibile del projecto e qualcunque glossarios de referentia que tu vole adder al projecto.
By default, it is not possible to select words in the source segment using the keyboard rather than the mouse.
Per option predefinite, il non es possibile eliger parolas in le segmento fonte per le claviero plus tosto que per le mus.
By default, left justification is used for Left-To-Right (LTR) languages and right justification for Right-To-Left (RTL) languages.

Per arrangiamento prefixate initial, le justification sinistre es usate pro le linguas ab Sinistra a Dextera (Left-To-Right - LTR) e le justification dextre pro le linguas ab Dextera a Sinistra (Right-To-Left - RTL).
By default, scripts are stored in the "scripts" folder located in OmegaT installation folder (the folder that contains the OmegaT.jar).
Normalmente, le scripts es continite in le plica "scripts" locate in le plica de installation de OmegaT (le plica que contine OmegaT.jar).
By default, scripts are stored in the <f0>scripts</f0> folder located in the OmegaT installation folder (the folder that contains the <f1>OmegaT.jar</f1> file).
De ordinario, scripts es immagazinate in le plicas <f0>scripts</f0> ubicate in le plica de installation de OmegaT (le plica que contine le file <f1>OmegaT.jar</f1>).
By default, the /tm folder is below the project's root folder (e.g. ...<e0>/MyProject/tm</e0>), but you can choose a different folder in the project properties dialog if you wish.

Per arrangiamento initial, le plica /tm es sub le plica radice del projecto (per exemplo ...<e0>/MyProject/tm</e0>), ma tu pote eliger un plica differente in le fenestra de dialogo Proprietates del projecto si tu desira.
By default, the <f0>tm</f0> folder is below the project's root folder (e.g. ...<f1>MyProject/tm</f1>), but you can choose a different folder in the project properties dialog if you wish.

Per arrangiamento initial, le plica <f0>/tm</f0> es sub le plica radice del projecto (per exemplo ...<f1>/MyProject/tm</f1>), ma tu pote eliger un plica differente in le fenestra de dialogo Proprietates del projecto si tu desira.
By default, the Go To Next Untranslated Segment command (Ctrl+U) skips to the next untranslated segment, skipping propagated translations in the process.
Per predisposition initial, Le commando (Ctrl+U), salta al segmento non rendite sequente, saltante le traductiones propagate in le processo.
By default, the bash launch script is executable, but your system may change its permissions (e.g. during unpacking of the archive) and you may have to make it executable again.
De norma le script de lanceamento es executabile, ma tu systema pote mutar su permissiones (e.g. durante le disincassamento del archivo) e tu poterea deber lo render (executabile) de novo.
By default, the closest matches displayed in the <g0>Fuzzy Matches</g0> pane are determined using stemming.
De ordinario, le melior concordantias displicate in le quadro <g0>Concordantias partial</g0> es determinate per le recerca del radices.
By default, the encoding of the translated file is the same as that of the source file.
De ordinario, le codification del file traducite es le mesme que illo del file de fonte.
By default, the translated file encoding is the same as the source file encoding.
Per arrangiamento base, le codification del file rendite es identic al codification del file fonte.
By default, under Windows, <f1>omegat.project</f1> is locked, and an error message is received when trying to open a project already opened in another instance of OmegaT.
Sub Windows <l1>omegat.project</l1> es blocate per option predefinite, e es recipite un message de error quando on proba aperir un projecto jam aperite in un altere instantia de OmegaT.
By default, under Windows, <l1>omegat.project</l1> is locked, and an error message is received when trying to open a project already opened in another instance of OmegaT.
Per arrangiamento initial, sub Windows, <l1>omegat.project</l1> es blocate, e es recipite un message de error quando on proba a aperir un projecto jam aperite in un altere instantia de OmegaT.
By deleting a tag group you will remove the related formatting from the translated file.
Cancellante un gruppo de tag tu removera le formattation pertinente ex le file rendite.
By specifying an email address, it is possible to use 1000 requests per day instead of 100 ones.
Per specificar un adresse de E-mail, il es possibile usar 1000 requestas per die in vice del centos.

By unchecking <e0>Automatically Fetch Translations</e0> option, machine translations will be fetched only upon invoking <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1> (<k4> <k5>Cmd</k5> <k6>M</k6> </k4> on OS X) on the current segment.

Si tu dismarca le option <e0>Apportar automaticamente le traductiones</e0> , le traductiones automatic essera reportate solmente per le pulsata de <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1> (<k4> <k5>Cmd</k5> <k6>M</k6> </k4> sur OS X) sur le actual segmento.

For translation memories in folders with a name "penalty-xxx" (with xxx between 0 and 100), matches will be degraded according to the name of the folder: a 100% match in any of TMs, residing in a folder called Penalty-30 for instance, will be lowered to a 70% match.

Pro le memorias de traduction in le plicas con nomine "penalty-xxx" (con xxx inter 0 e 100), le concordantias essera degradate secundo le nomine del plica: un concordantia 100% in omne de TMs, residente in un plica nominate Penalty-30 per exemplo, essera diminuite a un concordantia del 70%.

Pro le traductiones designate "pro information", iste pote non esser un problema.

If --stats-type is not specified, the format is detected from the file extension.

If <e0>Show Relevant Suggestions Automatically</e0> option is checked, Auto-completer is launched automatically by typing the first letter of a translated glossary entry, or by typing "<" in case of tags.

Si le option <e0>Monstrar automaticamente le suggestiones pertinente</e0> es marcate, le auto-completator es lanceate automaticamente per inserer le prime littera del un entrata de glossario rendite, o per inserer "<" in caso de tags.

If <g0>Show Relevant Suggestions Automatically</g0> option is checked, Auto-completer is launched automatically by typing the first letters of a translated glossary entry, or by typing "<" in case of tags.

Si le option <g0>Monstrar automaticamente le suggestiones pertinente</g0> es marcate, le auto-completator es lanceate automaticamente per inserer le prime littera del un entrata de glossario rendite o per inserer "<" in caso de tags.
If <g0>Use Stemming for Glossary Entries</g0> option is ON, with an English source text, the glossary entry "element" will be found if the source text contains "elements".

Si le option <g0>Usar le radices verbal pro le entratas del glossario</g0> es ACTIVE, con un texto fonte anglese, le entrata del glossario "element" essera trovate alsi si le texto fonte contine "elements".
If <g0>Use Terms Appearing Separately in the Source Text</g0> option is ON, the glossary entry "itema itemb" will be found in the source text "itema other word itemb".

Si le option <g0>Usar terminos que appare separatemente in le texto fonte</g0> es ACTIVE, le entrata del glossario "elementoA elementoB" essera trovate in le texto fonte "elementoA altere parola elementoB".
If <l0>abort </l0>is selected, the tag validator will stop on the first invalid segment.
Si es seligite <l0>abort </l0>, le validator de tag arrestara se sur le prime segmento invalide.
If <l0>abort</l0> is selected, the tag validator will stop on the first invalid segment.
Si es seligite <l0>abort </l0>, le validator de tag se arrestara sur le prime segmento non valide.
If <l0>automatic searching in dictionaries</l0> is disabled, this function allows you to search for the selected word in the dictionaries.
Si le <l0>recerca automatic in le dictionarios</l0> es disactivate, iste function te permitte de cercar le parola seligite in le dictionarios.
If <l1>warn</l1> is specified, the tag validator will process all segments and write warnings about any segments with invalid tags into the file specified.
Si es specificate <l1>warn</l1>, le validator del tag processara tote le segmentos e scribera advertimentos re omne segmentos con tags invalide in le file specificate.
If HTML file has the encoding declaration, it will be used disregarding any value you set in this dialog.
Si un file HTML contine un declaration de codification, isto essera usate in vice de qualcunque valor que tu attribue in iste dialogo.
If Java is already installed on your system (which is probably the case) and you plan to use this existing, system-wide Java installation in conjunction with OmegaT, first check that it is suitable.

Si Java es jam installate sur tu systema que es probabilemente le caso) e tu projecta de usar iste existente installation Java de systema in conjunction con OmegaT, in prime loco controla que illo es convenibile.
If Java is installed at system level and is in the command path, the full path need not be entered.)
Si Java es installate a nivello de systema e es in le percurso del commando, non necessita inserer le percurso integral.)
If OmegaT behaves erratically, include this file, or the relevant part thereof, to your report.
Si OmegaT se comporta de un maniera erratic, include iste file o le parte pertinente de illo in tu reporto.
If OmegaT needs to use an authenticated proxy server to access the Internet, enter the details provided by the proxy administrator here.
Si OmegaT debe usar un servitor proxy authenticate pro acceder Internet, insere hic le detalios fornite per le administrator del proxy.

If Options > Editing Behaviour > "Go To Next Untranslated Segment stops when there is at least one alternative translation" is selected however and at least one alternative translation of a non-unique segment has been created, this function treats all instances of that segment (whether default or alternative translations) as untranslated, i.e. does not skip them.

Si Optiones > Comportamento del modifica > "Vade al sequente segmento non rendite arresta quando il ha al minus un traduction alternative" es seligite totevia e al minus un traduction alternative de un segmento non unic esseva create, iste function tracta omne occurrentias de un segmento (sia traductiones base o alternative) como non rendite, id es non los salta.
If Priorview fails to launch:
Si Priorview falle al lanceamento:
If a "command not found" or similar message is returned, it is likely that Java is not installed on your system
Si es rendite un message "command not found" o simile, il es verisimile que Java non es installate sur tu systema
If a "command not found" or similar message is returned, it is likely that Java is not installed on your system.
Si es rendite un message "command not found" o simile, il es verisimile que Java non es installate sur tu systema.
If a HHC or HHK file has an encoding declaration, it will be used regardless of any value you specify in this dialog.
Si un file HHC e HHK contine un declaration de codification, isto essera usate in vice de ulle valor que tu specifica in iste dialogo.
If a combination you try is already assigned, a message to this effect is displayed in the dialogue, and you can delete the combination and try another.
Si un combination que tu tenta es jam assignate, es monstrate un message pro iste effecto in the dialogo, e tu pote deler le combination e experir un altere.
If a file does not load into the <g0>Editor</g0> pane, then it could be that it is in a format that doesn't work in OmegaT.
Si un file non carga in le quadro <g0>Modifica</g0>, alora es possibile que tu file fonte ha un formato que non functiona in OmegaT.
If a given sentence has already been translated once, and translated correctly, there is no need for it to be retranslated.
Si un phrase date esseva jam rendite un vece, e rendite correctemente, il non ha necessitate pro retraducer lo.

Si un recerca elimina le duplicatos, ille duplicatos non essera in le Editor.
If a segment has already been translated and an identical segment later on in the text is then changed, the earlier segment will be brought into line with the changed segment.
Si un segmento esseva ja rendite e un segmento, identic in le texto, plus tarde es cambiate, alora le segmento anterior essera re-alineate con le segmento cambiate.
If a suitable JRE is already installed on your Windows system, select "Without JRE".
Si sur tu systema Windows es jam installate un convenibile version del JRE, selige "sin JRE".
If a suitable piece of the work for your language has not yet been started, you can make an entry in the plan to indicate that you have assumed responsibility for it.
Si un pecia apte del labor pro tu lingua non es etiam nunc initiate, tu pote lo signar in le plan pro indicar que tu ha assumite le responsabilitate pro illo.

If all has gone according to plan, your macro should now work.
Si toto esseva facite secun le plano, tu macro deberea ora functionar.
If all is well, an .html version of the file will be produced:<br1/>
Si tote es ben, un version .html del file essera producite:<br1/>
If an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project contains one or more glossaries, any terms in the glossary which are also found in the current segment will be automatically displayed in the Glossary viewer.
Si un projecto <a0>OmegaT</a0> contine uno o plus glossarios, qualcunque terminos in le glossario que alsi es trovate in le actual segmento essera automaticamente monstrate in le quadro "Glossario".
If an Internet connection is available, various MT services such as Google Translate and Microsoft Translator can be used from within OmegaT.
Si es disponibile un connexion al rete, on pote usar per OmegaT, varie servicios de traduction automatic qual Apertium, Google Translate, e Microsoft Translator.
If an error is found in such a file, OmegaT will indicate the position within the defective file at which the error is located.
Si es trovate un error in tal fila, OmegaT marcara le position, intra le file defective, ubi es localisate le error.

If both this option and the <l0><g1>Insert the source text</g1></l0> option are selected, all words with a corresponding glossary entry will be translated automatically when the source text is inserted.

Si ambe iste option e le option <l0><g1>Inserer le texto fonte</g1></l0> es seligite, tote le parolas con un entrata del glossario correspondente sera traducite automaticamente quando le texto fonte es inserite.
If checked, non-breakable spaces will be displayed with a grey background.
Si activate, le spatios non non-frangibile essera monstrate con un fundo gris.
If checked, non-unique segments will be marked in pale grey.
Si activate, le segmentos non unic essera marcate in gris pallide.
If checked, segments with notes will be marked in cyan.
Si activate, le segmentos con notas essera marcate in cyano.
If checked, source segments will be shown and marked in green.
Si activate, le segmentos fonte essera monstrate e marcate in verde.
If checked, the background of all segments where the target segment has been auto-populated (from TMXs placed in /tm/auto for example) are displayed in colour.
Si marcate, le fundo de omne segmentos de destination que ha essite auto-populate (per exemplo per TMXs ubicate in le plica /tm/auto) es monstrate in color.
If checked, the background of all segments where the target segment has been auto-populated (from TMXs placed in <f0>/tm/auto</f0> for example) are displayed in colour.
Si marcate, le fundo de omne segmentos de destination que ha essite auto-populate (per exemplo per TMXs ubicate in le plica /tm/auto) es monstrate in color.
If checked, the entries are sorted alphabetically.
Si marcate, le entratas son ordinate alphabeticamente.
If checked, the longer entries are placed on the list first.
Si marcate, le entratas plus longe son ubicate sur le prime lista.
If checked, the separations between paragraphs in the source document are indicated visually.
Si marcate, le separationes inter paragraphos in le documento fonte es indicate visualmente.
If checked, the translated segments will be marked in yellow.
Si iste option es activate, le segmentos rendite essera marcate in jalne.
If checked, the untranslated segments will be marked in violet.
Si activate, le segmentos non rendite essera marcate in violetto.
If checked, white spaces will be displayed with a small dot.
Si activate, le spatios blanc essera monstrate con un parve puncto.
If commands to perform external searches have been defined in the <l0>Preferences</l0>, they are listed and accessible here.
Si commandos pro exequer recercas externe ha essite definite in le <l0>Preferentias</l0>, illos es in le lista de presentation e accessibile hic.

If every single word in OmegaT is enclosed within tags, it is possible that Word has attempted to spell-check the text without access to a suitable spelling dictionary, and has therefore marked each word as mis-spelt.

Si cata singule parola in OmegaT es includite inter tags, il es possibile que Word ha tentate le controlo orthographic del texto sin accesso a un convenibile dictionario orthographic, e ha ergo marcate cata parola como un error orthographic.

If for a given source segment there is as yet no existing translation in the project translation memory (project_save.tmx), the current translation will be saved in the project_save.tmx as the default translation.

Si pro un segmento fonte date, il non ha adhuc traduction existente in le memoria de traduction del projecto (project_save.tmx), le traduction actual essera salvate in le file project_save.tmx quam traduction base.
If for a given source segment there is no entry for the selected target language, all other target segments are loaded, regardless of the language.
Si pro un date segmento fonte il ha nulle entrata pro le lingua de destination seligite, omne altere segmentos destination son cargate, sin reguardo del lingua.

Si illo non functiona ben, tu ancora ha le option de installar un version local de Java o un differente version de Java a nivello de systema.

If it is <f0>tar.bz</f0>, you have forgotten to unpack (untar) it.
Si illo es <f0>tar.bz</f0>, tu ha oblidate a discassar (untar) lo.
If it is clear from the very start, that translations in a given TM (or TMs) are all correct, one can put them into the <f0>tm/auto</f0> folder and avoid confirming a lot of <e1>[fuzzy]</e1> cases.
Si illo es clar a partir del initio, que le traductiones in certe TMs es omne correcte, on pote mitter los in le plica <f0>tm/auto</f0> e evitar de confirmar multe casos <e1>[fuzzy]</e1>.
If it is clear from the very start, that translations in a given TM (or TMs) are all correct, one can put them into the<e0> tm/auto</e0> folder and avoid confirming a lot of<e1> [fuzzy]</e1> cases.
Si illo es clar a partir del initio, que le traductiones in certe TMs es omne correcte, on pote mitter los in le plica <e0> tm/auto</e0> e evitar de confirmar multe casos<e1> [fuzzy]</e1>.
If it is not in your distribution's repository, you can <a0>download it from kaptain.sourceforge.net</a0>.
If illo non es in le repositorio de tu distribution, tu pote <a0>lo discargar ex kaptain.sourceforge.net</a0>.
If languages match but not the country, the segments still get loaded.
Si le linguas concorda me non le pais, le segmentos ancora es cargate.
If later access to the desired location is granted that location will be used and all settings will return to their defaults as a result of the location change.
Si un ulterior accesso al location desiderate essera accordate, iste location essera usate e omne configurationes retornara al lor initio a causa del cambiamento de location.
If multiple functions were to be used at the same time in practice, it would be more efficient to combine them in a single script file.
Si multiple functiones debera esser usate al mesme tempore in practica, esserea plus efficiente combinar los in un file script singule.
If necessary, edit the file names of the dictionary or change your project's language settings.
Si necessari, edita le nomines del file del dictionario o cambia tu configurationes pro le lingua de tu projecto.
If necessary, you can select a specific domain to limit the volume of data sent and received.
Si necessari, tu pote eliger un specific dominio pro limitar le volumine de datos inviate e recipite.
If neither the language code not the country code match, the segments will be ignored.
Si ni le codice lingua ni le codice pais concorda, le segmentos essera ignorate.
If no replacement is done to a given segment, the target segment will be emptied, i.e., it will remain untranslated.
Si le segmento de destination non ha essite reimplaciate, le destination essera vacuate, id es, illo restara non rendite.
If no text has been selected, the current source segment is written to this file.
Si non era seligite nulle texto, le segmento fonte actual es scripte in iste file.
If no text is selected, <a1>OmegaT</a1> selects the word that contains the letter immediately to the right of the cursor.
Si nulle texto es seligite, <a1>OmegaT</a1> selige le parola que contine le littera immediatemente al derecta del cursor.
If no text is selected, <a3>OmegaT</a3> selects the word that contains the letter immediately to the right of the cursor.
Si nulle texto es seligite, <a3>OmegaT</a3> selige le parola que contine le littera immediatemente al dextera del cursor.
If no text is selected, OmegaT selects the word that contains the letter immediately to the right of the cursor.
Si nulle texto es seligite, OmegaT selige le parola que contine le littera immediatemente al dextera del cursor.
If not checked, source segments will not be shown.
Si non activate, le segmentos fonte non essera monstrate.
If not given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> reverts to default values (<a3>OmegaT</a3> folder under user home or, if unavailable, the current working folder).
Si non date, <a2>OmegaT</a2> reveni al plica del valores de preparation base (<a3>OmegaT</a3> sub home del usator o, si indisponibile, le plica de labor actual).
If not given, <a3>OmegaT</a3> reverts to default values (<a4>OmegaT</a4> folder under user home or, if unavailable, the current working folder).
Si non specificate, <a3>OmegaT</a3> reveni al plica del valores prefixate initial (le plica <a4>OmegaT</a4> in le plica domo del usator o, si indisponibile: le plica de labor actual).
If not given, OmegaT reverts to default values (OmegaT folder under user home or, if unavailable, the current working folder).
Si non specificate, OmegaT reveni al plica del valores prefixate initial (le plica OmegaT in le plica domo del usator o, si indisponibile: le plica de labor actual).
If not specified, OmegaT reverts to default values (the OmegaT folder in the user home folder, or if not available: the current working folder).
Si non specificate, OmegaT reveni al plica del valores prefixate initial (le plica OmegaT in le plica domo del usator o, si indisponibile: le plica de labor actual).
If not, debugging messages will be shown which will (hopefully) provide some idea of where the problem is.
Si non, essera monstrate messages de cernita que (on spera) fornira qualque idea re ubi es le problema.
If not, or if you are not sure, select "with JRE".
Si non, o si tu non es secur, selige le version "Con JRE".
If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
If not, why not write an article on using OmegaT?
Si non, perque non scriber un articulo re le uso de OmegaT?
If on, when a PO segment (which may be a whole paragraph) is not translated, the translation will be empty in the target file.
Si active, quando un segmento PO (le qual pote esser un paragrapho integre) non es rendite, le traduction essera vacue in le file de destination.
If one does not wish to use external TMs for counting, one will either have to empty the /tm folder or change the project setup (temporarily) so that the value for /tm points to a different location.

Si on non desidera usar TMs externe pro le computo, on habera o vacuar le plica /tm o cambiar le preparation del projecto (temporaneemente) de maniera que le valor pro /tm puncta a un position differente.
If only one file is present, check its extension.
Si es presente sol un file, controla su extension.
If part of the target segment has been selected, this function overwrites the selected portion.
Si esseva seligite parte del segmento, iste function superscribe le portion seligite.

If propagation of a covered work results from an entity transaction, each party to that transaction who receives a copy of the work also receives whatever licenses to the work the party's predecessor in interest had or could give under the previous paragraph, plus a right to possession of the Corresponding Source of the work from the predecessor in interest, if the predecessor has it or can get it with reasonable efforts.

If propagation of a covered work results from an entity transaction, each party to that transaction who receives a copy of the work also receives whatever licenses to the work the party's predecessor in interest had or could give under the previous paragraph, plus a right to possession of the Corresponding Source of the work from the predecessor in interest, if the predecessor has it or can get it with reasonable efforts.
If selected, when a segment in a PO file (which may be a whole paragraph) is not translated, the translation will be empty in the target file.
Si seligite, quando un segmento in un file PO (que pote esser un integre paragrapho) non es traducite, le traduction essera vacue in le file de destination.
If sentence segmentation has been selected, you can setup the rules by selecting <m3> <g4>Options</g4> <g5>Segmentation...</g5> </m3>from the main menu.
Si ha essite seligite le segmentation per phrase, tu pote definir le regulas per <m3> <g4>Optiones</g4> <g5>Segmentation...</g5> </m3>ab le menu principal.
If sentence segmentation has been selected, you can setup the rules by selecting <m4> <g5>Options</g5> <g6>Segmentation...</g6> </m4>from the main menu.
Si ha essite seligite le segmentation per phrase, tu pote definir le regulas per <m4> <g5>Optiones</g5> <g6>Segmentation...</g6> </m4>ab le menu principal.
If sentence segmentation has been selected, you can setup the rules by selecting <m5> <g6><i7/>Options</g6> <g8>Segmentation...</g8> </m5>from the main menu.
Si le segmentation per phrase esseva seligite, tu pote prefixar le regulas con <m5> <g6><i7/>Optiones</g6> <g8>Segmentation...</g8> </m5>del menu principal.
If several translation engines are selected, then <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> is also used to switch between them and insert the last one selected.
Si plure motores traduction es seligite, alora <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> es alsi usate pro commutar inter illos e insere le ultime un seligite.
If so, this makes installation much easier.
Si assi, isto rende le installation multo plus facile.
If some texts are selected within the fuzzy match, only this selection will be inserted at the cursor position.
Si alcun textos es seligite intra le concordantia partial, solmente iste selection essera inserite al position del cursor.
If some texts are selected within the fuzzy match, only this selection will replace the whole target segment.
Si alcun texto del concordantia partial es seligite, solo iste selection replaciara tote le segmento de destination.
If spell checking is activated, spelling mistakes and typos are recognized and can be corrected during translation.
Si es activate le controlo orthographic, le errores orthographic e le lapsus son identificate e marcate pro esser correcte durante le traduction.
If such a file is found in the <l2/> folder, the file will be handled by the XHTML filter.
Si tal un file es trovate in le plica <l2/>, le file essera tractate per le filtro XHTML.

If the Auto-propagation check box is not checked, the segments with alternative translations are left untranslated until the user has decided which translation is to be used.
Si le quadrato de controlo Auto-propagation non es marcate, le segmentos con traductiones alternative es lassate non rendite dum le usator decide qual traduction usar.

If the alignment looks as if it could be improved, try changing the parameters.
Si le alineamento pare como si illo poterea esser meliorate, prova cambiar le parametros.
If the applicable functions are used, this folder can contain up to three text files:
Si tu usa le functiones applicabile, iste plica pote contener usque a tres files de texto:
If the appropriate filter is found, the file is assigned to it for processing.
Si le filtro appropriate es trovate, le file es assignate a Illo pro le successive processo.
If the automatic installation process does not work: check that your Internet connection is working; if so, try a different repository URL.
Si le processo de installation automatic non functiona: controla que tu connexion a Internet es functionante; si assi, proba un URL de repositorio differente.
If the checker's changes are to be included in a translation memory repository maintained by the customer, the changes need to be made <i0>before</i0> the final documents are created.
Si le cambios del correctores debe esser includite in un repositorio pro memoria de traduction mantenite per le cliente, necessita facer le cambios <i0>ante que</i0> le documentos final es create.
If the code compiles successfully, you will see the <c0>BUILD SUCCESSFUL</c0> message.
Si le codice compila con bon successo, tu videra le message <c0>COMPILATION SUCCEDITE</c0>.
If the current segment is the first one in a file, it moves to the last segment of the previous file.
Si le segmento currente es le prime segmento del file, move al ultime segmento del file previe.
If the current segment is the last segment in a file, it moves to the first segment of the next file.
Si le segmento currente es le ultime segmento in un file, illo move al prime segmento del file successive.
If the current translation of the segment does not fit, the user can select <g0>Edit Create Alternative Translation</g0>.
Si le traduction currente del segmento non conveni, le usator pote seliger <g0>Modifica Crea Traduction Alternative</g0>.
If the current translation of the segment does not fit, the user can select <m0><g1>Edit</g1><g2>Create Alternative Translation</g2></m0>.
Si le traduction currente del segmento non conveni, le usator pote seliger <m0><g1>Modifica </g1><g2>Crea Traduction Alternative</g2></m0>.
