If the document allows, the translator is strongly encouraged to remove style information from the original document so that as few tags as possible appear in the OmegaT interface.
Si le documento permitte, le traductor es fortemente incitate a remover le information del stilo ab le documento fonte assi que in le interfacie OmegaT appare tam pauc tags quam possibile.
If the document you are translating contains it, please do <s0>not</s0>translate the GPL (GNU Public License) or the GFDL (GNU Free Documentation License).
Si le documento que tu traduce los contine, <s0>NON</s0> render le licentias GPL (GNU Public License) o GFDL (GNU Free Documentation License).
If the documents are not available, the entry is greyed out.
Si le documentos non es disponibile, le entrata es gris.
If the file already exists, no attempt is done to verify the format or the character set of the file: the new entries will always be in tab-separated format and UTF-8.

Si le file existe jam, nulle tentativa es facite pro verificar le formato o le serie de character del file: le nove entratas essera semper in formato texto simple, 'separate per signo de tabulation' e codificate UTF-8.

If the file already exists, no attempt is done to verify the format or the character set of the file: the new entries will always be in tab-separated format and the file will be saved in UTF-8 encoding.

Si le file existe jam, nulle tentativa es facite pro verificar le formato o le collection de characteres del file: le nove entratas sempre essera in formato separate-de-tab, e le file sera salvate in codification UTF-8.
If the file displayed in the browser is not being updated, check the following:
If the file monstrate in le lector del tela non esseva renovate, controla le sequente:
If the file does contain mappings, then local changes to mappings are lost.
Si le file contine mappas, alora le cambiamentos local al mappas es perdite.
If the file doesn't contain mappings, the existing local mappings are re-applied, and only those.
Si le file non contine mappas, le mappas local existente es re-applicate, e solo illo.

If the files to be translated are parts of a tree structure (as in a website), you need only specify the top-level subfolder and OmegaT will maintain the entire contents, while keeping the tree structure intact.

Si le files a traducer son partes de un structura a arbore (como in un sito web), tu necessita sol specificar le sub plica de maxime nivello e OmegaT mantenera le contentos integre, dum tene intacte le structura a arbore.
If the filter has any options, you may change them by clicking Options.
Si le filtro ha alicun optiones, tu pote mutar los cliccante Optiones.
If the language of the user's system is not available, <a6>OmegaT</a6> defaults to English.
Si le lingua del systema del usator non es disponibile, <a6>OmegaT</a6> adopta le configurationes base in anglese.
If the language of the user's system is not available, <a7>OmegaT</a7> defaults to English.
Si le lingua del systema del usator non es disponibile, <a7>OmegaT</a7> adopta le configurationes base in anglese.
If the language of the user's system is not available, OmegaT defaults to English.
Si le lingua del systema del usator non es disponibile, OmegaT adopta le configurationes base in anglese.
If the option is OFF, the glossary entry above will not be found.
Si le option es INACTIVE, le dicite entrata del glossario non essera trovate.

If the option is checked, the source file name will not be used, and alternative translations will take effect in any file as long as the other context (previous/next segments or some sort of segment identifier, depending on the file format) matches.

Si le option es marcate, le nomine del file fonte non essera usate e le traductiones alternative prendera effecto in ulle file quando concordara le altere contextos (segmentos precedente/sequente o alcun genere de identificator del segmento dependente del formato de file).
If the option is off, the source text will be copied to the target segment.
Si le option es disactivate, le texto fonte essera copiate al segmento destination.
If the original document was LTR, the display direction of the target document must be changed manually to RTL in its viewing application.
Si le documento original esseva LTR, le direction de monstra del documento de destination debe esser cambiate manualmente a RTL in su application de vista.
If the parameter is not specified, all files will be processed.
Si le parametros non es specificate, omne files essera processate.
If the path to the location of priorview.tcl contains spaces, put it in quotes, e.g.:
Si le percurso allocation de priorview.tcl contine spatios, pone lo inter virgulettas, exempli gratia:
If the place to
If the place to
If the program does terminal interaction, make it output a short notice like this when it starts in an interactive mode:
If the program does terminal interaction, make it output a short notice like this when it starts in an interactive mode:
If the project contains files but their content is not displayed here:
Si le projecto contine files ma lor contentos es non monstrate ci:
If the project language codes and the tmx language codes fully match, the segments are loaded in memory.
Si le codices lingua projecto e le codices lingua tmx concorda in detalio, le segmentos son cargate in memoria.

If the project uses specific filters and segmentation parameters, both the <f0>filters.xml</f0> and <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> files must be added to the versioning system and published on the server.

Si le projecto usa specific parametros de filtros e segmentation, ambe le files <f0>filters.xml</f0> e <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> debe esser addite al systema controlo version e publicate sur le servitor.
If the rule matches, either the cursor moves on without inserting a segment break (for an exception rule) or a new segment break is created at the current cursor position (for the break rule).

Si le regula concorda, o le cursor move se super sin inserer un interruption de segmento (pro un regula de exception) o es create un interruption de segmento nove al position del cursor actual (pro le regula de interruption).
If the source documents contain whitespace used to control the layout, the whitespace that must be will retained in the translated document.
Si le documentos fonte contine spatios blanc que es usate pro controlar le disposition del projecto, le spatios blanc retenera in le documentos traducite.
If the source file is modified after you have begun translating, <a1>OmegaT</a1> may be unable to find a segment that you have already translated.
Si le file fonte es modificate postquam tu ha initiate a render, <a1>OmegaT</a1> pote esser incapace a trovar un segmento que tu jam habeva rendite.
If the source file is modified after you have begun translating, OmegaT may be unable to find a segment that you have already translated.
Si le file fonte es modificate postquam tu ha initiate a render, OmegaT pote esser incapace a trovar un segmento que tu jam habeva rendite.
If the source segment in one of the ancillary TMs is identical to the text being translated, OmegaT acts as defined in the <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> dialog window.
Si le segmento original in uno del TMs auxiliar es identic al texto a render, OmegaT age ut definite in le fenestra de dialogo <m0> <g1>Optiones</g1> <g2>Comportamento del Modifica...</g2> </m0> .

If the spell checker is not working, then make sure first that the check box <g0>"Automatically check the spelling of text"</g0> in the spell checker dialog (<g1>Options > Spell checking...)</g1> is checked.

Si le corrector orthographic es non functionante, alora face secur in prime loco que le cassa de marca <g0>"Controla automaticamente le orthographia del texto"</g0> in le dialogo del corrector orthographic (<g1>Optiones > correction orthographic...)</g1> es marcate.
If the text is encoded in 8 bits, however, one can be faced with the following awkward situation: instead of displaying the text, for Japanese characters...
Si le texto es codificate in 8 bits, tamen, on pote esser affrontate con le situation difficile sequente: in vice de monstrar le texto, pro le characteres japonese...

If the translation for several identical source segments already exists in the translation memory of the project, these segments, together with other, already translated unique segments, will be classified as an "Exact match".

Si le traduction pro aliquot segmentos fonte identic jam existe in le memoria de traduction del projecto, iste segmentos, conjunctemente con altere, segmentos unic ja traducite, essera classificate ut un "Concordantia exacte".
If the translator attempts to modify them, they will go back to their original state whenever the project is opened, closed, saved or reloaded.
Si le traductor tenta modificar los, illos recedera a lor original stato quandocunque le projecto es aperite, claudite, salvate o recargate.

If the use of multiple periods makes identifying the file name and extension ambiguous, you can use variables of the form <l0>${nameOnly-</l0><e1>number</e1>} or <l2>${extension-</l2><e3>number} </e3> to specify which portions are part of the name or extension, as shown in the example below.

Si le uso de plus punctos face le identification del nomine de file e del extension ambigue, tu pote usar variabiles in forma de <l0>${nameOnly-</l0><e1>numero</e1>} o <l2>${extension-</l2><e3>numero</e3> } pro specificar qual partes forma un parte del nomine o del extension, como monstrate in le exemplo infra.
If the value is <l1>abort</l1>, then on tag errors the errors are printed and the program stops.
Si le valor es <l1>abort</l1>, alora sur errores tag le errores son imprimite e le programma arresta se.
If the value is <l2>warn</l2> then the errors are printed but OmegaT continues.
Si le valor es <l2>warn</l2> alora le errores son imprimite, ma OmegaT continua.
If there are any differences, check that the <f0>filters.xml</f0> and <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> files are under version control.
Si il ha ulle differentias, controlar que le <f0>filters.xml</f0> e <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> files es sub controlo de version.
If there are other files named test.html in other folders, they will be ignored.
Si il habe altere files nominate test.html in altere plicas, illos essera ignorate.
If there's no file name displayed, the source is the internal project translation memory.
Si il ha nulle nomine del file monstrate, le fonte es le memoria de traduction interne del projecto.
If there's nothing appearing in the Machine Translate pane, then check the following:
Si il ha nihil que appare in le quadro Traduction Automatic, alora controla le sequente:
If there's several alternative translations available for the active segment, you can label the alternative selected as the default translation.
Si il ha plure traductiones alternative disponibile pro le segmento active, tu pote etiquettar le alternativa seligite como traduction base.
If they <e0>don't need</e0> to stay immune from further changes, then remove the TMX from /tm/enforce.
Si il <e0>non necessita</e0> remaner immune de additional cambiamentos, pois remove le TMX ab le plica /tm/enforce.
If they <e0>don't need</e0> to stay immune from further changes, then remove the TMX from <f1>tm/enforce</f1>.
Si il <e0>non necessita</e0> remaner immune de additional cambiamentos, pois remove le TMX ab le plica <f1>/tm/enforce</f1>.
If they <e0>need</e0> to stay immune from further changes, then keep the TMX in /tm/enforce.
Si il <e0>necessita</e0> remaner immune de additional cambiamentos, pois mantene le TMX in /tm/enforce.
If they <e0>need</e0> to stay immune from further changes, then keep the TMX in <f1>tm/enforce</f1>.
Si il <e0>necessita</e0> remaner immune de additional cambiamentos, pois mantene le TMX in <f1>/tm/enforce</f1>.
If they are accidentally changed, the formatting of the final file may be corrupted.
Si illos es cambiate per accidente, le formattation del file final potera esser corrupte.
If they are used by some other application on your system, they will disappear from that application, too.
Si illos es usate ab alicun altere application sur tu systema, illos disparera alsi ab celle application.
If they do not conflict with system shortcuts, they should be available from within OmegaT.
Si illos non conflige con le vias breve de systema, illos deberea esser utilisabile inter OmegaT.
If this is all you're interested in, you can skip to step 3a.
Si isto es toto lo que te interessa, tu pote saltar al grado 3a.
If this is not the case, open the main dialog by selecting<e0> Options File Filters...</e0> from the main menu.
Si non es iste le caso, aperi le fenestra de dialogo principal per seliger<e0> Optiones Filtros de File...</e0> ex le Menu Principal.
If this is what you want to do, use the GNU Lesser General Public License instead of this License.
If this is what you want to do, use the GNU Lesser General Public License instead of this License.
If this option is checked, only the previous/next segments or a segment identifier will be used to characterize an alternative translation.
Si iste option es marcate, solmente le segmentos previe/proxime o un identificator de un segmento essera usate pro characterisar un traduction alternative.
If this option is checked, the glossary will only display one entry, even if the same word exists in several forms (e.g. with and without capital letters) in the glossary.
Si iste option es marcate, le glossario monstrara solo un entrata, mesmo si un parola identic existe in plure formas (e.g. con e sin litteras majuscule) in le glossario.
If this option is checked, when a fuzzy match is inserted, either manually or automatically, OmegaT attempts to convert the numbers in the fuzzy matches according to the source contents.
Si es marcate iste option, quando on insere un concordantia partial, o manualmente o automaticamente, OmegaT tenta de converter le numeros in le concordantia partial secundo le contentos original.
If this option is selected, OmegaT will not remember the access key between sessions.
Si iste option es seligite, OmegaT non rememora le clave de accesso inter sessiones.
If this version is not available, you can try to <a0>download the unsigned version</a0>.
Si iste version non es disponibile, tu pote provar a <a0>discargar le version non firmate</a0>.
If unchecked, the comments are displayed as tags.
Si dismarcate, le commentos es monstrate como tags.
If used, neither the user's decision to accept the translation nor the final translation are made available to Google.
Si usate, ni le decision del usator a acceptar le traduction ni le traduction final son utilisabile per Google.

If we want to avoid any mis-translations in case of segments with several possible target contents, checking this check box will cause <e0>Go To Next Untranslated Segment</e0> to stop on the next such segment, irrespective of whether it has already been translated or not.

In le caso de segmentos con plure possibile contentos, si nos vole evitar omne mal-traductiones, le signo de iste quadrato de controlo causara que le commando <e0>Va al segmento non rendite sequente</e0> arrestara sur le segmento sequente, sin respecto re illo esseva jam rendite o non.
If you add a prefix (for instance [fuzzy]), you can trace those translations later to see they are correct.
Si tu adde un prefixo (per exemplo [fuzzy]), tu pote revider celle traductiones plus tarde pro vider si illos son correcte.
If you add new scripts there, they will appear in the list of available scripts in the <g0>Scripting</g0> window.
Si tu adde nove scripts illac, illos apparera in le lista de scripts disponibile in le fenestra <g0>Scripts</g0>.

Si tu es jam rationabilemente familiar con le computatores in general e selige un candide linguage de script como Tcl/Tk, tu poterea apprender satis pro poter scriber simple ma utile scripts, in solo un par de septimanas.

Si tu es relativemente nove re Linux, nos te consilia de seliger un version de OmegaT con le JRE includite.

Si tu fide, o desira usar, un installation Java non installate a nivello de systema, isto non essera sufficiente: tu debe anque instruer tu systema a ubi trovar Java.

Si tu ha memorias de traduction vetule, per exemplo ex tu agentia de traduction o ex un cliente, OmegaT pote pro referentia usar los.

Si tu es secur que sur tu computator es jam installate un convenibile version del JRE, tu pote seliger le option sin JRE includite.

Si tu non es secur si un convenibile JRE es jam installate sur tu systema, tu pote totevia discargar e installar un version de OmegaT con JRE.

Si tu usa un version de OmegaT anterior, il es recommendate de promover tu installation OmegaT.

Si tu pote programmar in un altere lingua, tu pote scriber codice a supporto del application principal.

If you decide mid-translation to switch from sentence to paragraph translation, the internal translation memory of the project will not be changed (OmegaT may upgrade old translation memories that did not use sentence segmentation, but not vice versa), but OmegaT will attempt to create paragraph fuzzy matches by glueing together existing sentence translations.

Si tu decide in medio al traduction de cambiar ab le segmentation per phrase al segmentation per paragrapho, le memoria de traduction interne del projecto non essera cambiate (OmegaT pote promover vetule memorias de traduction que non usa segmentation a phrase, ma non vice versa), sed OmegaT creara le concordantias partial de paragrapho, collante insimul traductiones de sententias existente.

Si tu decide in medio al traduction de passar ab le segmentation per phrase al segmentation per paragrapho, le memoria de traduction interne del projecto non essera cambiate (OmegaT pote promover vetule memorias de traduction que non usa segmentation a phrase, ma non vice versa), sed OmegaT tentara crear le concordantias partial de paragrapho, collante insimul traductiones de sententias existente.

If you have TransTips option activated (<g0>Options TransTips</g0>), you can right click on the highlighted word in the source segment to open a pop-up menu with suggested translation, as offered by your glossary.

Si tu ha le option TransTips activate (<g0>Optiones TransTips</g0>), tu pote cliccar con le dextro sur le parola marcate in le segmento fonte pro aperir un menu pop-up con le traduction suggerite, assi como offerite per tu glossarios.

If you have a PDF file made of scanned pages (sometimes such files are referred to as dead PDFs), you need to use an OCR (optical character recognition) program to recognize the text and convert it to a format that can be handled by OmegaT.

Si tu ha un file PDF file producite per paginas scandite (a vices tal files es referite como PDFs morte), tu besonia de usar un programma OCR (optic character recognition) pro recognoscer le texto e lo converter a un formato que pote ser tractate per OmegaT.

If you have a natural aversion to reading instructions, and your approach to new software is to click on every button you see until something resembling the desired effect occurs, then OmegaT is probably not suitable for you.

Si tu ha un natural aversion al lectura del instructiones, e tu approche a nove software es de cliccar sur cata button tu vide usque alicun cosa resimilante al effecto desiderate occurre, alora OmegaT non es probabilemente convenibile pro te.
If you have a powerful machine, and/or if you don't like how the scrollbar behaves during progressive loading, you can increase this number.
Si tu ha un machina potente, e/o si tu non agrada como le barra de rolamento se comporta durante le progresso del cargamento, tu pote incrementar iste numero.

If you have already translated a large body of text, and then realize the target language code of the project does not match the spell checker's language code (you specified pt_BR as the language, but there are no pt_BR vocabularies, for instance) you can simply copy the two corresponding files and rename them (e.g. from <e0>pt_PT.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> to <e2>pt_BR.aff</e2> and <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>).

Si tu ha jam rendite un grande corpore de texto, e alora realisa que le codice del lingua final del projecto non equala le codice del lingua del corrector orthographic (per exemplo tu ha specificate pt_BR como le lingua, ma non ha nulle vocabularios pt_BR) tu pote simplemente copiar le duo files correspondente e los renominar (e.g. ab <e0>pt_PT.arr</e0> e <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> a <e2>pt._BR.arr</e2> e <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>).

Si tu ha jam traducite un instantia de un segmento non-unic e tu vole render "traduction base" un altere instantia, sin cambiar le traduction del instantia que tu ha ja traducite, tu debe in prime loco definir le character del segmento que tu ha ja traducite como "traduction alternative" per "Crear un traduction alternative".

Si tu ha installate un version de OmegaT con supplite JRE, le script lanceamento supplite jam contine iste percurso pro te.

Si tu ha installate un altere version de Java, ma tu non ha rendite lo como version ordinari a nivello de systema, tu debe includer le integre percurso del file binari Java in le commando de lanceamento.
If you have made changes to your <f0>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f0> file and/or are using a .bat file, you must copy these over.

Si tu ha modificate tu Normal.dotm, tu pote voler in prime loco lo salvar.

Si tu non ha ulle dubita que un TMX es plus accurate del file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> de OmegaT, pone iste TMX in le plica /tm/enforce pro superscriber inconditionalmente le traductiones predefinite existente.
If you have no doubt that a TMX is more accurate than the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> of OmegaT, put this TMX in <f1>tm/enforce</f1> to overwrite existing default translations unconditionally.

Si tu non ha ulle dubita que un TMX es plus accurate del file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> de OmegaT, pone iste TMX in le plica <f1>/tm/enforce</f1> pro superscriber inconditionalmente le traductiones predefinite existente.
If you have not already done so, add the Developer tab to the ribbon as follows: click on the Office button.
Si tu non ha ja facite assi, adde le scheda Disveloppator al banda como seque: clicca sur le button Office.

Si tu ha le Files del Proprietates fonte e destination pro uno e le mesme contentos in tu par de lingua, iste procedura creara un file tmx correspondente pro iste contentos.
If you haven't yet saved the project, this manually confirms whether you really wish to quit.
Si tu non ha adhuc salvate le projecto, isto confirma manualmente si tu vermente desidera quitar.
If you install the OmegaT version with JRE even though the JRE is already installed on your computer, OmegaT's JRE will be installed separately and will not conflict with it.
Si tu installa le version de OmegaT con JRE, anque si le JRE es ja installate sur tu computator, le JRE de OmegaT essera installate separatemente e non confligera con illo.
If you keep the leading and trailing tags, make sure you also include them in the translated text.
Si tu mantene le tags initial e final, assecura te que tu alsi include los in le texto traducite.
If you later change filters, only the project filters will be updated, while the user filters stay unchanged.
Si tu plus tarde cambiara le filtros, sol le filtros del projecto essera renovate, dum le filtros del usator restara sin alteration.

If you modify the project segmentation or delete files from the source, some matches may appear as <e1>orphan strings</e1> in the Match Viewer: such matches refer to segments that do not exist any more in the source documents, as they correspond to segments translated and recorded before the modifications took place.

Si tu modifica le segmentation del projecto o dele files in le fonte, alcun concordantias pote apparer como <e1>lineas de characteres orphane</e1> in le quadro del concordantia: tal concordantias refere a segmentos que non existe alicun plus in le documentos fonte, pois que illos corresponde a segmentos rendite e registrate ante que le modificationes habeva loco.
If you need altered settings, the configuration files must be available.
Si tu necessita configurationes alterate, le files de configuration debe esser disponibile.
If you need assistance with any aspect of OmegaT, feel free to join the <u1>OmegaT users group.</u1>
Si tu ha besonio de adjuta pro qualque aspecto de OmegaT, que tu te adjunge gratis al gruppo <u1>Usatores de OmegaT</u1> .
If you need non-standard settings, the corresponding configuration files (<l0>filters.conf</l0> and <l1>segmentation.conf</l1>) must be present.
Si tu necessita configurationes non-standard, le files de configuration correspondente (<l0>filters.conf</l0> e <l1>segmentation.conf</l1>) debe esser presente.
If you need to reproduce text formatting (as well as other things such as drawings) in your translation, there are three ways to try:
Si tu besonia de reproducer formato de texto (assi como altere cosas como designos) in tu traduction, il ha tres manieras pro probar:
If you need to see tags in OmegaT but do not need to retain most of the formatting in the translated document you are free not to include tags in the translation.
Si tu debe vider le tags in OmegaT ma non necessita conservar le major parte del formattation in le documento rendite tu es libere ne includer le tags in le traduction.

If you obtain the Oracle version of Java directly from Oracle, installation is likely to be straightforward, but you will have to configure it manually in order to make it the default version at system level.

Si tu obtene le version Oracle de Java directemente ex Oracle, le installation essera probabilemente correcte, ma tu debera lo configurar manualmente pro lo render le version ordinari, a nivello de systema.
If you only have a Bolivian Spanish dictionary available, with the file names es_BO.dic and es_BO.aff, you can rename these files es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff, and the spelling dictionary will work.

Si tu ha disponibile sol un dictionario boliviano espaniol, con le nomines del file es_BO.dic e es_BO.aff, tu debe renominar iste files in es_MX.dic e es_MX.aff, e le dictionario orthographic functionara.

If you only have a standard Spanish dictionary available, with file names es_es.dic and es_es.aff for instance, you can copy these files to es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff, and the spelling dictionary will work.

Si tu ha disponibile sol un dictionario Standard espaniol, con le nomines del file es_es.dic e es_es.aff , tu pote copiar iste files in es_MX.dic e es_MX.aff, e le dictionario orthographic functionara.
If you only need textual information (and not formatting information), use the level 1 file that OmegaT has created.
Si tu necessita solmente information textual (e non information de formattation), usa le file nivello 1 que OmegaT ha create.
If you place such translation memory files in the <f6>/tm/</f6> subfolder of a project, OmegaT will automatically search them for similar segments, called "fuzzy matches".
Si tu loca unes files de memoria de traduction in le sub plica <f6>/tm/</f6>de un projecto, OmegaT querera las automaticamente pro similabile segmentos con "concordantia partial".
If you place such translation memory files in the <f6>tm</f6> subfolder of a project, OmegaT will automatically search them for similar segments, called "fuzzy matches".
Si tu loca unes files de memoria de traduction in le sub plica <f6>/tm/</f6>de un projecto, OmegaT querera las automaticamente pro similabile segmentos con "concordantia partial".
If you prefer not to use OmegaT to translate files of a certain type, you can turn off the corresponding filter by deactivating the check box beside its name.
Si tu prefere non usar OmegaT pro traducer files de un certe typo, tu pote disactivar le correspondente filtro dismarcante le quadrato de controlo sub su nomine.
If you prefer to translate from a different language into which OmegaT has already been localized, pleasecontact the <a2>OmegaT webmaster</a2>.)
Si tu prefere traducer ab un lingua differente in le qual OmegaT ha ja essite localisate, per favorcontinge le <a2>webmaster de OmegaT</a2>.)

If you right click on the Editor pane, a pop-up menu opens, offering<e0> Cut, Copy, Paste</e0> (i.e. same functions as <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>X</k3> </k1>, <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>C</k6> </k4> and <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>V</k9> </k7>), <e10>GoTo segment</e10> and <e11>Add glossary entry</e11> functions.

Si tu clicca dextre sur le quadro del Editor, se aperi un menu que offere:<e0> Secar, Copiar, Collar</e0> (le mesme functiones que: <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>X</k3> </k1>, <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>C</k6> </k4> e <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>V</k9> </k7>), le functiones <e10>Ir al segmento</e10> e <e11>Adder un entrata al glossario</e11>.
If you select a text string (in any pane) before pressing <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>F</k2> </k0>, the text will be pasted by default in the <g3>Search for</g3> field.
Si tu elige un fila de texto (in qualcunque quadro) ante pulsar <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>F</k2> </k0>, le texto essera collate de norma in le campo <g3>Cercar pro</g3>.
If you select a text string (in any pane) before pressing <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>K</k2> </k0>, the text will be pasted by default in the <g3>Search for</g3> field.
Si tu elige un fila de texto (in qualcunque quadro) ante pulsar <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>K</k2> </k0>, le texto essera collate per option predefinite in le campo <g3>Cercar pro</g3>.
If you select a text string (in any pane) before pressing <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Shift</k2> <k3>G</k3> </k0>, the text will be pasted by default in the <g4>Source term</g4> field.
Si tu elige un fila de texto (in qualcunque quadro) ante pulsar <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Shift</k2> <k3>G</k3> </k0>, le texto essera collate per option predefinite in le campo<g4>Termino fonte</g4>.
If you start <a1>OmegaT</a1> in console mode, it will use the same settings.
Si tu lancea <a1>OmegaT</a1> in modo consola, il usara le mesme configurationes.
If you start <a1>OmegaT</a1> in console mode, it will use the settings you configured.
Si tu lancea <a1>OmegaT</a1> in modo consola, illo usara le configurationes que tu configurava.
If you start OmegaT in console mode, it will use the same settings.
Si tu lancea OmegaT in modo consola, il usara le mesme configurationes.
If you uncheck this option, machine translations will be fetched only when you press <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> (<k3> <k4>Cmd</k4> <k5>M</k5> </k3> on OS X) in the current segment.

Si tu dismarca iste option, le traductiones automatic sera reportate in le segmento actual solo quando tu pulsa <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> (<k3> <k4>Cmd</k4> <k5>M</k5> </k3> sur systema operative X).

If you used OmegaT or another CAT tool for the work, please also upload your translation memory (TMX file) to the <a0>translation memory repository in the online user group</a0>.

Si tu ha utilisate OmegaT o un altere application de CAT pro le labor, per favor alsi carga tu memoria de traduction (TMX file) al <a0>repositorio de memorias de traduction in le gruppo del usatores in internet</a0>.
If you used linux-install.sh script, you should be able to launch OmegaT with:
Si tu usava le script linux-install.sh, tu potera lancear OmegaT con:

Si tu vole que le traduction sia identic al origine, vacua simplemente le campo de modifica removente tote le texto (selige omne con <k0><k1>Ctrl+</k1><k2>A</k2></k0> e dele con <k3>Del</k3>).
If you want the translation to be the same as the source, simply make the editing field empty by removing all the text (select all with <k0>Ctrl+A</k0> and delete with <k1>Del</k1>).
Si tu vole que le traduction sia identic al origine, vacua simplemente le campo de modifica removente tote le texto (selige omne con <k0>Ctrl+A</k0> e dele con <k1>Del</k1>).
If you want to revert to the filter's default configuration, click <e1>Defaults.</e1> You can also modify the name directly in the target filename pattern field of the file filters dialog.

Si tu desira reverter al configuration predefinite del filtro, clicca <e1>Valores predefinite.</e1> Tu pote alsi modificar le nomine directemente in le campo del modello de nomine de file de destination del fenestra de dialogo Filtros de file.
If you want to select Basic subscription (free, up to 2 million characters a month,) click [SIGN UP] at the top of the subscription list.<br8/>
Si tu vole seliger Abonamento basic (gratuite, usque a 2 million de characteres al mense), clicca [SIGN UP] al alto lista del abonamentos.<br8/>

Si tu vole specificar un altere codification, tu pote facer lo per adder un commento "magic" que ha le formate sequente:

Si tu vole usar <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> pro aperir un projecto, modifica tu <f4>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f4> ut seque:
If you want to use the same language in OmegaT as the one used during installation, check the box below.
Si tu vole usar le mesme lingua, in OmegaT, que es in uso durante le installation, marca le buxo in basso.
If you wish to keep track of what is happening to the report, register as a SourceForge user, login and file a bug report or simply click Monitor at the top of the report.

Si tu vole mantener tracia re quod es occurrente a tu reporto, registra te como un usator SourceForge, qualifica te e deposita un reporto de defecto o simplemente clicca monitor al summitate de tu reporto.
If you wish to revert to default configuration of the filter, click <e2>Defaults.</e2> You may also modify the name directly in the target filename pattern field of the file filters dialog.

Si tu desira retornar al configuration base del filtro, clicca <e2>Defaults.</e2> Tu pote alsi modificar le nomine directemente in le campo nomine de file final del modello del fenestra de dialogo Filtros de File.
If you wish to translate the <s0>OmegaT web pages</s0>, download the <a1>website localization package</a1>.
Si tu vole traducer le <s0>paginas web de OmegaT</s0>, discarga le <a1>pacchetto de localisation del sito web</a1>.
If you wish to translate the OmegaT website and/or the Beginner's Tutorial, please contact the <a3>OmegaT Website Manager</a3>.
Si tu desidera traducer le sito web de OmegaT e/o le Parve instruction del novicios, per favor continge le <a3>Administrator del Sito web de OmegaT</a3>.
If you wish to use different tokenizers because you translate from more than one language, create a separate OmegaT launch script file for each tokenizer you wish to use.
Si tu vole usar tokenizers differente perque tu rende ex plus que un lingua, crea un file script de lanceamento de OmegaT separate pro cata tokenizer que tu desidera usar.
If you wish to use such files as reference translations in OmegaT, they must be repaired, or OmegaT will report an error and fail to load them.
Si tu desira usar tal files como traductiones de referentia in OmegaT, illos debe esser reparate, o OmegaT reportara un error e fallera a cargar los.
If you wish to use the tokenizer, install the standard version of OmegaT (latest beta version) for your system.
Si tu vole usar le tokenizer, installa le version standard de OmegaT (le ultime version beta) pro tu systema.
If you would like to help support the continued development of OmegaT, it would be very much appreciated - click on this link to go to the <u0> OmegaT PayPal account</u0>.
Si tu amarea sustener adjuta al continue disveloppamento de OmegaT, il esserea permulte appreciate - Clicca sur iste ligamine pro vader al conto <u0> PayPal de OmegaT</u0>.
If you're a programmer and you happen to know Java, please check the documentation in the <a0>source code</a0> under /docs_devel for information on how to get started.
Si tu es un programmator e sape Java, per favor marca le documentation in le <a0>codice fonte</a0> infra /docs_devel pro informationes re como initiar.
If your code has compiled successfully, the compiled OmegaT is placed in:
Si tu codice esseva compilate con bon successo, le OmegaT compilate es site in:
If your existing OmegaT installation is a "Windows with JRE" version, the new version must also be a "Windows with JRE" version.
Si tu installation de OmegaT es un version "Windows with JRE", le nove version debe alsi esser un version "Windows with JRE".
If your file contains lots of such inconvenient breaks, it is more efficient to remove them all at once, toggling between OmegaT and Infix to see where they are.
Si tu file contine multe de tal interruptiones incommode, il es plus efficiente levar los tote a un vice, commutante inter OmegaT e Infix pro vider ubi illos es.
If your program is a subroutine library, you may consider it more useful to permit linking proprietary applications with the library.
If your program is a subroutine library, you may consider it more useful to permit linking proprietary applications with the library.
If your rights have been terminated and not permanently reinstated, you do not qualify to receive new licenses for the same material under section 10.
If your rights have been terminated and not permanently reinstated, you do not qualify to receive new licenses for the same material under section 10.
If your set of rules handles a language-country pair, we advise you to move it to the top using the <e1>Move Up</e1> button.
Si tu collection de regulas tracta un copula lingua-pais, nos te avisara a mover lo al summitate per le button <e2>Mover in alto</e2>.
If your set of rules handles a language-country pair, we advise you to move it to the top using the <e2>Move Up</e2> button.
Si tu collection de regulas tracta un par lingua-pais, nos monera te a mover lo al summitate usante le button <e2>Move in alto</e2>.
If your source files are formatted files, e.g. Microsoft Word, LibreOffice Writer or HTML, OmegaT will convert the formatting into tags that surround the text that you translate.
Si tu files fonte es formattate, per exemplo in formato: Microsoft Word, LibreOffice Writer o HTML, OmegaT convertera le formato in tags que ambira le texto que tu va render.
If your text contains both Asian and "normal" (e.g. Latin) characters, use Ctrl+A to select the entire text, then select a single font for it.
Si tu texto contine ambe le characteres asiatic e "normal" (e.g. Latin), usa Ctrl+A pro seliger le texto integre, pois selige un typo de character sol pro illo.
If, during installation, you have created a shortcut on the desktop, double-click on that shortcut.
Si, durante le installation, tu ha create un via breve sur le scriptorio, duple-clicca sur ille via breve.
If, during installation, you have created a shortcut on the desktop, double- click on that shortcut.
Si, durante le installation, tu ha create un via breve sur le scriptorio, duple- clicca sur ille via breve.
If, for whatever reason, you need to do this from time to time, it may make sense to copy the files involved to a different folder, reserved just for use by OmegaT.
Si, pro qualcunque ration, tu necessita de lo facer sovente, copia le files implicate in un plica differente, reservate solmente pro le uso de OmegaT.

In a file manager a translation project looks and acts just like any other folder.
In un administrator de file un projecto de traduction appare e age justo como omne altere plica.
In a similar fashion as above the user can create project-specific File filters, which will be stored together with the project and will be valid for the current project only.

In un faction similabile como precedentemente le usator pote crear Filtros de File projecto-specific, que essera immagazinate conjunctemente con le projecto e essera valide pro le the currente solmente.
In a team project, this folder contains a versioned copy of the project tree structure linked directly to the remote server.
In un projecto de equipa, iste plica contine un copia versionate del structura arbore del projecto ligate directemente al servitor remote.
In addition to Trados, however, several other CAT tools also support the "uncleaned RTF" format, notably Wordfast Classic.
In ultra a Trados, comocunque, plure altere applicationes CAT alsi supporta le formato "RTF non mundate", remarcabilemente Wordfast Classic.
In addition to the plain text format, TBX format <i0/> is also supported as a read-only glossary format.
In plus al formato texto simple, le formato TBX <i0/> es alsi supportate qual formato a sol lectura.
In addition to the plain text format, TBX format is also supported as a read-only glossary format.
In ultra al formato texto simple, le formato TBX es alsi supportate qual formato a sol lectura.
In addition, if supported by the hardware and operating system (this is not always the case), a beep will sound.
In ultra, si supportate per le hardware e per le systema operative (isto non es semper le caso), sonara un papiamento.
In addition, the package <a0>te-scripts.zip</a0> contains some very simple tcl/tk scripts which are intended to illustrate use of the function.
In addition, le pacchetto <a0>te-scripts.zip</a0> contine alicun scripts tcl/tk multo simplice que es designate a illustrar le uso del function.
In addition, two menu entries allow opening directly the current source and target documents and the writable glossary.
In addition, duo entratas del menu consenti le apertura directemente del actual documentos fonte e de destination e del glossario scribibile.

In addition, when the right click occurs on an opened segment, other options concerning <e12>Alternative translations</e12> are proposed, for example to to jump to another instance of non-unique segments.

In addition, quando le clic dextre occurre sur un segmento aperte, es proponite altere optiones concernente <e12>Traductiones alternative</e12>, per exemplo pro saltar a un altere instantia del segmentos non-unic.
In all other cases no tag validation is done.
In omne altere casos non es facite nulle validation.
In an as-yet untranslated "External View" file, the target column is empty.
In un file "Vista Externe" ancora non rendite, the columna de destination es vacue.
In both Firefox and Opera, this can be done by right-clicking in the translated .html file you have opened, then Reload every > select a desired interval (e.g. 5 seconds).
In ambe Firefox e Opera, isto pote ser facite per un click dextere in le file .html rendite que tu ha aperte, pois Recargar cata > selige un intervallo de tempore desiderate (e.g. 5 secundos).
In both cases, the project manager must send the translator their ID and password to access the repository.
In ambe casos, le gestor de projecto debe inviar al traductor lor ID e contrasigno pro acceder le repositorio.
In both exact and keyword searches, the wild card search characters '*' and '?' can be used.
In ambe le recercas exacte e per parola clave, on pote usar le characteres de recerca universal '*' e '?'.
In both files, search for (matching the case) and replace:
In ambe files, "Cerca e replacia" (con concordantia del majusculas/minusculas):
In case no tokenizer exists for the current languages, OmegaT uses Hunspell instead (in that case, make sure that relevant Hunspell dictionaries are installed).
In le caso que nulle tokenizer exists pro le lingua currente, OmegaT usa Hunspell in vice (in iste caso, face te secur que es installate le dictionarios Hunspell pertinente ).
In case of OmegaT complete project folders - in other words the translation memories involved as well as source folders, project settings etc - are managed by the selected RCS.

In caso de plicas Projecto complete OmegaT - in in altere parolas le memorias de traduction implicate assi como le plicas fonte, le configurationes del projecto etc - son tractate per le RCS seligite.
In case of PO files, a 20% penalty applied to the alternative translation (i.e., a 100% match becomes an 80% match).
In caso de files PO, es applicate un penalitate del 20% al traduction alternative (id es, un concordantia del 100% deveni un concordantia del 80%).
In case the file name has ambivalent name, one can apply variables of the form <l0>${name only</l0><e1>-extension number</e1>} and <l2>${extension</l2>-<e3>extension number} </e3>.

In caso que le nomine del file ha nomine ambivalente, on pote applicar le variabiles del forma <l0>${name only</l0><e1>-numero de extension</e1>} e <l2>${extension</l2>-<e3>numero de extension} </e3>.

In case there are non-unique segments in source documents, the Auto-propagation check box offers the user the following two possibilities as regards automatic translation: if checked, the first translated segment will be assumed as the default translation and its target text will be automatically used for later hits during the translation process.

In caso il ha segmentos non unic in le documentos fonte, le quadrato de controlo del Auto-propagation offere al usator le duo possibilitates sequente respecto al traduction automatic: si marcate, le prime segmento rendite essera assumite como le traduction prefixate e su texto rendite essera usate automaticamente pro le occurrentias sequente durante le processo traduction.

In case translators need to share their TMX bases while excluding some of their parts or including just translations of certain files, sharing the complete <f0>ProjectName-omegat.tmx</f0> is out of question.

In caso que plus traductores necessita compartir lor bases de TMX e excluder alicun de lor partes o includer justo traductiones de certe files, participar le complete <f0>ProjectName-omegat.tmx</f0> es foras question.
In case you decide to modify project folders, keep in mind that this will not move existing files from old folders to the new location.
In caso que tu decide te a modificar le plicas del projecto, mantene in mente que iste non movera le files existente ex le vetule plicas al nove ubication.
In case, however, the same source segment already exists with a different translation, the new translation will be saved as an alternative.
Comocunque, In caso que le identic segmento fonte existe jam con un traduction differente, le nove traduction essera salvate como un alternativa.
In cases like these it becomes necessary to switch to RTL mode, so that the RTL (in fact bidirectional) text is displayed correctly.
In casos como istos deveni necessari commutar al modo RTL, de maniera que le texto RTL (de facto bidirectional) sia monstrate correctemente.
In cases where a team of translators is involved, translators will prefer to share common translation memories rather than distribute their local versions.
In casos ubi un equipa de traductores es implicate, le traductores preferera divider le memorias de traduction commun plus tosto que distribuer lor versiones local.
In comments
In le commentos
In conjunction with the te-st-notags script, this provides a separate window in which tags are not displayed.
Conjunctemente con le script te-st-notags, isto provide un fenestra separate in le qual le tags non es monstrate.
In determining whether a product is a consumer product, doubtful cases shall be resolved in favor of coverage.
In determining whether a product is a consumer product, doubtful cases shall be resolved in favor of coverage.
In each case, <i0>file</i0> is the name of a .docx or .odt file.
In cata caso, <i0>file</i0> es le nomine de un file .docx o .odt.
In fact, their structure is very similar to that of OpenOffice.org files: they consists of a zip archive containing multiple files, and the files containing the text are based upon the XML standard.
De facto, lor structura es multo simile a cello del files de OpenOffice.org: illos consiste de un archivo zip continente plure files, e le files continente le texto es basate sur le standard XML.
In its most basic form, this command is:
In su forma plus basic, iste commando es:
In macOS, this menu item is listed in the application menu.
In macOS, iste elemento del menu es listate in le menu del application.
In many cases, however, it is necessary to embed LTR text in RTL text.
In multe casos, tamen, il es necessari incastrar texto LTR in texto RTL.
In most cases, the lower the <g0>Average score</g0> is, better the alignment will be.
In le major parte del casos, minor le es <g0>valutation medie</g0>, melior essera le alineamento.
In most cases, the translator will wish to translate identical segments within a project in the same way.
In le major parte del casos, le translator desirara render segmentos identic intra un projecto in le mesme maniera.
In most systems, it is possible to open a project by dropping an <f0>omegat.project</f0> file onto the OmegaT icon on the desktop.
In plure systemas, il es possibile aperir un projecto per traher un file <f0>omegat.project</f0> e deponer lo in le icone de OmegaT sur le scriptorio.
In most translation jobs, it is considered important for the formatting of the original text to be retained in the translation.
In le major parte del obras de traduction, il es considerate importante, pro le formattation del texto fontal, trovar se retenite in le traduction.
In non-segmented projects, disable this option to make leading and trailing whitespace modifiable in the translation.
In projectos non-segmentate, tu debe incapacitar iste option pro facer le spatios blanc initial e final modificarabile in le traduction.
In non-segmented projects, it is possible to keep it by unchecking this option.
In le projectos non-segmentate, il es possibile retener lo per dismarcar iste option.
In notes
In le notas
In order for the changes to take effect OmegaT needs to close and then open the project.
A fin que le cambiamentos sume effecto, OmegaT necessita clauder e reaperir le projecto.
In order for this procedure to be used, the Dj Vu user must prepare the source text file and supply it to the translator in the Dj Vu "External View" format.
Pro usar iste procedura, le usator de Dj Vu debe preparar le file texto de origine e lo suppler al traductor in le formato "Vista Externe" de Dj Vu.

In order for this process to be as automatic as possible, two conditions must in particular be met: firstly, the translation memory must contain formatting information (see above); and secondly, the segmentation rules applied to the text must be the same as those applied when the translation memory (or part of it) was produced.

Pro automatisar le plus possibile iste processo, on debe satisfacer in particular duo conditiones: in prime loco, le memoria de traduction debe continer le informationes de formato (vider supra); e in secunde loco, le regulas de segmentation applicate al texto debe esser identic a illos applicate quando esseva producite le memoria de traduction (o parte de illo).
In order to be able to use Yandex Translate in OmegaT, you need to <u0>obtain an API key from Yandex</u0>.
Al fin que tu usa Yandex Translate in OmegaT, tu necessita <u0>obtener un clave API ab Yandex</u0>.
In order to create an empty set of rules for a new language pattern click <e0>Add </e0>in the upper half of the dialog.
Pro crear un collection de regulas vacue pro un modello de lingua nove clicca <e0>Adde </e0>in le medietate superior del fenestra de dialogo.
In order to edit or expand an existing set of rules, simply click on it in the top table.
Pro modificar o expander un collection de regulas existente, clicca simplemente sur illo in le summitate del tabella.
In order to get credentials for MS Translator, follow these steps:
Pro procurar se le credentiales pro MS Translator, sequer iste grados:
In order to install the Web start version, you must already have Java version 1.3 or later installed on your computer.
Pro installar le version Web start, tu debe jam haber installate sur tu computer le version Java 1.3 o plus tarde.
In order to install the Web start version, you must already have Java version 1.8 or later installed on your computer.
Pro installar le version Web start, tu debe jam haber installate sur tu computer le version Java 1.8 o plus tarde.
In order to make the workings of the script code clearer, each script essentially performs only one function.
Pro render plus clar le functionamentos del script, omne script essentialmente exeque sol un function.
In order to run, OmegaT requires the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) to be installed on your computer.
Pro fluer, OmegaT besonia quele Java Runtime Environment (JRE) es installate sur tu computator.

In other platforms, you can modify <f3>Configuration.properties</f3> file on the Mac, or <f4>OmegaT</f4> launcher under Linux to do the same.
In altere platteformas, tu pote modificar le file <f3>Configuration.proprieties</f3> sur Mac, o le lanceator de <f4>OmegaT</f4> sub Linux pro facer le mesmo.
In other platforms, you can modify <f4>Configuration.properties</f4> file on the Mac, or <f5>OmegaT</f5> launcher under Linux to do the same.

In other words, "compatibility" is not only about products, but also about workflows.
In altere parolas, le "compatibilitate" es non solo re le productos, ma anque re le fluxos del labor.

In other words, if an OmegaT user finds a 100% match in a Level 2 OmegaT TMX file, it can be accepted without requiring adaptation, but the same would not be true for a Level 2 TMX file produced by a different CAT tool (or vice-versa).

In altere parolas, si un usator de OmegaT discoperi un concordantia al 100% in un file TMX Level 2 de OmegaT, on pote acceptar lo sin accommodation, ma le mesme non esserea ver pro un file TMX Level 2 producite per un application CAT differente (o vice versa).
In other words, when moving paired tags, ensure that both the opening and the closing tag are both either inside or outside other tag pairs, or the translated file may be corrupted and fail to open.

In altere parolas, quando tu move tags accopulate, assecurar te que tote le duo tags de apertura e de clausura son ambe o interior o externe al altere pares de tag, o le file rendite pote esser corrupte e faller a aperir se.
In paragraphs containing lots of formatting, restoring the deleted formatting can be quite a lot of work.
In le paragraphos continente multe formatos, le restauration del formatos delite pote resultar in un grande quantitate de labor.
In particular, if you are translating between two languages with different alphabets/writing systems (such as Russian and Japanese), select a font that can be used for both.
In particular, si tu rende inter duo linguas con alphabetos vel systemas de script differente (assi como russo e japonese), selige un typo de character que pote esser usate pro tote le duo.
In particular, the main user manual is likely to take around two weeks to translate, and several translators may wish to share the work.
In particular, le manual del usatores principal es verosimilante pro prender circa duo septimanas pro le traduction, e alcun traductores pote desiderar compartir le labor.

In practice, it is therefore possible for translators to deliver translation memories to customers and vice-versa, and for the recipient to use these files for immediate or future reference; if the files are to be used within an automated workflow, however, the constraint described above applies.

In practica, il es dunque possibile al traductores committer memorias de traduction al clientes e vice versa, e per le recipiente usar iste files pro immediate o futur referentia; si le files debe esser usate intra un fluxo de labor automatisate, comocunque, on applica le coercition precedente.

Il pote alsi esser possibile aperir un projecto OmegaT per duple-clic sur un file <f1>omegat.project</f1>.
It needs to be converted to a new team project, but this cannot be done in console mode.
Illo necessita esser convertite a un nove projecto de equipa, ma isto non pote ser facite in modo consola.
It only enables translators to generate (i.e. deliver) Trados uncleaned files.
Illo habilita solmente le traductores a generar (id es committer) files non mundate Trados.
It owes its origins to the use of MS Word as an interface for the Trados CAT tool.
Illo debe su origines al uso de MS Word como un interfacie pro le application CAT Trados.
It provides better fuzzy and glossary matches in OmegaT, by computing the roots ("stemming") of the source words.
Illo provide melior concordantias partial o del glossario, con le computation del radices ("cerca del stirpe") del parolas original.
It represents the complete filename of the source file, including the extension.
Isto representa le nomine complete del file de fonte, includente le extension.
It should be noted that when <a0>OmegaT</a0> is in RTL mode, both source and target are displayed in RTL mode.
Que on observa que quando <a0>OmegaT</a0> es in modo RTL, tote le duo, le fonte e le destination son monstrate in modo RTL.
It should be noted that when OmegaT is in RTL mode, both source and target are displayed in RTL mode.
Que on observa que quando OmegaT es in modo RTL, tote le duo, le fonte e le destination son monstrate in modo RTL.
It should be updated continually.
Illo deberea ser renovate continuemente
It should display the text with something approaching the final layout and formatting.
Illo deberea monstrar le texto con alco similante le arrangiamento e le formato final.
It should thus be carried out by a project manager, a project leader or a localisation engineer.
Lo deberea assi esser cunducite per un gestor de projecto, un leader de projecto o un ingeniero de localisation.
It shows translation of terms found in the current segment.
Illo monstra le traduction del terminos trovate in le segmento currente.
It was not possible to create the script folder inside the configuration folder.
Non esseva possibile crear le plica del script interne al plica de configuration.
It was not possible to create translated documents, because some tags are missing or damaged.
Il non ha essite possibile crear le documentos rendite, perque alicun tags es mancante o damnificate.
It will be created the first time you add an entry to the glossary.
Le file es create le prime vice tu adde un entrata in le glossario.
It will be used automatically by OmegaT if <g0>Options > Language Checker</g0> is checked.
Illo essera usate automaticamente ab OmegaT si <g0>Optiones > Corrector del lingua</g0> es marcate.
It will contain glossaries you will be using in the project.
Isto continera le glossarios que tu usara in le projecto.

It will first commit the current contents to the server repository and then update the local copy of the repository - i.e. the contents of .svn subfolder - so that it is up to date with the latest repository version.

Illo committera in prime loco le contentos currente al repositorio del servitor e pois actualisara le copia local del repositorio - id es le contentos del sub plica .svn - de maniera que illo es actualisate con le ultime version del repositorio.
It will however lack some of the features of the "Latest" version.
Illo tamen mancara de qualque characteristicas del version "Ultime".
It will install the correct environment for your computer and the application itself on the first run.
Illo installara le correcte ambiente pro tu computator e le application ipse al prime lanceamento.
It's a real eye-opener!
Illo es un real aperitor de oculos!

Mac OS X has a feature called Gatekeeper that increases security by making it difficult to run unsigned programs.
Mac OS X ha un functionalitate nominate Gatekeeper que accresce le securitate per render difficile facer fluer programmas non signate.
Mac OS X users can convert directly from Office Open XML to OpenDocument Format and back in <a0>NeoOffice</a0>.
Le usatores de Mac OS X pote converter directemente ab Office Open XML a OpenDocument Format e reverso in <a0>NeoOffice</a0>.
Mac OS X users, note: use <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> shortcut and <e4>not </e4>cmd+Ctrl+O.
Que le usatores de Mac OS X nota: usar le via breve <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> e <e4>non </e4>cmd+Ctrl+O.
Mac OS X users, note: use <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> shortcut and not <k4><k5>cmd</k5><k6>Ctrl</k6><k7>O</k7></k4>.
Que le usatores de Mac OS X nota: usar le via breve <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>+ O</k3> </k0> e non <k4><k5>Cmd</k5><k6>+Ctrl</k6><k7>+O</k7></k4>.
Mac OSX users should install tcl/tk from their system media and Linux users should find it in their distribution's repository, if it is not already installed by default.

Le usatores de Mac OSX deberea installar tcl/tk ex lor media de systema e le usatores de Linux deberea lo trovar in lor repositorio de distribution si illo non es ja installate per predisposition initial.
Mac users should instead use <k4> <k5>Cmd</k5> <k6>key</k6> </k4> instead.
Le usatores de Mac usa in su loco le <k4> <k5>Cmd</k5> <k6>key</k6> </k4>.
Mac users should instead use the <g2>cmd+key.</g2> On Apple keyboards the <g3>cmd</g3> key either has a command label or an Apple icon on it.
Le usatores de Mac usa in vice le <g2>cmd+key.</g2> Sur le clavieros Apple le clave <g3>cmd</g3> o ha sur illo un etiquetta command o un icone pomo.

Make sure that you have a free Microsoft account.
Face te secur que tu ha un conto gratuite Microsoft.
Make sure that you have a free Yandex account.
Face te secur que tu ha un conto gratuite Yandex.

Face secur te que tu configurationes PERCURSO es correcte e que le files .jar es associate debitemente con un lanceator de Java.<e2></e2><e3></e3>
Make sure that your <e3>PATH</e3> settings are correct and that <e4>.jar </e4> files are properly associated with a Java launcher.

Make sure that your <v1>PATH</v1> settings are correct and that <f2>.jar</f2> files are properly associated with a Java launcher.
Controla que tu configurationes del <v1>PATH</v1> es correcte e que le files <f2>.jar</f2> es associate debitemente con un lanceator Java.
Make sure that your <v2>PATH</v2> settings are correct and that <f3>.jar</f3> files are properly associated with a Java launcher.
Controla que tu parametros del <v2>PATH</v2> es correcte e que le files <f3>.jar</f3> es associate debitemente con un lanceator Java.
Make sure the field <e1>Checkout directory</e1> is correct, i.e. specifies the empty folder you have created, and press <e2>OK</e2>.

Note
Nota
Note <e0>interesar</e0> and<e1> navegar</e1> in Spanish, are correctly translated as the verbs interest and sail respectively.
Nota <e0>interesar</e0> e<e1> navegar</e1> in espaniol, son rendite correctemente como verbos interest e sail respectivemente.
Note about omegat.project and mappings
Nota re omegat.project e mappas
Note also that some fonts behave better for some language pairs than for others.
Nota alsi que alicun typo de character comportar se melio pro alicun pares de lingua que pro alteres.
Note double - character
Nota le duple - character

Note however that the numbers do not indicate how relevant the repetitions are: they could mean relatively long sentences repeated a number of times (in which case you are fortunate) or it could describe a table of keywords (not so fortunate).

Nota tamen que le numeros non indica ut pertinente es le repetitiones: illos poterea significar phrases relativemente longe repetite plure vices (in le qual caso tu es fortunate) o illo poterea describer un tabula de parolas clave (non assi fortunate).
Note however that:
Nota totevia que:
Note that '*' and '?' have special meaning in regular expressions, so wild card search, as described here, applies to exact and keyword search only (see below).
Nota que '*' e '?' ha significato special in le expressiones regular, assi le recerca con carta salvage, ut describite ci, refere se al exacte e recerca parola clave solmente (vide in sequito).
Note that <f0>Remove</f0> physically removes the selected vocabularies.
Nota que <f0>Remove</f0> elimina physicamente le vocabularios seligite.
Note that <g0>Remove</g0> physically removes the selected vocabularies.
Nota que <g0>Remove</g0> elimina physicamente le vocabularios seligite.
Note that <l0>after</l0> is empty
Note que <l0>after</l0> es vacue
Note that Google Translate service is not free of charge, see chapter <l1>Installing and Running</l1> (runtime parameters) for more on that.
Nota que le servicio Google Translate non es gratuite, vide le capitulo <l1>Installar e exequer</l1> (parametros runtime) pro plus sur isto.
Note that all parameters start with a double - character.
Nota que omne parametros initia con un character - duple.
Note that all parameters start with a double <l0>-</l0> character.
Nota que tote le parametros initia con un duple character <l0>-</l0>.
Note that all the tmx files in the /tm repository are parsed when the project is opened, so putting all different TMs you may have on hand into this folder may unnecessarily slow OmegaT down.

Nota que tote le files TMX in le repositorio /tm es analysate quando le projecto es aperite, assi tu, ponente tote le varie TMs que tu pote haber per manos in iste plica, pote inutilemente retardar OmegaT.
Note that all the translation memories are loaded into memory when the project is opened.
Nota que tote le memorias de traduction son cargate in memoria quando le projecto es aperte.
Note that bug reports and requests for enhancements are publicly visible, so you should not add any sensitive files.
Nota que le reportos de defecto e le demandas pro incrementos functional es publicamente visibile, assi tu non deberea adder alicun files sensibile.
Note that changes to the project setup may have some consequences, especially, when the project has already been started.
Nota que le cambios al preparationes del projecto pote haber alicun consequentias, specialmente quando le projecto esseva jam initiate.
Note that default segmentation rules and file filters can be overridden by project-specific setup (see above).
Nota que le regulas de segmentation base e le filtros de file pote esser superscribite per configurationes specific del projecto (vide supra).

Note that even after Word's settings have been changed so that it does not insert "nuisance" codes, for example for auto-hyphenation, such codes may still be present in the file and not removed by the change in configuration.

Nota que mesmo post que le configurationes de Word esseva cambiate de maniera que illos non insereva codices "enoiose", per exemplo pro le auto syllabation, tal codices pote ancora esser presente in le file e non removite per le cambio in le configuration.
Note that if you need or wish to use any of the launch command arguments (see above), you must use the normal installation.
Nota que si tu necessita o desidera usar omne argumentos del commando de lanceamento (vide supra), tu debe usar le installation normal.
Note that if you use the demonstration version of Iceni Infix in this procedure, your translated PDF file will bear an Iceni watermark.
Nota que si tu usa le version demonstration de Iceni Infix in iste procedura, tu file PDF rendite suffrera del filigrana Iceni.
Note that in Windows you can change the <f2>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f2> file to reflect your preferences.
Nota que in Windows tu pote cambiar le file <f2>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f2> pro reflecter tu preferentias.
Note that in Windows you can change the <f3>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f3> file to reflect your preferences.
Nota que in Windows tu pote cambiar le file <f3>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f3> pro reflecter tu preferentias.
Note that in addition to "source-target" dictionaries you can, using the Dictionary feature, obtain access to information such as:
Nota que in plus al dictionarios "fonte-destination" tu pote obtener, con le function Dictionario, accesso a informationes como:
Note that in some cases changes in file filters in <a1>OmegaT</a1> may lead to totally different segmentation; as a result, you will have to upgrade your translation manually in such rare cases.

Nota que in alicun casos le cambios in le filtros de file in <a1>OmegaT</a1> pote ducer a segmentation totalmente differente; in consequentia, tu debera promover tu traduction manualmente in tal rar casos.
Note that in the above case, this is just half (or even less) of the story, as the target language (Slovenian) uses declension.
Nota que in le exemplo precedente, isto es justo le medietate (o mesmo minus) del labor, pois que le lingua final (sloveno) usa le declination.
Note that in the menu <g2>Options->File Filters</g2>, the global user filters are changed, not the project filters.
Nota que in le menu <g2>Optiones->Filtros de File</g2>, son cambiate le filtros global del usator, non le filtros del projecto.
Note that it is easy to install multiple versions of OmegaT on Linux without conflicts.
Nota que il es facile installar versiones multiple de OmegaT sur Linux sin conflictos.
Note that nothing but your source segment is sent to the MT service.
Nota que sol tu segmento fonte es expedite al servicio de Traduction Automatic.
Note that only one TMX for a given language pair is possible, so if several translation memories should be involved, you will need to merge them all into the XX_YY.tmx.
Nota que sol un TMX pro un date par de linguas es possibile, ergo si deberea implicar plure memorias de traduction, tu necessitara funder los omne in le XX_YY.tmx.
Note that only two files are modified by OmegaT during translation:
Nota que solo duo files es modificate per OmegaT durante le traduction:
Note that other CAT tools can export (and import as well) tmx files, usually in all three forms.
Nota que altere instrumentos CAT pote exportar (e importar) files tmx, habitualmente in tote le tres formas.
Note that the "Install" function requires an Internet connection.
Nota que le function "Installa" necessita un connexion a Internet.
Note that the TMX files in the <f0>tm</f0> folder can be compressed with gzip.
Nota que le le files TMX in le plica <f0>tm</f0> pote esser comprimite con gzip.
Note that the TMX files in the tm folder can be compressed with gzip.
Nota que le le files TMX in le plica tm pote esser comprimite con gzip.
Note that the creator of the repository has implicitly the administrator rights for the repository created.
Nota: le creator del repositorio ha implicitemente le privilegios de administrator pro le repositorio create.
Note that the key is 38 characters long.
Note que le clave es longe 38 characteres.
Note that the omegat.project file in the repository is not changed automatically and still doesn't contain the mappings.
Nota que le file omegat.project in le repositorio non es cambiate automaticamente e ancora non contine le mappas.
Note that the opening tag must always come before the corresponding closing tag:
Nota que le tag de apertura debe semper venir ante que le tag de clausura correspondente:
Note that the structure of the source subfolder may take any form you like.
Nota que le structura del sub plicas in le sub plica /source poter sumer qualcunque forma tu vole.
Note that the team members have to be registered first, before you can add them to the project (Note: in the free version of ProjectLocker you are allowed only two users per project).
Nota que le membros del equipa debe esser registrate antea, ante que tu pote adder illes al projecto (Nota: in le version gratuite de ProjectLocker on es permittite sol duo usatores per projecto).
Note that there could be minor differences between the OmegaT counts and the numbers, provided by other CAT tools.
Nota que es possibile minor differentias inter le contos de OmegaT e le numeros fornite per altere applicationes CAT.
Note that these totals are a good (or as good as they can be) approximation of the work involved in the project and thus can serve as a basis for your cost and price calculations.
Nota que iste totales es un bon (o bon a mesura il pote esser) approximation del labor implicate in le projecto e assi pote servir como base pro le calculationes de tu costo e precio.
Note that they are all web-based: you will have to be on-line if you want to use them.
Nota que illos es omne basate sur le web: tu debera esser on-line si tu vole usar los.
Note that this is not the same as "deleting" the formatting, which would cause the character formatting to revert to the document's default.
Nota que isto non es le identic a "cancellar" le formato, le qual causarea le retorno al formato base del character del documento.
Note that this will of course check for the standard (Castillian) rather than for Mexican Spanish.
Nota que illo naturalmente controlara pro le Standard plus tosto que pro le Espaniol Mexicano!)
Note that up to 2M characters per month are free of charge.
Nota que usque 2M characteres per mense son gratuite.
Note that you can reassign the shortcuts to your own preferences.
Nota que tu pote re-assignar le Vias breve a tu preferentias personal.
Note that you segments from order1, that are not present in order2 and other subsequent jobs, will be tagged as orphan segments; however, they will still be useful for getting fuzzy matches.
Nota que tu segmenta ex order1, illo non es presente in order2 e altere obras subsequente, essera taggate como segmentos orphane; comocunque, illos essera ancora utile pro concordantias partial.
Note that you will need the ant program (<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>) to build your own version of OmegaT.
Nota que tu necessitara le programma ant (<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>) pro construer tu proprie version de OmegaT.
Note the double <l2>-</l2> character.
Nota que le character duple <l2>-</l2>.
Note the double <l5>-</l5> character.
Nota que le character duple <l5>-</l5>.
Note:
Nota:
Note: <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Enter</k2> </k0> is an alternate shortcut if <l3>Use TAB to Advance</l3> option is not selected.
Nota: <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Enter</k2> </k0> es un via-breve alternative si non es seligite le option <l3>Usar TAB pro facer avantiar</l3>.
Note: <k0>Enter</k0> is an alternate shortcut if <l1>Use TAB to Advance</l1> option is not selected.
Nota: <k0>Insere</k0> es un via-breve alternative si le option <l1>Usa TAB pro Facer progreder</l1> option non es activate.
Note: All of the segmentation rule sets with a matching Language Pattern are applied in the given order.
Nota: tote le configurationes del regula de segmentation con un schema de lingua concordante es applicate in le arrangiamento date.

Note: DocBook files are recognized not only by file extension, but they also must have a DOCTYPE declaration: <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML... for DocBook 4, or a Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" for DocBook 5

Nota: le files DocBook es recognite non solmente con le extension del file, ma illos alsi debe haber un declaration DOCTYPE: <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML... per DocBook 4, o un Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" per DocBook 5
Note: If the project was created with the command line in step 3, this step has already been done by the program.
Nota: si le projecto ha essite create con le linea de commando al passo 3, iste passo ha jam essite facite per le programma.
Note: Items that are found in most applications (copy/cut/paste) are not displayed in this menu, but are available using your system shortcuts.
Nota: le commandos trovate in le plus parte del applicationes (copia, talia, colla) non es monstrate in iste menu, ma es disponibile usante le vias breve del systema.
Note: OmegaT does not interact dynamically with them (you must export/import TMX files manually).
Nota: OmegaT non interage dynamicamente con illes (tu debe exportar/importar manualmente le files TMX).

Note: OmegaT's Infix filter maps the
of Infix to tags.

Nota: le filtro Infix de OmegaT mappa le tags
de Infix in tags .
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HHC and HHK files that do not contain an encoding declaration.
Nota: le configuration del codification del file fonte affice solmente le files HHC e HHK que non contine un declaration de codification.
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HTML files that have no encoding declaration inside.
Nota: le arrangiamento del codification del file fonte affice solmente le files HTML que non contine declaration de codification.
Note: colors are customizable through the <g0>Options / Custom colours...</g0> dialog.
Nota: le colores es personalisabile per le fenestra de dialogo <g0>Optiones / Colores personal...</g0>.
Note: filenames (in first column) can be sorted alphabetically by clicking in the header.
Nota: le nomines de file (in le prime columna) pote ser ordinate alphabeticamente cliccante in le titulo.
Note: if TMX is removed from /tm/auto before step 3, no extra Translation Unit is added.
Nota: si le TMX es removite ab le plica /tm/auto ante le grado 3, nulle unitate de traduction extra es addite.
Note: if TMX is removed from /tm/enforce before step 3, enforcements aren't kept at all.
Nota: si TMX es removite ab /tm/enforce ante le grado 3, le fortiamentos non essera mantenite del toto.
Note: if TMX is removed from <f0>tm/auto</f0> before step 3, no extra Translation Unit is added.
Nota: si le TMX es removite ab le plica <f0>/tm/auto</f0> ante le grado 3, nulle unitate de traduction extra es addite.
Note: if TMX is removed from <f0>tm/enforce</f0> before step 3, enforcements aren't kept at all.
Nota: si TMX es removite ab <f0>/tm/enforce</f0> ante le grado 3, le fortiamentos non essera mantenite del toto.
Note: in that case, <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1> can still be used, to force a Machine Translation call on an already translated segment.
Nota: in ille caso, <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1> pote ancora esser usate, pro fortiar un appello al traduction automatic sur un segmento ja rendite.
Note: not all filters allow you to select an encoding.
Nota: non omne filtros permitte te de selectionar un codification.
Note: on Windows it seems that this manual font fallback mechanism can interfere with standard font fallback, causing undesirable font substitution.
Nota: sur Windows sembla que iste mechanismo de reserva del typo de characteres manual pote interferer con le reserva standard, causante non desirabile substitution del typo de characteres.
Note: the <f0>.tbx</f0> output of MultiTerm seems to not be reliable (November 2013), it is better to use the <f1>.tab</f1> output of MultiTerm instead.
Notar: le output in formato <f0>.tbx</f0> de MultiTerm non simila esser digne de fide (November 2013), il es in vice melio a usar le output formato <f1>.tab</f1> de MultiTerm.
Note: the segment marker displays <l0><segment nnnn+yymore> when the segment is non-unique.
Nota: le marcator del segmento monstra <l0><segmento nnnn+yyplus> quando le segmento es non-unic.
Note: these two instructions can be combined by writing <u0>(<.*?>)|(\d+)</u0>.
Nota: iste duo instructiones pote esser combinate scribente <u0>(<.*?>)|(\d+)</u0>.

Notas

Nihil a dicer contra le uso de Notepad++ sur Windows, GEdit sur Linux per exemplo o alicun programma de folio de calculo (per exemplo OpenOffice Calc) pro iste proposito: omne application, que pote tractar UTF8 e (o UTF-16 LE) que pote monstrar spatio blanc (de maniera que tu non perde le character <k1>TAB</k1> ) pote esser utilisate.

nihil, sed termina le citation initiate per \Q

OmegaT automatically chose the 'Yes' option.
OmegaT seligeva automaticamente le option 'Si'.
OmegaT automatically detects glossary files in this folder when a project is opened.
OmegaT releva automaticamente le files glossario in iste plica quando on aperi un projecto.
OmegaT automatically saves translations every 10 minutes as well as when you close the project or quit OmegaT.
OmegaT automaticamente salva le traductiones cata 10 minutas e quando tu claude tu projecto o tu quita OmegaT.
OmegaT automatically saves translations every 3 minutes as well as when you close the project or quit OmegaT.
OmegaT automaticamente salva le traductiones cata 3 minutas e quando tu claude tu projecto o tu quita OmegaT.
OmegaT automatically selects a tokenizer for the source and the target language according to the language settings of the project.
