OmegaT can align Java .properties in console mode.
OmegaT pote alinear le .properties di Java in modo consola.

OmegaT pote alsi controlar le variabiles de programmation (variabiles de function printf) como '%s'.

OmegaT pote automaticamente crear nove nomines de files pro le files que tu crea, per adder un codice de lingua o un marca de tempore, per exemplo.
OmegaT can check that programming variables (like %s for instance) in the source exist in the translation.
OmegaT pote controlar que le variabiles de programmation (como %s per exemplo) existe in le fonte in le traduction.
OmegaT can generate and store a master password so you don't have to enter it each time, but this is much less secure.
OmegaT pote generar e registrar un contrasigno principal assi tu non ha a inserer illo cata vice, ma isto es multo minus secur.

OmegaT glossary files are simple plain text files containing three-column lists, with the source term in the first column, an optional target term in the second column, and an optional comment in the third column.

Le formato del files glossario es le texto simple de tres columnas, con le terminos fonte in le prime columna, le terminos de destination (facultative) in le secunde columna e commentos (facultative) in le tertie columna.

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects. (OmegaT es un application gratuite de Traduction Assistite per le Computator (CAT), multe-platteforma con concordantia partial, recerca per parola clave, glossarios, e fruition del traductiones in le actualisation del projectos)

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.

OmegaT es un application gratuite de Traduction Assistite per le Computator (CAT), multe-platteforma con concordantia partial, recerca per parola clave, glossarios, e fruition del traductiones in le actualisation del projectos.
OmegaT is a free, open-source translation memory program.
OmegaT es un programma gratuite pro memoria de traduction, open-source.
OmegaT is a robust application.
OmegaT es un application robuste.
OmegaT is able to recognize that you have done this.
OmegaT pote recognoscer que tu ha facite isto.
OmegaT is able to store translations that are identical to the source.
OmegaT es capabile de registrar traductiones que es identic al texto primari.

OmegaT is alsi capabile de leger glossarios in TBX, le formato standard del industria pro files glossario.
OmegaT is among the CAT tools for which this process can be used.
OmegaT es un application CAT pro le qual iste processo pote esser utilisate.

OmegaT es un application e un projecto open-source.

OmegaT es disponibile impacchettate con un Oracle Java JRE pro platteformas Linux (Intel x86) e Windows.
OmegaT is available under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
OmegaT is available under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
OmegaT is capable of handling the current Microsoft Office formats directly, without conversion to or from other formats.
OmegaT sape tractar le actual formatos de Microsoft Office directemente, sin conversion verso o a partir de altere formatos.
OmegaT is free software.
OmegaT es un software gratuite.

OmegaT is generally observant of the conditions and tolerant of other tools' failure to observe them; should problems arise here, however, they can generally be resolved fairly easily by a search & replace in a text editor of the illegal character in the TMX file.

OmegaT generalmente observa le conditiones del alteres applicationes e tolera lor fallimentos de los observar; problemas que deberea levar se hic, tamen, pote generalmente esser resolute assatis facilemente con un recerca & reimplacia in un editor de texto del character illegal in le file TMX.

OmegaT non es particularmente difficile a installar o usar, ma illo require bon voluntate pro leger e sequer le instructiones.

OmegaT will now run on the OpenJDK Java implementation supplied with some Linux distributions, but some functions (such as the full set of command-line options) may not be available; a different font set may be supplied; and some glitches have been reported, such as with window display and the segmentation function.

OmegaT recognoscera que illo es un projecto in equipa, e synchronisara omne cosa automaticamente, tote le tres minutas, per arrangiamento base.
OmegaT will run on any system on which the appropriate JRE (Java Runtime Environment) has been or can be installed.
OmegaT fluera sur ulle systema sur que le appropriate JRE (Java Runtime Environment) ha essite o pote ser installate.
OmegaT will then copy the selected files to the <f2>/source/</f2> subfolder of your newly created project.
Tunc OmegaT copiara le files seligite in le sub-plica <f2>/source/</f2> de tu nove projecto.
OmegaT will then copy the selected files to the <f2>source</f2> subfolder of your newly created project.
Tunc OmegaT copiara le files seligite in le sub-plica <f2>/source/</f2> de tu nove projecto.
OmegaT will then omit the appropriate files while loading projects, and will copy them unmodified when creating target documents.
OmegaT omittera alora le files appropriate durante le cargamento del projectos, e copiara los identic quando creara le documentos rendite.

tu.note: Es isto correcte? Creante o quando creante? Discute con Carmelo.

tuv.seg: OmegaT will then omit the corresponding files when loading projects, and will copy them unmodified to the <f0>target</f0> folder when creating target documents.
OmegaT pois omittera le correspondente files quando carga projectos e los copiara non modificate al <f0>plica de destination</f0> creante le documentos de destination.
OmegaT will then omit the corresponding files when loading projects, and will copy them unmodified to the target folder when creating target documents.
OmegaT pois omittera le correspondente files quando carga projectos e los copiara non modificate al plica de destination creante le documentos de destination.
OmegaT will then report these segments as not translated.
OmegaT reportara ergo iste segmentos como non rendite.
OmegaT will try to resegment the TMX file...
OmegaT essayara a segmentar de novo le file TMX...
OmegaT will usually run on any Linux system on which a suitable version of the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) can be be installed.
OmegaT essera habitualmente exequite sur omne le systema Linux sur le qual pote esser installate un convenibile version del Java Runtime Environment (JRE).
OmegaT {0} is now available.
OmegaT {0} es ora disponibile.
OmegaT's developers, who are all volunteers, may be more willing to implement an RFE if the development work is funded by the requester.
Le disveloppatores de OmegaT, qui es tote voluntarios, pote ser plus ben disponibile a implementar un RFE si le labor de disveloppamento es financiate per le requirente.
OmegaT's distribution license.
Le licentia de distribution de OmegaT.
OmegaT's executable.
Le file executabile de OmegaT.
OmegaT's glossary files are plain-text files in the format:
Le files glossario de OmegaT es files de texto simple in le formato:
OmegaT's one-to-many matching function first assumes that identical segments are to be translated in the same way.
Le function de concordantia uno-a-plures de OmegaT in prime loco assume que segmentos identic debe esser rendite in le mesme maniera.
OmegaT, however, will present this sentence in the following fashion:
OmegaT, comocunque, presentara iste phrase in le sequente maniera:

Sur le scheda Disveloppator, clicca sur Registrar macro.

Sur le Mac, le modificator <e0>meta</e0> debe esser utilisate pro specificar le clave <e1>commando</e1>.
On the other hand this functionality can be very useful in special cases, where you can increase your productivity by tuning the segmentation rules to the text to be translated.
Al altere latere iste functionalitate pote esser multo utile in casos particular, ubi tu pote accrescer tu productivitate accordante le regulas de segmentation al texto a traducer.
On the ribbon, check Show Developer tab and confirm with OK.
Sur le "banda", pulsa le linguetta "Monstra disveloppator" e confirma lo con OK.
On this, select:

On warn the errors are printed but the program continues.
Si le valor es warn alora le errores son imprimite, ma OmegaT continua.
Once <a0>OmegaT</a0> is installed, you can click on <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> to launch it directly or you can launch it directly from the command line.
Un vice que <a0>OmegaT</a0> es installate, pro lancear lo directemente, on pote cliccar sur <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> o on pote usar le linea de commando.
Once <a0>OmegaT</a0> is installed, you can click on <f1>OmegaT.jar</f1> to launch it directly or you can launch it directly from the command line.

Once <a0>OmegaT</a0> is installed, you can launch it directly from the command line, you can create a script that includes launch parameters for the command line or you can click on <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> to launch it directly.

Un vice que <a0>OmegaT</a0> es installate, tu pote lancear lo directemente ex le linea de commando, tu pote crear un script que include le parametros de lanceamento pro le linea de commando o tu pote cliccar sur <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> pro lancear lo directemente.

Once <a0>OmegaT</a0> is installed, you can launch it directly from the command line, you can create a script that includes launch parameters for the command line or you can click on <f1>OmegaT.jar</f1> to launch it directly.

Un vice que <a0>OmegaT</a0> es installate, tu pote lancear lo directemente per linea de commando, tu pote crear un script que include parametros de lanceamento pro le linea de commando o tu pote cliccar sur <f1>OmegaT.jar</f1> pro lancear lo directemente.

Once Auto-completer is open, use <e1>Ctrl+Space</e1> again to switch successively from <e2>Glossaries entries</e2>, <e3>Auto-text entries,</e3> <e4>Missing tags</e4> and <e5>Character table</e5> options.

Un vice que le cassa de dialogo pro auto-completar es aperte, usa <e1>Ctrl+Space</e1> ancora pro cambiar successivemente inter le optiones <e2>Entratas de glossarios</e2>, <e3>Entratas de texto automatic,</e3> <e4>Tags mancante</e4> e <e5>Tabella del characteres</e5>.
Once OmegaT is installed, you can click on <f0>OmegaT.jar</f0> to launch it directly or you can launch it directly from the command line.
Un vice que OmegaT es installate, tu pote cliccar sur <f0>OmegaT.jar</f0> pro lancear lo directemente o lancear lo per linea de commando.

tu.note: "Once" non equala "un vice" in iste contexto, sed illo significa "quando".

tuv.seg: Once OmegaT is installed, you can launch it directly from the command line, you can create a script that includes launch parameters for the command line or you can click on <f0>OmegaT.jar</f0> to launch it directly.

Quando OmegaT es installate, tu pote lancear lo directemente per linea de commando, tu pote crear un script que include parametros de lanceamento pro le linea de commando o tu pote cliccar sur <f0>OmegaT.jar</f0> pro lancear lo directemente.
Once Priorview has been launched, however, you cannot select a different browser or conversion utility; these options are therefore hidden after launch.
Un vice que Priorview esseva lanceate, comocunque, tu non pote seliger un lector del tela differente o un utilitate de conversion; iste optiones in consequentia es occulte post le lanceamento.
Once a user has formulated a proposed change or enhancement to OmegaT, a defined procedure exists for its submission to the development team for consideration.
Quando un usator propone un cambio o un melioration a OmegaT, il ha un procedura definite pro lor submission al team de disveloppamento pro los reguardar.

Once computed, the data also available in <f6>omegat/project_stats_match.txt.</f6> Note that the file is time-stamped, as the calculation (contrary to the standard statistics) is not instantaneous and can thus quickly become obsolete.

Un vice computate, le data es alsi disponibile in <f6>omegat/project_stats_match.txt.</f6> Nota que le file es annotate con le tempores, pois que le calculo (contrarimente al statisticas standard) non es instantanee e pote assi rapidemente devenir obsolete.
Once the <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> file is modified, <a1>OmegaT</a1> must be relaunched to take the new shortcuts into account.
Un vice que le file <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> es modificate, <a1>OmegaT</a1> debe esser reinitiate pro prender in conto le nove vias breve.

tu.note: Traducite per W Helton Mer. 05 Januario 2022

tuv.seg: Once the <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> file is modified, OmegaT must be relaunched to take the new shortcuts into account.
Poste le file <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> es modificate, OmegaT debe esser reinitiate pro prender in conto le nove vias breve.
Once the SVN server is available, project managers must locally install a SVN client, in order to manage the project contents on their computers.
Un vice que le servitor SVN es disponibile, le administratores del projecto debe installar localmente un client SVN, pro gerer le contentos del projecto sur lor computatores.

Un vice que le archivo esseva extrahite, es create un plica continente le contentos sequente:

Un vice que le codice es discargate, aperi un commando in le plica /source e scribe:

Un vice que le operation ha finite, tu pote controlar le plica mentionate: illo deberea ora continer un sub plica .svn e un placa OK verde sur su icone monstrara que le contentos del plica son renovate:
Once the project has been opened, translation proceeds in the same way as for a non-team project, except the following points.
Un vice que le projecto ha essite aperite, le traduction procede in le mesme maniera como pro un projecto non de equipa, a exception del sequente punctos.
Once the project is set up on the server, the project manager can invite the translator to work on it in either of two different ways:
Un vice que le projecto es definite sur le servitor, le gestor de projecto pote invitar le traductor a laborar sur illo in duo differente manieras:
Once the team project is setup, team members only need <a0>OmegaT</a0> to access the team project.
Un vice que le projecto in equipa es preparate, le membros del equipa debe solo acceder al projecto in equipa con <a0>OmegaT</a0>.

Once this has been copied or linked to your execution path (done automatically if you use the installation script provided), you can launch OmegaT by hitting <i0>Alt+F2</i0>, then typing in <i1>omegat</i1> and conforming with ENTER.

Un vice que isto esseva copiate o ligate a tu percurso de execution (facite automaticamente si tu usa le script de installation fornite), tu pote lancear OmegaT per le <i0>Alt+F2</i0>, pois scribente <i1>omegat</i1> e confirmante con ENTER.
Once you have activated the service, a suggestion for the translation will appear in the Machine Translate pane every time a new source segment is opened.
Un vice que tu ha activate le servicio, un suggestion pro le traduction apparera in le quadro del Traduction Automatic cata vice un nove segmento fonte es aperte.
Once you have done this, you can delete the <e5>OmegaT_3.n.n_Mac.zip</e5> file, it is no longer needed.
Un vice que tu ha exequite lo, tu pote deler le file <e5>OmegaT_3.n.n_Mac.zip</e5>, illo non necessita plus.
Once you have done this, you can delete the <f4>OmegaT_4.n.n_Mac.zip</f4> file, it is no longer needed.
Un vice que tu ha exequite isto, tu pote deler le file <f4>OmegaT_4.n.n_Mac.zip</f4>, illo non servi plus.
Once you have installed either Abiword or the LibreOffice+Unoconv combination, you can convert the target files produced by OmegaT to html format in order for them to be read by the browser.

Un vice que tu ha installate o Abiword o le combination de LibreOffice+Unoconv, tu pote converter le files de destination producite per OmegaT al formato html in arrangiamento pro que los es legite per le navigator web.

Once you have made certain that there are no tag errors in your translation, press <k0><k1>Ctrl</k1><k2>D</k2></k0> to generate the target files, which will be created in the <f3>target</f3> subfolder of your project folder.

Un vice que tu es certe que non ha nulle errores de tags in tu traduction, que tu pulsa <k0><k1>Ctrl+</k1><k2>D</k2></k0> pro generar tu file final, le qual essera create in le sub plica <f3>/target/</f3> del plica de tu projecto.

On poterea solo meraviliar se, de quante prepositiones esserea ancora perdite sin su inestimabile auxilio.

Un membro del equipa, le administrator del projecto, besonia de cognoscer le tractamento del latere del servitor, id es le labor re le preparation del ambiente, como importar le projecto OmegaT, como assignar le derecto de accesso pro le membros del equipa, como resolver le conflictos et cetera.<t13/>.

Other file formats
Altere formatos del files

Other formatted text file types may also be handled by OmegaT by associating their file extensions to a supported file type, assuming that the corresponding segmentation rules will segment them correctly.

Altere typos de file de texto formattate pote alsi esser tractate per OmegaT con lor extension associate al typo de file supportate, e con le regulas de segmentation correspondente OmegaT segmentara los correctemente.
Other operating systems (Linux, OS X) offer similar packages.
Altere systemas operative (Linux, OS X) offere pacchettos simile.

Other plain text file types can be handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0> by associating their file extension to a supported file type (for example, .pod files can be associated to the ASCII text filter) and by pre-processing them with specific segmentation rules.

Altere typos de file in formato texto simple pote esser tractate per <a0>OmegaT</a0> con lor extension associate al typo de file supportate (exempli gratia, le files .pod pote esser associate al filtro de texto ASCII) e con lor pre-processo per regulas de segmentation specific.
Other plain text or formatted text file formats suitable for processing in OmegaT may also exist.
Altere formatos del file texto simple o texto formattate commode pro lor processo in OmegaT pote alsi exister.
Other translations, identified specifically in the TMX, can be displayed using different colours.
Altere traductiones, identificate specificamente in le memorias TMX, pote esser monstrate con colores differente.
Other users are advised to use the <a0>Okapi Filters Plugin</a0> instead.
Altere usatores es in vice avisate a usar le <a0>Plugin Okapi Filters</a0>.
Other windows
Altere fenestras
Otherwise, OmegaT will use the language of the operating system.
Alteremente, OmegaT usara le lingua del systema operative.

Paragraph delimitation
Delimitation de paragrapho
Paragraph delimitation format:
Formato de delimitation de paragrapho:

Paragraph segmentation is advantageous in certain cases, such as highly creative or stylistic translations in which the translator may wish to change the order of entire sentences; for the majority of projects, however, sentence segmentation is a choice to be preferred, since it delivers better matches from previous translations.

Le segmentation a paragrapho es avantagiose in certe casos, assi como traductiones multo creative o stilistic in le qual le traductor pote desiderar de cambiar le ordine de phrases integre; pro le majoritate del projectos, comocunque, le segmentation a phrase es un selection a preferer, pois que illo delivra concordantias melior ex traductiones previe.
Paragraph segmentation is less frequently used, but can be useful in cases of so-called "creative" texts.
Le segmentation basate sur paragraphos es usate minus frequentemente, ma pote esser utile in casos del textos si-nominate "creative".
Paragraph segmentation on line breaks, empty lines or never:

Plain text

Plain text files
Files de texto simple
Plain text files - in most cases files with a txt extension - contain just textual information and offer no clearly defined way to inform the computer which language they contain.

Files de texto simple - in le major parte del casos le files con un extension txt - contine justo information textual e non offere alicun modo definite clarmente pro informar le computator re su proprie linguage.
Plain text files contain text only, so their translation is as simple as typing the translation.
Le files de texto simple contine solmente texto, assi lor traduction es simple como dactylographar le traduction.
Plain text glossaries can be "tab separated values" (TSV) files or "comma separated values" (CSV) files.

Le clic dextre sur un nomine de file aperi un popup que consenti aperir le file fonte e (si illo existe) le file de destination.

Should you wish to reuse a translation memory from a previous project (for example because the new project is similar to the previous project, or uses terminology which might have been used before), you can use these translation memories as "input translation memories", i.e. for import into your new project.

Since it is a standard, an advantage of XLIFF is that file filters provided by one CAT tool vendor for conversion between a certain format and XLIFF (and, following completion of the translation workflow, back again) can in theory be used to prepare files in the format concerned for translation in any CAT tool capable of supporting XLIFF.

Pois que il es un standard, un avantage de XLIFF es que le filtros de file supplite per un venditor da applicationes CAT pro le conversion inter un certe formato e XLIFF (e, post le completamento del fluxo de labor del traduction, ancora al reverso) pote in theoria ser usate pro preparar files in le formato concernite pro traduction in qualcunque application CAT que supporta XLIFF.
Since it is standard procedure for professional translators to receive and deliver texts in digital form, users of OmegaT are naturally interested in its compatibility with other software products.

Pois que il es procedura standard pro le traductores professional reciper e committer textos in forma digital, le usatores de OmegaT es naturalmente interessate a lor compatibilitate con altere productos software.
Since tags are included in the text itself, it is possible to use segmentation rules to create segments with fewer tags.
Desde le tags es includite in le ipse texto, il es possibile usar le regulas de segmentation pro crear segmentos con minus tags.

Since these are inconvenient during translation, it is worthwhile trying to remove these nuisance tags before beginning translation in OmegaT.

Some CAT tools solve this problem, at least for MS Word, by working within Word itself; most other CAT tools convert to RTF and back, often invisibly for the translator.

Alicun applicationes CAT solve iste problema, al minus pro MS Word, per functionar intra Word ipse; le major parte del altere applicationes CAT converte in RTF e reverso, sovente in modo invisibile al traductor.
Some CAT tools still employ dedicated proprietary translation memory formats, but virtually all support the import and export of TMX files.
Alicun applicationes CAT ancora emplea formatos memoria de traduction dedicate proprietari, ma virtualmente omnes supporta le importation e le exportation de files TMX.
Some CAT tools, notably TRADOS, are able to import a wide range of file formats, including desktop publishing formats, and to prepare them for translation in the tool concerned.

Alicun applicationes CAT, remarcabilemente TRADOS, es capabile a importar un large scala de formatos de file, includente formatos de desktop publishing, e a preparar illos pro le traduction in le application concernite.
Some additional scripts can be found here: <u0>OmegaT Scripts</u0>
On pote trovar additional scriptes ci: <u0>OmegaT Scripts</u0>
Some alignments still need review.
Alcun alineamentos necessita ancora de revision.
Some applications require some Unicode literals to be kept.
Alicun applicationes requere que alicun literales Unicode esser retenite.
Some devices are designed to deny users access to install or run modified versions of the software inside them, although the manufacturer can do so.
Some devices are designed to deny users access to install or run modified versions of the software inside them, although the manufacturer can do so.
Some filters provide a <g0>Options...</g0> button to further customize their settings.
Alicun filtros forni un <g0>Optiones...</g0> button pro un additional personalisation de lor configurationes.
Some inconvenient line breaks may be required for correct positioning of the text.
Alicun incommode interruptiones de linea pote esser necesse pro le positionamento correcte del texto.
Some of the dictionaries have no strings attached - i.e. are "Free to use", and others, like the selection above, are under the GPL license.
Alicun del dictionarios non ha series attaccate - id es lor uso es "gratuite", e altere, como le selection supra, es sub Le licentia GPL.
Some of the file formats, specialized for translation work, for instance PO, allow the inclusion of comments.
Alcun del Formatos del files, specialisate pro le labor de traduction, per exemplo PO, permitte le inclusion de commentos.

Some other CAT tools are able to import and export glossary files in this format, or in a similar plain-text format which can be produced from it very easily (for example by a search & replace operation in Microsoft Word).

Alicun altere applicationes CAT es capabile de importar e exportar files glossario in iste formato, o in un formato de texto simple simile que pote esser producite per illos multo facilemente (per exemplo per un operation recercar & reimplaciar in Microsoft Word).
Some preferences do not have an equivalent in the user interface.
Alicun preferentias non ha un equivalente in le interfacie de usator.
Some project folders seem to have been moved.
Alicun plicas del projecto pare movite.
Some shortcuts involve other keys.
Alcun vias breve implica altere claves.
Some supported filters: ILIAS Language File, Java(TM) Resource Bundles, Key=Value Text, Magento CE Locale CSV, MoodlePHP, Mozilla DTD, Mozilla FTL, PO, RC, SubRip Subtitles, Windows Resources
Alcun filtros supportate: ILIAS Language File, Java(TM) Resource Bundles, Key=Value Text, Magento CE Locale CSV, MoodlePHP, Mozilla DTD, Mozilla FTL, PO, RC, SubRip Subtitles, Windows Resources
Some tag manipulations are necessary and are benign, others will cause problems when the translated document is created.
Alicun manipulationes de tag es necessari e es benigne, alteres producera problemas quando essera create le documento rendite.
Some tag scenarios flagged in the tag validation window are necessary and are benign, others will cause problems when the translated document is created.
Alicun scenarios de tag languite in le fenestra de validation del tag es necessari e benigne, alteres producera problemas quando es create le documento rendite.
Some tools are known to produce invalid tmx files under certain conditions.
Qualque applicationes son note producer files tmx invalide sub certe conditiones.
Some types of source files (for instance PO, TTX, etc.) are bilingual, i.e. they serve both as a source and as a translation memory.
Alicun typos de Files fonte (per exemplo PO, TTX, etc.) son bilingue, id es illos serve ambe como un fonte e como un memoria de traduction.
Something went wrong, please visit Tilde Terminology for details.
Alicun cosa accideva incorrecte, per favor visita Tilde Terminologia pro le detalios.
Sometimes you may wish to rename the files you translate automatically, for example adding a language code after the file name.
Alicun vices tu pote desiderar de renominar automaticamente le files que tu rende, per exemplo con le addition de un codice de lingua post le nomine del file.
Sometimes, however, your translated file may look strange, and in the worst case may even refuse to open.
Alicun vices, comocunque, tu file rendite pote haver un aspecto singular, e in le pejor caso pote etiam rejectar de aperir.
Sometimes, it is useful to distinguish between high-quality translation memories and those that are, because of the subject matter, client, revision status, etc., less reliable.
Alicun vices, il es utile distinguer inter memorias de traduction de alte qualitate e illos que es, a causa del stato minus digne de fide del materia subjecto, del cliente, del revision, etc.

que le utilitate de conversion de file es installate debitemente e es functionante.

work thus licensed is called the contributor's "contributor version".

The "Cmd" key either has a "command" label or an apple symbol on Apple keyboards.

The "Corresponding Source" for a work in object code form means all the source code needed to generate, install, and (for an executable work) run the object code and to modify the work, including scripts to control those activities.

The "Corresponding Source" for a work in object code form means all the source code needed to generate, install, and (for an executable work) run the object code and to modify the work, including scripts to control those activities.
The "Latest" version is recommended.
Le version "Latest" es recommendate.
The "Professional" version of Infix has a further function of interest to translators: XML text export.
Le version "Professional" de Infix ha un function additional interessante pro le traductores: exporta texto XML.

The "Shift" key doesn't exhibit any special behavior per se: when the "Shift" key is pressed, all keys move the cursor in their usual manner, except in the case of the <l0>Shift+Enter</l0> combination, that inserts a line break into the text.

Le clave "Shift" non exhibi ulle special comportamento per se: quando on pulsa le clave "Shift", tote le claves move le cursor in su consuete faction, foras que in le caso del combination <l0>Shift+Enter</l0>, que insere un interruption de linea in le texto.
The "Standard" version of OmegaT includes a full user manual (at least in English) and will usually have been tested for some time to eliminate any bugs.
Le version "Standard" de OmegaT include un complete manual del usator (al minus in anglese) e habitualmente essere probate pro alicun tempore pro eliminar alicun defectos.
The "Status" field displays the limit like as "1,998,890 Characters remaining" for example.<br3/>
Le campo "Status" monstra le limite, per exemplo: "1,998,890 Characters remaining" (characteres restante).<br3/>

The "System Libraries" of an executable work include anything, other than the work as a whole, that (a) is included in the normal form of packaging a Major Component, but which is not part of that Major Component, and (b) serves only to enable use of the work with that Major Component, or to implement a Standard Interface for which an implementation is available to the public in source code form.

The "System Libraries" of an executable work include anything, other than the work as a whole, that (a) is included in the normal form of packaging a Major Component, but which is not part of that Major Component, and (b) serves only to enable use of the work with that Major Component, or to implement a Standard Interface for which an implementation is available to the public in source code form.
The "batteries included" version of OmegaT, with its own Java Runtime Environment.
Le version de OmegaT "batterias includite": con su proprie JRE includite.
The "master" (alpha) version reflects the very latest state of development.
Le version "maestro" (alpha) reflecte le ultimissime stato de disveloppamento.
The "master" version is a cutting-edge, "alpha" version, still in development.
Le version "maestro" es un version via-breve, ancora in via de disveloppamento.
The "old" version of OmegaT will be overwritten, but any settings from it will be retained.
Le version "vetule" de OmegaT essera superscribite, ma tote le configurationes essera retenite.
The "prepared" form is typically the tool's bilingual file format.
Le forma "preparate" es typicamente le formato de file bilingue del application.
The "source code" for a work means the preferred form of the work for making modifications to it.
The "source code" for a work means the preferred form of the work for making modifications to it.
The '*' character matches zero or more characters.
Le character salvage '*' equala zero o plus characteres.
The '?' character matches exactly one character.
Le character salvage '?' equala exactemente un character.
The .docx format is also prone to the introduction of "nuisance" formatting code which results in unwanted and unnecessary tags appearing in OmegaT's editor pane.
Le formato .docx es alsi pron al introduction de codice de formato "enoiose" que resulta in un apparition de tags importun e inutile in le quadro del modifica (editor) de OmegaT.
The /tm/ folder can contain any number of ancillary translation memories - i.e. tmx files.
Le plica /tm/ pote continer qualcunque numero de memorias de traduction auxiliar - id es files tmx.
The /trunk (alpha) version reflects the very latest state of development.
Le version /trunk (alpha) reflecte le ultimissime stato del disveloppamento.
The 3 other options are described in the specific page concerning <l0>TaaS</l0> (Terminology as a Service).
Le 3 altere optiones es describite in le specific pagina reguardante <l0>TaaS</l0> (Terminologia 'as' Servicio).
The <a0>Java Development Kit</a0> is required.
Il es necesse le <a1>Java Development Kit</a1> (JDK).
The <a0>OmegaT</a0> file includes <a1>OmegaT</a1> specific formatting tags so that the file can be used in other <a2>OmegaT</a2> projects
Le file <a0>OmegaT</a0> include tags de formato specific <a1>OmegaT</a1> de maniera que on pote usar the file in altere projectos <a2>OmegaT</a2>
The <a0>OmegaT</a0> solution
Le solution de <a0>OmegaT</a0>
The <a0>OmegaT</a0> user is not forced to use Google Translate.
Le usator de <a0>OmegaT</a0> non es coercite a usar Google Translate.

The
HTML tag will constitute a paragraph break for segmentation purposes.

Le tag HTML
constitue un interruption de paragrapho pro scopos de segmentar.
The <c0>Microsoft Office Open XML (legacy filter)</c0> is the original OmegaT filter.
Le <c0>filtro de Microsoft Office Open XML (filtro legate)</c0> es le filtro original de OmegaT.
The <e0>"-Duser.language=XX"</e0> argument causes <a1>OmegaT</a1> to use the language specified rather than the language of the user's operating system.
Le argumento <e0>"-Duser.language=XX"</e0> causa que <a1>OmegaT</a1> usa le lingua specificate plus tosto que le lingua del systema operative del usator.
The <e0>Replace Glossary Hits when Inserting Source Text</e0> option allows to replace automatically glossary hits with the target term when source text is inserted.
Le option <e0>Replaciar le colpos del glossario al insertion del texto fonte</e0> consenti replaciar automaticamente le colpos del glossario con le termino rendite quando le texto fonte es inserite.
The <e0>omegat</e0> subfolder contains at least one and possibly several other files.
Le sub plica <e0>omegat</e0> contine al minus un possibilemente plures altere files.
The <f0>omegat</f0> subfolder contains at least one and possibly several other files.
Le sub plica <f0>omegat</f0> contine al minus un e possibilemente plures altere files.
The <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> located in the <f1>omegat</f1> folder of your project contains more detailed segment information, broken down by file.
Le file <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> ubicate in le plica <f1>omegat</f1> de tu projecto, contine information plus detaliate re le segmentos, partite per cata file.
The <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> located in the omegat folder of your project contains more detailed segment information, broken down by file.
Le file <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> ubicate in le plica omegat de tu projecto, contine information plus detaliate re le segmentos, partite per cata file.
The <f0>tm</f0> folder can contain any number of ancillary translation memories - i.e. tmx files.
Le plica <f0>/tm/</f0> pote continer qualcunque numero de memorias de traduction auxiliar - i.e. files tmx.
The <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> file contains all the segments that have been recorded in memory since you started the project.
Le file <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> contine tote le segmentos que esseva registrate in memoria depois que tu ha initiate le projecto.
The <f2>project_save.tmx</f2> files are then collected and possible conflicts as regards terminology for instance get resolved.
Le files <f2>project_save.tmx</f2> son alora colligite e per exemplo son resolute conflictos eventual re respectos del terminologia.
The <f3>level1</f3> and <f4>level2</f4> memories can be shared with users of other translation programs.
On pote usar le memorias <f3>level1</f3> e <f4>level2</f4> in commun con le usatores de altere programmas de traduction.

The <g0>Display Context Description for TBX Glossaries</g0> option allows to show or hide contextual information with the terms (that come from TBX glossaries located in <f1>glossary</f1> folder) in the Glossary pane.

Le option <g0>Monstrar le Description Contextual pro le Glossarios TBX</g0> permitte de exhibir o occultar le informationes contextual con le terminos (que veni ex glossarios TBX locate in le plica <f1>glossary</f1> ) in le quadro Glossario.
The <g0>Viterbi</g0> and <g1>Forward-Backward</g1> algorithms are two different calculation methods.
Le algorithmos <g0>Viterbi</g0> e <g1>Forward-Backward</g1> es duo differente methodos de calculation.
The <g1>Tag Issues</g1> option is always selected.
Le option <g1>Problemas de tags</g1> es sempre seligite.
The <g2>Project Files</g2> Window displays the following information:
Le fenestra <g2>Files del projecto</g2> monstra le sequente informationes:
The <g4>Project Files</g4> Window displays the following information:
Le fenestra <g4>Files del Projecto</g4> monstra le information sequente:
The <k4> <k5>Shift</k5> <k6>Ctrl</k6> <k7>O</k7> </k4> toggle has three states:
Le commutator <k4> <k5>Shift</k5> <k6>Ctrl</k6> <k7>O</k7> </k4> ha tres statos:
The <l0>-Duser.language=<p1>XX</p1></l0> argument causes <a2>OmegaT</a2> to use the language specified rather than the language of the user's operating system.
Le argumento <l0>-Duser.language=<p1>XX</p1></l0> causa que <a2>OmegaT</a2> usa le lingua specificate plus tosto que le lingua del systema operative del usator.
The <l0>-Duser.language=<p1>XX</p1></l0> argument causes OmegaT to use the language specified rather than the language of the user's operating system.
Le argumento <l0>-Duser.language=<p1>XX</p1></l0> causa que OmegaT usa le lingua specificate plus tosto que le lingua del systema operative del usator.
The <m0> <s1> <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>E</k4> </k2> </s1> <g5>Project</g5> <g6>Properties...</g6> </m0> dialog is used to define and modify the project folders and languages.
Le dialogo <m0> <s1> <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>E</k4> </k2> </s1> <g5>Projecto</g5> <g6>Proprietates...</g6> </m0> es usate pro definir e modificar le plicas e le linguas del projecto.
The <u5>FAQ </u5> is a good starting point for finding answers to questions you may have.
Le <u5>FAQ </u5> es un bon puncto de partita pro discoperir responsas a questiones que tu pote haber.
The <x0/> describes the color coding in detail.
Le <x0/> describe le codifica del color in detalio.
The Add Finished!
Le Adde es finite!
The Britannica Concise Encyclopedia
Le Concise Encyclopedia Britannic
The Commit window will open and show the progress of the commit command.
Se aperira le fenestra Commit e monstrara le progresso del commando commit.
The Corresponding Source for a work in source code form is that same work.
The Corresponding Source for a work in source code form is that same work.
The Corresponding Source need not include anything that users can regenerate automatically from other parts of the Corresponding Source.
The Corresponding Source need not include anything that users can regenerate automatically from other parts of the Corresponding Source.
The Dj Vu "External View" file format is a feature of Dj Vu DVX.
Le formato de file "Vistas Externe" es un function deDj Vu DVX.
The Edit Pattern Dialog offers among others the following options:
Le Fenestra de dialogo Modifica Modello offere inter le alteres le optiones sequente:
The Edit menu itself contains the following items:
Le menu mesme Modificar contine le commandos sequente:
The Editor pane displays the text of the partially translated document: the text already translated is displayed in translation while the untranslated text is displayed in the original language.
Le quadro Modifica monstra le texto del documento partialmente rendite: le texto ja rendite es displicate in traduction e le texto non rendite es monstrate in le lingua original.
The Free Software Foundation may publish revised and/or new versions of the GNU General Public License from time to time.
The Free Software Foundation may publish revised and/or new versions of the GNU General Public License from time to time.
The GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE.
The GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE.
The GNU General Public License does not permit incorporating your program into proprietary programs.
The GNU General Public License does not permit incorporating your program into proprietary programs.
The GNU General Public License is a free, copyleft license for software and other kinds of works.
The GNU General Public License is a free, copyleft license for software and other kinds of works.
The GPL version 3.
GPL version 3.
The Glossary pane allows you to access your own collection of expressions and specialist terminology which you have built up in your glossary files.
Le quadro del Glossario permitte te de acceder tu proprie collection de expressiones e terminologia specialistic le qual tu ha create in tu files glossario.
The HTML user manual for OmegaT standard version.
Le manual del usator HTML pro OmegaT standard version.
The JRE is now supplied with OmegaT and need not be obtained separately.
Le JRE es anque supplite con OmegaT, on non debe lo obtener separatemente.
The Java Resource Bundles filter threw an exception:
Le filtro pro Java Resource Bundles generava un exception:
The Java version used (the same font may appear quite different on Sun and OpenJDK versions of Java)
Le version Java usate (le identic typo de character pote parer assatis differente sur le versiones Sun e OpenJDK de Java)
The KMenuEditor appears.
Compare le KMenuEditor.
The LanguageTool in OmegaT
LanguageTool in OmegaT
The LanguageTool plugin is included in OmegaT.
Le plugin LanguageTool es includite in OmegaT.
The Latest version requires Java {{site.data.versions.latest.java_version}}.
Le Ultime version require Java {{site.data.versions.latest.java_version}}.
The Latest version will usually be reasonably stable and usable, but may have some bugs.
Le version Ultime essera de costume rationabilemente stabile e usabile, ma pote haber alicun defectos.
The Linux version of OmegaT is now supplied with its own installation script, linux-install.sh.
Le version Linux de OmegaT ora es supplite con su proprie script de installation: linux-install.sh.
The Mac OS X equivalent is the application Terminal located in Applications Utilities.
Le equivalente Mac OS X es le application Terminal ubicate in Applicationes Utilitates.
The Mac OSX version is not yet documented and the information below does <b3>not</b3> apply to it.
Le version pro Mac OSX non es ancora documentate e le information in sequito <b3>non</b3> referer se a illo.
The Match Display Template area also allows changing how fuzzy matches are displayed, through the use of pre-configured variables.
Le Area de Apparentia del Concordantia permitte alsi cambiar quomodo essera monstrate le concordantias partial, per le uso de variabiles pre-configurate.

The Match Statistics are tab-separated and you can use <g0>Ctrl+A <i1/></g0><g2>, Ctrl+C <i3/></g2>, <g4>Ctrl+V <i5/></g4> to copy/paste them, for instance into a spreadsheet or into your cost-accounting application.

Le Statisticas del Concordantia es tabellas del texto 'separate per signos de tabulation' e tu pote usar <g0>Ctrl+A <i1/></g0><g2>, Ctrl+C <i3/></g2>, <g4>Ctrl+V <i5/></g4> pro copiar e collar los, per exemplo in un folio de calculo o in tu application pro le computo del costos.

The Microsoft Office 2007-2010 file formats (also known as Office Open XML, and with the file extensions .docx, .xlsx and .pptx) is radically different to the Office 97-2003 formats which they supersede.

Le formatos de file Microsoft Office 2007-2010 (alsi note como Office Open XML, e con le extensiones de file .docx, .xlsx e .pptx) es radicalmente differente del formatos de Office 97-2003 que illos supplanta.
The Microsoft Office 2007-2010 file formats can be processed directly in OmegaT; more information can be found <a0>here</a0>.
On pote render, directemente in OmegaT, le files in formato Microsoft Office XML.; altere informationes pote esser trovate <a0>hic</a0>.
The Moodle PHP filter threw an exception:
Le filtro Moodle PHP generava un exception:
The Moses server URL is not set
Le URL del servitor de Moses non es definite
The Mozilla DTD filter threw an exception:
Le filtro Mozilla DTD generava un exception:
The Mozilla FTL filter threw an exception:
Le filtro Mozilla FTL generava un exception:
The OmegaT developers' list.
Le lista del disveloppatores de OmegaT.
The OmegaT project
Le projecto OmegaT
The OmegaT project and you
Le projecto OmegaT e tu
The OmegaT project is maintained by an informal, international group of volunteers.
Le projecto OmegaT es mantenite per un gruppo informal e international de voluntarios.
The OmegaT project philosophy
Le philosophia del projecto OmegaT
The OmegaT project team is not a company or formal legal body, just a group of volunteers involved in the OmegaT project.
Le equipa de projecto de OmegaT non es un compania o un persona juridic formal, justo un gruppo de voluntarios implicate in le projecto de OmegaT.
The OmegaT project would benefit from greater support from volunteers in almost all areas.
Le projecto OmegaT beneficiarea de major supporto ex le voluntarios in quasi tote le areas.
The OmegaT tokenizer is a plugin for OmegaT.
Le tokenizer de OmegaT es un plugin pro OmegaT.
The OmegaT version usually supplied is the "Standard" version.
Le version OmegaT habitualmente supplite es le version "Standard".
The OmegaT website includes files in HTML and, as of 2011, PHP format.
le sito de OmegaT include files in HTML e, a partir del 2011, anque in formato PHP.
The Open Document Format is an international standard and has replaced the former proprietary (but open) Star Office file format (two different but very similar file formats).
Le formato Open Document es un standard international e ha replaciate le precedente formato de file proprietari (ma aperte) Star Office (duo formatos de file differente, ma multo similabile).
The PO filter already handles %..
Le filtro PO jam tracta %..
The PO filter threw an exception:
Le filter PO generava un exception:
The PO header will be skipped and left unchanged if this option is checked.
Le testa del PO essera saltate e lassate sin alteration, si es marcate iste option.
The PO header will not be displayed for translation.
Le titulos PO non essera monstrate pro le traduction.
The Project Files Window displays the following information:
Le fenestra Files del Projecto monstra le information sequente:
The Project Files window lists the project files and displays other project information.
Le fenestra Files del Projecto lista le files del projecto e monstra altere information de projecto.
The Project Manager should check with the translator that the statistics are identical on both sides (server side and translator side).
Le Gestor de projecto debe controlar con le traductor que le statistica es identic sur ambe le lateres (latere servitor e latere traductor).
The Quit button closes Priorview and also deletes the temporary files that it creates.
Le button Quita claude Priorview e dele alsi le files temporari que illo creava.
The Scripting window allows you to load an existing script into the text area and run it against the current opened project.
Le Fenestra de Scripts te permitte de cargar un script existente in le area texto e exequer lo verso le projecto aperte currente.
The Search window has its own menus:
Le fenestra de Recerca ha su proprie menus:
The Spanish translation is better than the Slovenian.
Le traduction espaniol es melior que illa sloven.
The Standard version requires Java {{site.data.versions.standard.java_version}}.
Le version Standard require Java {{site.data.versions.standard.java_version}}.
The TMX file will continue to be loaded.
Le file TMX continuara a esser cargate.
The TMX file will not be loaded Please try to correct the error and reload the project.
Le file TMX non essera cargate Per favor proba a corriger le error e recarga le projecto.
The TMX source language ({0}) is different from the project source language ({1}).
Le lingua fonte del TMX ({0}) es differente del lingua fonte del projecto ({1}).
The TMX standard contains definitions of what characters are permissible.
Le standard TMX contine definitiones re qual characteres es permissibile.
The TMX standard exists both in different <s0>versions</s0> and in different <s1>levels</s1>.
Le standard TMX existe in differente <s0>versiones</s0> e in differente <s1>nivellos</s1>.
The TaaS service at https://demo.taas-project.eu/info provides terminology services in European languages (plus Russian).
Le servicio TaaS al sito https://demo.taas-project.eu/info supple servicios de terminologia in le linguas europee (plus russo).
The TexTra API is freely provided by NICT, Japan government research agency.
Le API de TexTra es liberemente fornite per NICT, le agentia de governamento del Japon.
The Trados "uncleaned" RTF file format, often referred to simply as "uncleaned files", has for many years been the most common bilingual file format used in translation workflows.

Le formato de file RTF "non mundate" Trados, frequentemente referite simplemente como "files non mundate", esseva depost multe annos le plus commun formato de file bilingue usate in le fluxos del labor de traduction.
The URL must include "{target}", which will be replaced with the search text.
Le URL debe includer "{target}", le qual essera replaciate con le texto de recerca.
The URL shown under Project Services will be used by SVN to connect clients to the SVN server you have just established.
Le URL monstrate sub Servicios de Projecto essera usate per SVN pro connecter le clientes al servitor SVN que tu ha justo establite.
The Web Start version is the "install and forget" version.<br0/>
Web Start es le version "installa e oblida".<br0/>
The Web Start version offers an alternative means of installing OmegaT on your computer.
Le version Web Start offere un medio alternative pro installar OmegaT sur tu computator.
The above method somewhat impractical way of launching a program routinely.
Le methodo supra es un via aliquanto impractic pro initiar de routine un programma.
The administrator may decide to include following folders and their contents as well: <f0>tm</f0>, <f1>glossary</f1> and <f2>dictionary</f2>.
Le administrator pote decider pro comprender le plicas sequente e lor contentos assi como: <f0>tm</f0>, <f1>glossary</f1> e <f2>dictionary</f2>.
The advantages of a VC system for a team of translators can be summarized as follows:
Le avantages de un Systema de VC pro un equipa de traductores in breve es a como seque:
The advantages of using the .docx format in conjunction with OmegaT
Le avantages de usar le formato .docx con OmegaT
The alert (bell) character ('\u0007')
Le character alerta (campana) ('\u0007')
The alternative is to enter a translation that is identical to the source text.
Le alternative es scriber un traduction identic al texto original.

The alternative is to have one single repository with subfolders <l0>Project1</l0>, <l1>Project2</l1>, etc., and share the common material via common <l2>tm</l2>, <l3>glossary</l3> and <l4>dictionary</l4> folders.
Le alternativa es haber un singule repositorio con sub plicas<l0>Project1</l0>, <l1>Project2</l1>, etc., e le material commun via plicas <l2>tm</l2>, <l3>glossary</l3> e <l4>dictionary</l4> commun.
The appearance of fonts in OmegaT on Linux may differ widely, according to:
Le apparentia del typos de character in OmegaT sur Linux pote differer largemente, secundo:
The application folder contains the <f0>OmegaT.jar</f0> application and a number of other important files.
Le plica application contine le <f0>OmegaT.jar</f0> application e plure altere files importante.
The application folder location depends on your platform and on the way you have installed OmegaT.
Le position del plica application depende de su platforma e del modo in que tu ha installate OmegaT.
The application runs on your machine only.
Le application functiona sur tu machina.
The application runs on your machine.
Le application flue sur tu machina.
The argument <e0>pseudotranslatetype</e0> specifies, whether the target segments are to be equal to the source, or left empty.
Le argumento <e0>pseudotranslatetype</e0> specifica, si le segmentos final debe esser equal al fonte, o lassate vacue.
The author of the Chapter <e1>Learn to use OmegaT in 5 minutes!</e1> is Samuel Murray, Copyright 2005-2012.
The author of the Chapter <e1>Learn to use OmegaT in 5 minutes!</e1> is Samuel Murray, Copyright 2005-2012.
The automatic refresh function is built in.
Le function de renovation automatic es integrate.
The available options are:
Le optiones disponibile son:
The available/selected fonts
Le typos de character disponibile/seligite
The background is restored to normal when the segment is left.
Quando le segmento es lassate le fundo es restaurate a normal.
The bash script is a very basic file that can be edited manually with command-line options for launching and configuring OmegaT.
Le script bash es un file multo basic que pote esser modificate manualmente con optiones de linea de commando pro lancear e configurar OmegaT.
The basic command has already been mentioned above.
Le commando basic esseva ja mentionate precedentemente.
The basic form of this command is:
Le forma basic de iste commando is:
The basic launch command is:
Le commando basic de lanceamento es:
The basic launch command with the Google Translate API added will therefore be:
Le commando basic de lanceamento con le API de Google Translate in consequentia essera:
The basic rule is that the sequence of tags must be preserved in the same order.
Le regula basic es que le sequentia de tags debe esser conservate in le identic arrangiamento.
The beginning of a line
Le principio de un linea
The behaviour, stated here, applies to all the source files and not just to some of the file types, like formatted text.
Le comportamento, fixate ci, refere se a tote le files fonte e non sol a alicun del typos del file, como texto formattate.
The best thing of course is to use OmegaT-specific TMX files (see above), so that the in-line formatting within the segment is retained.
Le melior cosa naturalmente es usar files TMX specific pro OmegaT (vide supra), de maniera que le es retenite le formato intra le segmento.
The carriage-return character ('\u000D')
Le character retorna-carro ('\u000D')
The certificate is signed by <a1>PnS Concept Sarl</a1>, a French registered company.
Le certificato es signate per <a1>PnS Concept Sarl</a1>, un compania registrate francese.
The certificate is signed by OmegaT's lead developer.
Le certificato es signate per le disveloppator principal de OmegaT.
The change will then become visible after a delay of at most the interval you selected (plus the time taken by OmegaT to save and produce the target files).
Le cambio alora devenira visibile post un retardo de al plus le intervallo que tu ha seligite (plus le tempore empleate per OmegaT a salvar e producer le files final).
The changes are displayed.
Le cambiamentos es displicate.
The character with hexadecimal value 0xhh
Le character con valor hexadecimal 0xhh
The character with hexadecimal value 0xhhhh
Le character con valor hexadecimal 0xhhhh
The character with octal value 0mnn (0 <= m <= 3, 0 <= n <= 7)
Le character con valor octal 0mnn (0 <= m <= 3, 0 <= n <= 7)
The character with octal value 0n (0 <= n <= 7)
Le character con valor octal 0n (0 <= n <= 7)
The character with octal value 0nn (0 <= n <= 7)
Le character con valor octal 0nn (0 <= n <= 7)
The character x, except the following...
Le character x, excepte le sequente...
The check boxes in the lower half of the dialog window serve the following purpose:
Le quadratos de controlo in le medietate inferior del fenestra de dialogo servi al proposito sequente:
The code of your macro(s) will be displayed.
Le codice de tu macro essera monstrate.

The collaborative translation offered by OmegaT is based on the functionality of version or revision control, widely used by the software community to maintain control of changes to the code of a program and allow unimpeded collaboration within the development team.

Le traduction in equipa (facite in collaboration) que OmegaT offere es basate sur le functionalitate del 'Controlo de version' (o de revision), largemente utilisate per le communitates de software pro mantener le controlo del cambios al codice de un programma e permitter le collaboration sin impedimentos intra le equipa de disveloppamento.

tu.note: Conservar o immagazinar?

tuv.seg: The collections are downloaded as TBX glossaries and stored in the current <f0>glossary</f0> folder.
Le collectiones es discargate como glossarios TBX e immagazinate in le actual plica <f0>glossary</f0>.
The collections are downloaded as TBX glossaries and stored in the current glossary folder.
Le collectiones es discargate como glossarios TBX e immagazinate in le actual plica /glossary.
The collections are downloaded as TBX glossaries in the current glossary folder.
Le collectiones es discargate qual glossarios TBX in le plica del currente glossario.
The colours are displayed as long as the "Save auto-populated status" (in Options/Editing behaviour..) option is checked.
Le colores monstrate si es marcate le option "Salva le stato auto-populate" (in Optiones/Comportamento del Modifica).
The colours are displayed as long as the <l1><g2>Save auto-populated status</g2></l1> option is checked.
Le colores es monstrate fin que le option <l1><g2>Salvar stato auto-populated</g2></l1> es marcate.
The command is case-sensitive.
Le commando es sensibile al majusculas.
The command must include "{target}", which will be replaced with the search text.
Le commando debe includer "{target}", le qual essera replaciate con le texto de recerca.
The command to launch <a3>OmegaT</a3> with assignment of 1024 MB (1 gigabyte) of memory is therefore:
Le commando pro lancear <a3>OmegaT</a3> con assignation de 1024 MB (1 gigabyte) de memoria es in consequentia:
The command to launch <a5>OmegaT</a5> with assignment of 2048 MB (2 GB) of memory is therefore:
Le commando pro lancear <a5>OmegaT</a5> con assignation de 2048 MB (2 GB) de memoria es dunque:
The command to launch OmegaT is:
Le commando pro lancear OmegaT es:
The command to launch OmegaT with assignment of 2048 MB (2 GB) of memory is therefore:
Le commando pro lancear OmegaT con assignation de 2048 MB (2 GB) de memoria es dunque:
The command will therefore be (in this case):
Le commando essera dunque (in iste caso):
The computer, running OmegaT, has Russian as the default language, and thus shows the characters in the Cyrillic alphabet and not in Kanji.
Le computator, functionante OmegaT, ha le russo como lingua base, e assi monstra le characteres in le alphabeto cyrillic e non in Kanji.
The configuration folder stores the majority of the OmegaT options and preferences for the user.
Le plica del configuration salva le majoritate del optiones e preferentia de usator in OmegaT.
The configuration folder will be used instead.
Le plica de configuration essera usate in vice.
The construct
Le construction

The content of a segment can be deleted completely either by means of the keyboard shortcuts Ctrl+A > Ctrl+X > Enter, by right-clicking with the mouse and the Remove Translation menu item, or simply by using the delete key (repeatedly).

Le contento de un segmento pote esser delite completemente o per medio del vias breve del claviero Ctrl+A > Ctrl+X > Enter, per click dextere con le mouse e le commando del menu Remove traduction, o simplemente usante le clave Dele (plure vices).
The content of the files is overwritten either when a new segment is opened (source.txt and target.txt) or when a new selection is exported (selection.txt).
Le contento del files es superscribite o quando un segmento nove es aperite (source.txt e target.txt) o quando a nove selection es exportate (selection.txt).
The content of the script window is editable and can be copied and pasted back into the OmegaT Editor pane.
Le contento del fenestra del script es modificabile e pote esser copiate e collate al reverso in le quadro Editor de OmegaT.
The content of the segment source text (<f0>source.txt</f0>).

The contents of the target subfolder will reflect the current state of the translation, as present in the project translation memory, saved in the current <f8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</f8>.

Le contentos del memorias de traduction in le sub plica <f0>tm</f0> serve a generar suggestiones pro le texto(s) a traducer.

Essera usate in vice le plica currente.

Le actual projecto debe ser recargate a fin de applicar iste cambios

Le via breve currente essera monstrate in le cassa apposite.
The current version of the service is based on usage, with the price of 20 USD per million characters at the time of writing.
le version actual del servicio es basate super le uso, con le precio de 20 USD per million de characteres al tempore del script.
The customer wishes to receive a translation memory against which texts can be run in the future: in other words, to "pretranslate" future texts against an existing translation memory.
Le cliente desira reciper un memoria de traduction contra le qual textos pote esser exequite in le futuro: in altere parolas, a "pre render" textos futur contra un memoria de traduction existente.
The data are exported when the segment is opened.
Le datos es exportate quando le segmento es aperte.

Le vias breve initial de OmegaT es disponibile ex Sourceforge: <u0>Vias breve initial de OmegaT</u0>

Le vias breve initial de OmegaT pro le Mac es alsi disponibile ex Sourceforge, illos usa omne "meta" in vice de "ctrl": <u0>Vias breve initial de OmegaT pro le Mac</u0>
The default pattern.
Le modello predefinite.

Le fenestra de dialogo in <m0> <g1>Optiones</g1> <g2>Comportamento de Modificar...</g2> </m0> habilita le usator a seliger, como le segmento actual in le campo de modification debe esser definite initialmente e tractate:
The dialog includes a special target filename pattern editor, which you can use to customize the names of output files.
Le fenestra de dialogo include un special redactor de modello de nomine de file de destination, que tu pote usar pro personalisar le nomines del files de exito.
The dialog is useful because it includes a special target filename pattern editor with which you can customize the names of output files.
Le fenestra de dialogo es utile quia illo include un editor special pro modello de nomine de file de destination con le qual tu pote personalisar le nomines del files emittite.
The dialog offers various options:
Le dialogo forni plure optiones:
The dialog to create a project is the same as to edit the project.
Le fenestra de dialogo pro crear un projecto es le mesme que pro modificar le projecto.
The difference between "Number of segments" and "Number of unique segments" provides an approximate idea of the number of repetitions in the text.
Le differentia inter "Numero de segmentos" e "Numero de segmentos unic" provide un idea approximative del numero del repetitiones in le texto.

The difference is thin: we call "Window" a window that can stay open next to the editor and interact with it, and "dialog" a window where you must select parameters before closing it and pursuing your translation activity.

Le differentia es subtil: nos appella "Fenestra" un fenestra que poter star aperte proxime al editor e interager con illo, e "fenestra de dialogo" un fenestra ubi tu debe eliger parametros ante clauder lo e prosequer le activitate de traduction.
The display mode of the translated documents must be modified within the application (such as Microsoft Word) commonly used to display or modify them (check the relevant manuals for details).

Le modo de monstra del documentos rendite debe esser modificate intra le application (como Microsoft Word) usate communmente pro monstrar o modificar los (controla le manuales pertinente pro le detalios).
The displayed text is split into segments and you may scroll through the document and double-click on any segment to open and edit it.
Le texto monstrate es fisse in segmentos e tu pote rolar a a transverso del documento e cliccar duo vices sur cata segmento pro aperir e modificar lo.
The distinction is important for compatibility purposes.
Le distinction es importante pro le fines del compatibilitate.

The easiest way for a customers to ensure that these two conditions are met is for them to pretranslate the text themselves before passing it to the translator (thereby defining how it is segmented), and to create the translation memory in the CAT tool of their choice after receiving the translated intermediate bilingual file from the translator (thereby ensuring that the formatting information contained within the translation memory will be compatible with future projects).

Le modo plus facile pro un cliente de assecurar se que iste duo conditiones es complite, es de pre traducer le texto ipse avante que passar lo al translator (assi definiente como illo es segmentate), e crear le memoria de traduction in le application CAT de su selection, depost que recipeva le file bilingue intermedie rendite ab le traductor (assi assecurante se que le informationes de formato continite in le memoria de traduction essera compatibile con le projectos futur).
The easiest way to modify it is to use the <g0>Edit Pattern</g0> dialog.
Le methodo le plus facile pro modificar lo es usar le dialogo <g0>Modificar modello</g0>.
The encoding of an HTML document is generally declared within a <meta> element situated in the <head> element.
Le codification de un documento HTML generalmente es declarate in un elemento <meta> situate in le elemento <head>.
The encoding of glossaries is determined automatically.
Le codification del glossarios es determinate automaticamente

Le codification usate pro leger glossarios de referentia depende de lor extension de file:

Le fin de un linea

The entry <g5>Remove translation</g5> in the same pop up menu also allows to delete the existing translation of the current segment.
Le entrata <g5>Remove traduction</g5> in le identic menu pop-up permitte alsi de deler le traduction existente del segmento currente.

Le file es commentate pro te adjutar.
