The interval of 3 minutes can be changed in <l0><m1> <g2>Options</g2> <g3>Preferences</g3> <g4>Saving and Output</g4> </m1></l0>.
Le intervallo de 3 minutas pote esser cambiate in <l0><m1> <g2>Optiones</g2> <g3>Preferentias</g3> <g4>Salvamento e exito</g4> </m1></l0>.
The items are not separated with a TAB character.
Le articulos non es separate con un character de tabulation.
The kaptain script (or "grammar", as kaptain scripts are termed) enables you to select launch and configuration options from a user-friendly GUI.
Le script Kaptain (o "grammatica", como le scriptes kaptain es denominate) te habilita a seliger le optiones del lanceamento e del configuration per un facile interfacie graphic.
The key must then be given to OmegaT using -Dtaas.user.key=xxxxx.
Le clave debe alora esser date a OmegaT per -Dtaas.user.key=xxxxx.
The language code should be in the form xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY or xxx_YY, where xx or xxx is the language code and YY is the region or country code (optional).
Le codice del lingua deberea esser in le forma xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY o xxx_YY, ubi xx o xxx es le codice del lingua e YY es le codice del region o del pais (facultative).
The last frame offers you to have a look at the readme and changes files for the version you have installed.
Le quadro ultime te offere un reguardo al files readme e changes pro le version que tu ha installate.
The last segment with the identical source text will thus prevail (Note: of course it makes more sense to avoid this to happen in the first place).
Assi prevalera le ultime segmento con le identic texto fonte (Note: naturalmente ha plus senso evitar que isto occurre in le prime posto).
The launch file script contains the OmegaT launch command.
Le file script de lanceamento contine le commando de lanceamento de OmegaT.
The launch scripts will not be written to your execution path in this case.
Le scripts de lanceamento non essera scripte in tu percurso de execution in iste caso.
The layout shown here is just for the sake of example; you can of course arrange the windows as you like.
Le arrangiamento monstrate hic es justo pro gratia de exemplo; tu pote naturalmente arrangiar le fenestras como tu vole.
The level 2 export is not fully compliant with the level 2 standard, but is sufficiently close and will generate correct matches in other translation memory tools supporting TMX Level 2.

Le exportation nivello 2 non es plenmente conforme con le standard nivello 2, ma es satis prope e generara concordantias correcte in altere applicationes memoria de traduction que supporta le TMX nivello 2.
The level1 file contains only textual information.
Le file level1 contine sol information textual.

The level2 file encapsulates <a0>OmegaT</a0> specific tags in correct tmx tags so that the file can be used with its formatting information in a translation tool that supports tmx level 2 memories, or <a1>OmegaT</a1> itself.

Le file level2 incapsula specific tags <a0>OmegaT</a0> in correcte tags tmx a fin que on pote usar le file con su information de formato in un instrumento de traduction que supporta memorias tmx nivello 2, o ipse <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
The levels refer to the formatting information that is contained in the TMX file:
Le nivellos se refere al information de formato que es continite in le file TMX:
The license of each library is mentioned in /lib/licenses/Licenses.txt.
The license of each library is mentioned in /lib/licenses/Licenses.txt.
The license of each library is mentionned in /lib/licenses/Licenses.txt.
The license of each library is mentionned in /lib/licenses/Licenses.txt.
The licenses for most software and other practical works are designed to take away your freedom to share and change the works.
The licenses for most software and other practical works are designed to take away your freedom to share and change the works.
The line with the matching percentage also includes the name of the translation memory <i1/> containing the match.
Le linea con le percentage del concordantia include alsi le nomine del of memoria de traduction <i1/> continente le concordantia.
The line with the matching percentage also includes the name of the translation memory containing the match.
Le linea con le percentage del concordantia include alsi le nomine del memoria de traduction continente le concordantia.
The list below is <s0>not</s0> an exhaustive list of all file formats supported by OmegaT, but is limited to those of particular interest to typical users.
Le lista sequente <s0>non</s0> es un lista exhaustive de tote le formatos de file supportate per OmegaT, ma es limitate a illos de particular interesse pro le typic usatores.
The list of improvements and bug fixes.
Le lista de meliorationes e remedios de errores.
The list of individual contributors.
Le list de collaboratores individual.
The list of libraries used by OmegaT.
Le lista de bibliothecas usate per OmegaT.

The local file <f0>/home/me/myfiles/my/file.txt</f0> is mapped to the local file <f1>source/file.txt</f1> and <f2>/home/me/myfiles/some/file.txt</f2> is mapped to the local file <f3>source/file2.txt</f3>.
Le file local <f0>/home/me/myfiles/my/file.txt</f0> es mappate al file local <f1>source/file.txt</f1> e <f2>/home/me/myfiles/some/file.txt</f2> es mappate al file local <f3>source/file2.txt</f3>.
The location does not matter, since you can add it to the command line at launch (see below).
Le ubication non face substantia, pois que tu pote adder lo al linea de commando al lanceamento (vide in sequito).
The location does not matter, since you can add it to the command line at startup.
Le ubication non face substantia, pois que tu pote adder lo al linea de commando al lanceamento.
The location does not matter, since you have to add it to the command line at the start-up anyway.
Le ubication non face substantia, pois que tu debe adder lo al linea de commando al lanceamento in omne caso.
The location is irrelevant, since it must be specified explicitly on the command-line at launch.
Le ubication es irrelevante, pois que illo debe esser specificate explicitemente sur le linea de commando al lanceamento.
The location of the <f0>.tbx</f0> file must be within the <f1>/glossary</f1> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f2>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f2>).
Le position del file <f0>.tbx</f0> debe esser intra le plica <f1>/glossary </f1> , ma illo pote esser in un directorio plus profunde (e.g., <f2>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f2>).
The location of the <f1>.tbx</f1> file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f3>).
The location of the <f1>.tbx</f1> file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f3>).
The location of the default configuration folder varies by system (the <e0>~</e0> character represents your home folder):
Le position del plica del configuration predefinite varia per systema (le <e0> ~ </e0> character representa tu plica de casa.
The location of the file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
Le ubication del file debe esser intra le plica <f2>/glossary</f2>, ma illo pote esser in un plica plus profunde (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
The location of the writable glossary file can be set in the <g0>Project > Properties ... </g0>dialog.
Le ubication del file glossario scribibile pote esser fixate in le fenestra de dialogo <g0>Projecto > Proprietates ... </g0>.
The location of user files depends upon the platform you use:
Le ubication del files del usator depende ab qual platteforma tu usa:
The locations of the various different translation memories for a given project are user-defined (see Project dialog window in <l0>Project properties)</l0>
Le locationes del varie differente memorias de traduction pro un projecto date son definite per le usator (vide le fenestra de dialogo Projecto in <l0>Proprietates del Projecto)</l0>
The macOS equivalent is the application Terminal located in <f0>Applications/Utilities</f0>.
Le equivalente macOS es le application Terminal ubicate in <f0>Applicationes/Utilitates</f0>.
The machine translation pane, when opened, contains the suggestions by machine translation tools for the current segment.
Le quadro del Traduction Automatic, quando aperte, contine le suggestiones ex instrumentos de traductor automatic pro le segmento currente.
The main OmegaT application.
Le principal application OmegaT.
The main menu provides access to all <a0>OmegaT</a0> functions.
Le menu principal provide accesso a omne functiones de <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
The main project folder contains 3 tmx files, <f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>, <f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> and <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2> (project_name being the name of your project).
Le plica principal del projecto contine 3 files tmx, <f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>, <f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> e <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2> (project_name es le nomine de tu projecto).
The main window consists of several panes, the main menu and a status bar.
Le principal fenestra consiste in plure quadros, le menu principal e un barra de stato.
The mappings can be added via the UI: <m0> <g1>Project</g1> <g2>Properties</g2> <g3>Repository Mapping</g3> </m0> or by editing <f4>omegat.project</f4>.
Le mappas pote esser addite via le interfacie de usator: <m0> <g1>Projecto</g1> <g2>Proprietates</g2> <g3>Mappa de repositorio</g3> </m0> o per redaction de <f4>omegat.project</f4>.
The match statistics are accessed via<g0>Tools>Match Statistics.</g0> The evaluation is rather CPU intensive and can be time-consuming, so a progress bar is shown during the calculation.

Le statisticas del concordantia es accedite via<g0>Instrumentos>Statisticas del Concordantia.</g0> Le evalutation es assatis intensive pro le CPU e pote necessitar molto tempore, ergo es monstrate un barra de avantiamento durante le calculation.

The match viewer shows the most similar segments from translation memories, both from internal project translation memory created in real time as you translate your project and from ancillary translation memories you have imported from your earlier jobs, or received from your client or translation agency.

Le quadro del concordantias monstra le segmentos le plus similabile, sia ex le memoria de traduction del projecto interne create in tempore actual como tu rende tu projecto e ex memorias de traduction auxiliar que tu ha importate ex tu obras precedente, o recipite ex tu cliente o agentia del traduction.
The matches will be displayed in bold blue.
Le concordantias essera marcate in azur hardite.
The matching percentage is roughly equivalent to taking the number of common words in the matched and the matching segment and dividing by the number of words in the longer of the two.
Le percentage de concordantia es grosso modo equivalente a prender le numero de parolas commun in le segmentos concordate e divider los per le numero de parolas in le plus longe del duos.
The memory named <f5>omegat</f5> can be used by OmegaT itself, in future projects that you create.
Le memoria denominate <f5>omegat</f5> pote esser usate in OmegaT ipse, in projectos futur que tu creara.
The messages you would usually find in the status bar are not displayed.
Le messages que tu trovarea habitualmente in le barra de stato non son monstrate.
The minimal package contains the same files as the full package, except for the main user manual.
Le pacchetto minime contine le mesme files del pacchetto complete, minus le manual principal del usator.
The minimum is 10 seconds.
Le minimo es 10 secundos.
The most current info about OmegaT can be found at:
Le plus actual information circa OmegaT pote ser trovate al ligamine:
The most current is <f0>OmegaT.log</f0>.
Le plus actual es <f0>OmegaT.log</f0>.
The most frequently used functions are accessible with keyboard shortcuts, so once you become accustomed to them, you will no longer need to browse through the menus while translating.

Le functiones le plus frequentemente usate es accessibile con vias breve del claviero, assi un vice que tu deveni accostumate a illos, tu non necessitara plus navigar a transverso del menus durante que tu traduce.
The most important file here is the <f1>project_save.tmx, </f1>that is the working translation memory for the project.
Le plus importante file hic es le <f1>project_save.tmx, </f1>que es le memoria de traduction operative pro le projecto.
The most important file here is the <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>, that is the working translation memory for the project.
Le plus importante file hic es le <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>, que es le memoria de traduction operative pro le projecto.
The most important is <l0>/path/to/project</l0>, and optionally <l1>--config-dir=<p2>/path/to/config-files/</p2></l1>.
Le plus importante es <l0>/tracto/a/projecto</l0> e optionalmente <l1>--config-dir=<p2>/tracto/a/config-files/</p2></l1>.
The most important is <l1>/path/to/project</l1>, and optionally <l2>--config-dir=<p3>/path/to/config-files/</p3></l2>.
Le plus importante es <l1>/tracto/a/projecto</l1> e optionalmente <l2>--config-dir=<p3>/tracto/a/config-files/</p3></l2>.
The most important is <l1><project-dir></l1>, and optionally<l2> --config-dir=<config-dir>.
Le plus importante es <l1><project-dir></l1>, e optionalmente<l2> --config-dir=<config-dir>.
The most important of these is <l0><project-dir></l0>, and optionally <l1>--config-dir=<config-dir></l1>.
Le plus importante de istos es <l0><project-dir></l0>, e optionalmente <l1>--config-dir=<config-dir></l1>.
The most that OmegaT can do in such a case, is to assume that the text is written in the same language the computer itself uses.
Le maxime que OmegaT pote facer in tal caso, es assumer que le texto es scribite in le mesme lingua que usa le computator ipse.
The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (<g0>Project > Properties</g0>).
Le nomines del files debe exactemente corresponder al codice del lingua de tu lingua final como definite in le fenestra de dialogo Proprietates del projecto (<g0>Projecto > Proprietates</g0>).
The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (Project > Properties).
Le nomines del files debe exactemente corresponder al codice del lingua de tu lingua final como definite in le fenestra de dialogo Proprietates del projecto (Projecto > Proprietates...).
The new colours have been saved.
Le nove colores esseva salvate.

The new format can also serve as a useful way of handling the legacy .doc, .xls and .ppt formats, since they can be converted to their MS Office 2007 counterparts, translated in OmegaT, and converted back again.

Le nove formato pote alsi servir como un utile maniera de tractar le vetule formatos .doc, .xls e .ppt, post que illos pote esser convertite a lor pendantes de MS Office 2007, traducite in OmegaT, e reconvertite de novo in le vetule formato.
The new set of rules will be stored together with the project and will not interfere with the general set of segmentation rules.
Le nove serie de regulas essera registrate conjunctemente con le projecto e non interferera con le serie general de regulas de segmentation.
The newline (line feed) character ('\u000A')
Le character nove linea ('\u000A')
The next segment with a note attached to it, will open.
Le segmento successive con un nota, aperira.
The number of unique segments, if needed, is provided in the standard statistics window, regardless of whether they have been translated or not.
Le numero de segmentos unic, si il necessita, es supplite in le fenestra del statisticas standard, sin reguardo re illos esseva rendite o non.
The numbers must be exactly the same between the source and the target matches.
Le numeros debe esser identic inter le concordantias original e los final.
The obtained API key needs to be passed to OmegaT at startup through <c0>yandex.api.key</c0> command-line parameter.
Tu debe passar al lanceamento a OmegaT le clave API obtenite, al lanceamento con le parametro de linea de commando <c0>yandex.api.key</c0>.
The omegat folder contains the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> and possibly a number of backup TMX files.
Le plica omegat contine le <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> e possibilemente plure files TMX de reserva.
The one and the same segment may, depending on the context, require different translations.
Le mesme segmento pote, dependente del contexto, requirer traductiones distincte.
The online version of Google Translate allows the user to correct the suggestion and send the corrected segment in.
Le version in Internet de Google Translate permitte le usator a corriger le suggestion e inviar le segmento correcte.
The only difference with matches from the <f2>project_save</f2> translation memory is that external TMs cannot give exact matches, only 100%.
Le sol differentia con le concordantias ex le memoria de traduction <f2>project_save</f2> es que le TMs externe non pote dar concordantias exacte, ma sol 100%.
The open source LanguageTool can be used to correct common grammatical and stylistic mistakes.
Le application open source LanguageTool, pote esser usate pro corriger commun errores grammatical e stilistic.
The open-source philosophy
Le philosophia open-source
The option allows OmegaT to override the specification in the PO file header and use the default for the selected target language.
Le option permitte a OmegaT de non curar se del specification in le testa del file PO e de usar le arrangiamento base initial por le lingua de destination seligite.
The option only appears when such a selection is possible.
Le option appare solo quando es possibile un selection simile.
The options for the program start-up in this case will be read from the <f1>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f1> file, which resides in the same folder as the exe file and which you can edit to reflect your setup.
Le optiones per le initio del programma in iste caso essera legite ab le file OmegaT.l4J.ini , le qual reside in le mesme plica que le file .exe e que tu pote editar per reflecter tu configuration.
The output from running a covered work is covered by this License only if the output, given its content, constitutes a covered work.
The output from running a covered work is covered by this License only if the output, given its content, constitutes a covered work.
The password cannot be empty.
Le contrasigno on non pote ser vacue.
The password you entered did not match.
Le contrasigno que tu insereva non concorda.
The passwords don't match.
Le contrasignos non concorda.
The penalty applies to all three match percentages: matches 75, 80, 90 will in this case be lowered to 45, 50, 60.
Le penalitate refere a tote le tres percentual de concordantia: concordantias 75, 80, 90 essera in iste caso diminuite a 45, 50, 60.
The perfect companion for those of us who don't need complexity but efficiency; glossaries, auto-complete and automatic translation makes my work in literary translation so much more efficient

Le perfecte companion pro illes de nos qui non besonia de complexitate, ma de efficientia; glossarios, auto-completamento e traduction automatic rende mi labor in le traduction literari tanto plus efficiente

The permissions you give to this version (which may appear as "unrestricted access to the computer") are identical to the permissions you give to the local version, i.e., they allow access to the hard drive of the computer.

Le permissiones que tu da a iste version (le qual pote apparer como "accesso libere al computator") son identic al permissiones que tu da al version local del OmegaT, id es, illos permitte accesso al disco dur del computator.

The permissions you give to this version (which may be described as "unrestricted access to the computer") are no different from the permissions you assign to the local version, i.e., an access to the hard drive of your computer.

Le permissiones que tu da a iste version (le qual pote esser describite como "accesso sin restriction al computator") non es differente del permissiones que tu assigna al version local, id es un accesso al disco dur de tu computator.
The philosophy of the project is described <a0>here</a0>.
Le philosophia del projecto es describite <a0>hic</a0>.
The platform provides
Le platteforma provide
The platform-independent package can be used on any platform with a working Java 1.6 runtime environment, including the platforms for which a specific package also exists.
Le pacchetto independente ab platteformas pote esser usate sur omne platteforma con un ambiente runtime Java 1.6 functionante, includite le platteformas pro le qual existe alsi un pacchetto specific.
The possibilities are numerous, and the procedures for implementing them no less numerous, owing to the plethora of distributions.
Le possibilitates es numerose, e le proceduras pro los implementar non minus numerose, debite al plethora de distributiones.
The possible keyevents (keys) are listed in the following Java 1.6 documentation from Oracle: <u0>Java 1.6 keyEvents description</u0>
Le possibile evento del clave(s) es listate in le documentation sequente de Java 1.6 ex Oracle: <u0>Java 1.6 vias breve e eventos de clave,</u0>>
The precise terms and conditions for copying, distribution and modification follow.
The precise terms and conditions for copying, distribution and modification follow.
The predefined break rules should be sufficient for most European languages and Japanese.
Le regulas de interruption prefixate deberea esser bastante pro le major parte del linguas europee e le japonese.
The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
Le maniera prevalente del segmentation del fontes es le segmentation a nivello de phrase, ita iste quadrato de controlo deberea in caso normal restar marcate.
The prefered location for plugin manual installs is the <l0/> folder located in the <l1>configuration</l1> folder.
Le position preferite pro installationes de plugins manual es le <l0/> plica ubicate in le <l1>plica del configuration</l1>.
The prefix (per default empty) can be used to tag translations, done via fuzzy matches.
Le prefixo (per arrangiamento initial vacue) pote esser usate pro etiquettar le traductiones, facite con concordantias partial.
The previous segment with a note will open.
Le segmento previe con un nota, aperira.
The principal members of the project are:
Le principal membros del projecto es:
The procedure is described in this HowTo.
Le procedura es describite in iste Guida.
The procedure is termed an <a0>"RFE" (Request for Feature Enhancement) and is managed here</a0>.
Le procedura es denominate <a0>"RFE" (Demanda pro functionalitate meliorative) e es tractate ci</a0>.
The procedure presented here relies on the free SVN server (limited to 2 users) offered by <u0>ProjectLocker</u0>.
Le procedura ci presentate fide sur le servitor SVN gratuite (limitate a 2 usatores) offerite per <u0>ProjectLocker</u0>.
The procedures for configuring access to the Microsoft Translator and Google Translate services are described <u0>here</u0>.
Le proceduras pro configurar le accesso al servicios Microsoft Translator e Google Translate es describite <u0>hic</u0>.

The process above describes the usual case, where the project manager wants to have full control of the project and where the files (and the statistics) are identical on both sides (server side and translator side).

Le procedura supra describe le caso usual, ubi le gestor de projecto vole haber controlo plen del projecto e ubi le files (e le statistica) es identic in ambe le lateres (del servitor e del traductor).
The process of segmenting can be pictured as follows: the cursor moves along the text, one character at a time.
Le processo de segmentation pote esser illustrate assi: le cursor move se secundo le le, un character a un vece.
The program will see confirmation before closing down.
Le programma videra le confirmation ante que clauder.
The program will seek confirmation before closing down.
Le programma cercara confirmation ante clauder.
The project and TMX source languages should of course be identical - NL in our example.
Le linguas fonte del projecto e del TMX deberea naturalmente esser identic: - NL, in nostre exemplo.
The project cannot be verified
On non pote verificar le projecto
The project default writable glossary is always a TSV file saved in UTF-8 encoding.
Le glossario scribibile predefinite del projecto es sempre un TSV-file salvate in le codification UTF-8.
The project folder {0} is missing and could not be created.
Le plica del projecto {0} es perdite e non es possibile lo crear.
The project glossary
Le glossario del projecto
The project in the example is evidently finished, as all the unique segments have been translated.
Le projecto in le exemplo es evidentemente finite, como tote le segmentos unic esseva jam rendite.
The project is empty
Le projecto es vacue
The project setting allows one to enter a name for a writable glossary file (see beginning of this chapter).
Le preparation del projecto permitte de inserer le nomines del file glossario scribibile (vide al initio de iste capitulo).
The project was converted successfully.
Le projecto esseva convertite con bon successo.
The project will be loaded as a local project without team functionality.
Le projecto essera cargate como un projecto local sin functionalitate de equipa.
The purpose of the console (i.e. command line) mode is to permit the use <a0>of OmegaT</a0> as translation tool in a scripting environment.
Le proposito del modo consola id es linea de commando) es pro permitter le uso <a0>de OmegaT</a0> como instrumento de traduction in un ambiente de script.
The purpose of the console mode is to use OmegaT as a translation tool in a scripting environment.
OmegaT in modo linea de commando
The purpose of the plan is to prevent two or more translators from working on the same translation without being aware of it (duplication of effort).
Le scopo del plan es illo de prevenir que duo o plus traductores labora sur le mesme traduction sin esser consciente (duplicatos del obras).
The quality of formatting of the translated file will depend on the quality of the round-trip conversion.
Le qualitate del formattation del file rendite dependera ex le qualitate del conversiones del giro rondo.

The quality of the Google Translate translation depends on one side on the reservoir of target-language texts and the availability of their bilingual versions, on the other hand on the quality of the models built.

Le qualitate del traduction de Google Translate depende sur un latere sur le reservoir de textos del lingua de destination e le disponibilitate de lor versiones bilingue, del altere parte sur le qualitate del modellos construite.
The question which must be answered is whether these procedures are acceptable in terms of the result and the effort involved, and the answer is likely to vary from one user to another.
Le question al qual on debe responder es si iste proceduras es acceptabile in terminos del resultato e del effortio implicate, e le responsa probabilemente variara de un usator a un altere.
The recognized extensions are <f1>TXT</f1> and <f2>UTF8</f2>
Le extensiones admittite son <f1>TXT</f1> e <f2>UTF8</f2>
The recommended or default locations are the following:
Le positiones recommendate o predefinite es sequente:
The reference to the URL is specified as below (here to a Git repository):
Le referentia al URL es specificate como infra (hic in un repositorio Git):
The regular expressions (or regex for short) used in searches and segmentation rules are those supported by Java.
Le expressiones regular (o in breve regex) usate in le regulas de recercas e de segmentation son illos supportate per Java.

The relevant files <l2>filters.conf</l2> and <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> can be found in the user home folder (E.g. <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> under Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> under Linux)

Le files pertinente <l2>filters.conf</l2> e <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> pote esser trovate in le plica principal del usator (Per exemplo <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> sub Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> sub Linux)

The relevant files are <f0>filters.conf</f0> and <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> and can be found in the user home folder (e.g. <f2>C:\Documents and Settings\<p3>user</p3>\OmegaT</f2> under Windows, <f4>~/.omegat/</f4> under Linux).

Le files pertinente es <f0>filters.conf</f0> e <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> e pote esser trovate in le plica principal del usator (e.g. <f2>C:\Documents and Settings\<p3>user</p3>\OmegaT</f2> sub Windows, <f4>~/.omegat/</f4> sub Linux).
