Le files pertinente es <f2>filters.conf</f2> e <f3>segmentation.conf</f3> e pote esser trovate in le plica principal del usator (e.g. <f4>C:\Documents and Settings\<p5>user</p5>\OmegaT</f4> sub Windows, <f6>~/.omegat/</f6> sub Linux).

The relevant files are <l2>filters.conf</l2> and <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> and can be found in the user home folder (e.g. <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> under Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> under Linux)

Le files pertinente son <l2>filters.conf</l2> e <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> e pote esser trovate in le plica domo del usator (per exemplo <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> sub Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> sub Linux)
The remote file <f0>https://github.com/omegat-org/omegat/raw/master/release/readme.txt</f0> is mapped to the local file <f1>source/readme_tr.txt</f1>.
Le file remote <f0>https://github.com/omegat-org/omegat/crude/maestro/version/readme.txt</f0> es mappate in le file local <f1>fonte/readme_tr.txt</f1>.
The remote file <f0>https://github.com/omegat-org/omegat/raw/master/src/org/omegat/Bundle.properties</f0> is mapped to the local file <f1>source/Bundle.properties</f1>.
Le file remote <f0>https://github.com/omegat-org/omegat/crude/maestro/src/org/omegat/Bundle.properties</f0> es mappate al file local <f1>fonte/Bundle.properties</f1>.
The repository is empty at this moment.
Le repositorio es vacue in iste momento.

The requirement to provide Installation Information does not include a requirement to continue to provide support service, warranty, or updates for a work that has been modified or installed by the recipient, or for the User Product in which it has been modified or installed.

The requirement to provide Installation Information does not include a requirement to continue to provide support service, warranty, or updates for a work that has been modified or installed by the recipient, or for the User Product in which it has been modified or installed.
The rest of the categories (50-100%) involves untranslated segments with a fuzzy match.
Le resto del categorias (50-100%) involve le segmentos non rendite con un concordantia partial.
The result will thus depend on the order in which the source segments have been loaded.
Le resultato dependera assi ab le ordine in le qual le segmentos fonte esseva cargate.
The resulting TMX is stored in the <f1>/omegat/</f1> folder under the name <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
Le TMX resultante es immagazinate in le plica <f1>/omegat/</f1> sub le nomine <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
The resulting TMX is stored in the <f3>omegat</f3> folder under the name <f4>align.tmx</f4>.
Le TMX resultante es immagazinate in le plica <f3>omegat</f3> sub le nomine <f4>align.tmx</f4>.
The resulting tmx is stored in the <l1>omegat </l1>folder under the name <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
Le TMX resultante es immagazinate in le plica <l1>omegat</l1> sub le nomine <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
The resulting tmx is stored in the <l1>omegat</l1> folder under the name <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
Le TMX resultante es immagazinate in le plica <l1>/omegat/</l1> sub le nomine <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
The resulting work is called a "modified version" of the earlier work or a work "based on" the earlier work.
The resulting work is called a "modified version" of the earlier work or a work "based on" the earlier work.
The results from the priority glossary (by default, glossary/glossary.txt) appear in first places in the Glossary pane and in TransTips.
Le resultatos ex le glossario del prioritate (per option predefinite, glossary/glossary.txt) appare in le prime locos in le quadro del Glossario e in le TransTips.
The results will be in the <c0>build\install\OmegaT</c0>.
Le resultatos essera in <c0>build\install\OmegaT</c0>.
The results window is laid out in the form of a table in which:
Le fenestra del resultatos exi in forma de un tabula in le qual:
The rule-based segmentation is usually synonymous with sentence-based segmentation.
Le segmentation basate sur regulas es habitualmente synonyme con segmentation basate sur phrases.
The rules applied (if any) will depend on the source and target language of the project.
Le regulas applicate (si ulle) dependera ex le lingua fonte e de destination del projecto.
The rules for that set will appear in the bottom half of the window.
Le regulas pro ce collection apparera in le medietate basso del fenestra.
The same dialog is used to add a pattern or to edit a particular pattern.
Le fenestra de dialogo pro adder un modello es le mesme que illo pro modificar un modello particular.
The same spirit can be found within the OmegaT project.
Le mesme spirito pote trovar se intra le projecto OmegaT.
The screenshot shows an example: <i0/> Remove the line break.
Le imagine del schermo monstra un exemplo: <i0/> Leva le interruption de linea.
The script "{0}" is running...
Le script "{0}" flue...
The script is available for the Windows platform only.
Le script es utilisabile solo pro le platteforma Windows.
The script will quit now.
Le script ora quitara.
The search string - [a-zA-Z]+[qw] - in the example above for instance looks for words in the target segment, containing questionable characters from German keyboard.
Le linea de character de recerca - [a-zA-Z]+[qw] - in le caso precedente per exemplo appare pro parolas in le segmento de destination, continente characteres dubitabile del claviero german.
The search string will be treated as a regular expression.
Le linea de character de recerca essera tractate como un expression regular.
The search term <l0>'run*'</l0> for example would match words <l1>'run'</l1>, <l2>'runs'</l2> and <l3>'running'</l3>.
Le termino de recerca <l0>'run*'</l0> per exemplo facerea concordar le parolas <l1>'run'</l1>, <l2>'runs'</l2> e <l3>'running'</l3>.
The search window consists of a text field for search strings or keywords, flags and radio buttons for setting up the search and a display area containing the results of the search.
Le Fenestra de Recerca consiste de un campo de texto pro lineas o parolas clave, e buttones pro le preparation del recerca e un area de monstra continente le resultatos del recerca.
The second argument <l2>--pseudotranslatetype</l2> is optional.
Le secunde argumento <l2>--pseudotranslatetype</l2> es optional.
The second command is the command which actually launches <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
Le secunde commando es le commando ver que lancea <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
The second command is the command which actually launches OmegaT.
Le secunde commando es le commando ver que lancea OmegaT.
The second is needed if the Java version you wish to use is not the default installation at system level.
Le secundo es necesse si le version Java que tu desidera usar non es le installation base a nivello de systema.
The second of these chapters describes the various subfolders and files in a translation project and their role as well as other user and application files associated with OmegaT.
Le secundo de iste capitulos describe le varie files, plicas e sub-plicas, in un projecto de traduction e lor rolo, assi como altere files del usator e applicationes associate con OmegaT.
The segment is opened when either its segment call-out or segment number is entered.
Le segmento es aperte sia quando su call-out sia su numero de segmento es inserite.
The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects.
Le regulas del segmentation son generalmente valide trans tote le projectos.
The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Le configurationes del segmentation adressa sol le maniera con le qual le Files fonte son tractate per <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by OmegaT.
Le configurationes del segmentation adressa sol le maniera con le qual le Files fonte son tractate per OmegaT.
The segments are displayed in order of appearance in the project.
Le segmentos son monstrate in ordine de apparition in le projecto.
The selected attributes will appear as translatable segments in the <g0>Editor</g0> pane.
Le attributos seligite apparera como segmentos traductibile in le fenestra <g0>Rediger</g0>.
The selected fuzzy match is highlighted in bold, words that are missing in the segment you are translating are colored blue and words adjacent to the missing parts green.
Le concordantia partial seligite es marcate in nigrato, le parolas que es mancante in le segmento que tu rende es colorate azur e le parolas adjacente al partes mancante in verde.
The selected languages will then be installed and will eventually appear in your spell checker setup window (this may take a while).
Le linguas seligite alora essera installate e eventualmente apparera in tu fenestra de preparation del corrector orthographic (isto pote prender un lapso).
The separators between the panes can be dragged to resize panes.
Quando isto is facite le quadros monstra un linguetta al summitate.
The server can exist in the local network but in the majority of cases it will be available on internet, i.e. via URL address.
Le servitor pote exister in le rete local, ma in le majoritate del casos illo essera disponibile sur Internet, id es via un adresse URL.
The server is not a valid Apertium server.
Le servitor non es un servitor Apertium valide.
The server keeps the information on checkouts, so that later commits (see below) can be performed in an orderly fashion.
Le servitor retene le informationes discargate durante le discarga, de maniera que plus tarde le consignas (vide in infra) pote esser exequite in un maniera ordinate.
The server makes sure that any conflicting changes, due to two members working on the same checked-out contents, will be resolved.
Le servitor se assecura que tote le cambios que conflige, per duo membros que opera sur le mesme contentos discargate, essera resolute.
The set of <e0>Unique </e0>segments is computed by taking all the segments and removing all duplicate segments.
Le serie de segmentos <e0>Unic </e0>es computate per retener tote le segmentos e remover tote le segmentos duplicate.
The set of <e0>Unique</e0> segments is computed by taking all the segments and removing all duplicate segments.
Le serie de segmentos <e0>Unic</e0> es computate per retener tote le segmentos e remover tote le segmentos duplicate.
The settings in your project indicate which is the source and which the target language.
Le configurationes in tu projecto indica qual es le lingua fonte e qual le lingua de destination.
The shortcut characters used try to reflect the underlying meaning of the tag (e.g. b for bold, i for italics, etc.)
Le characteres de connexion usate tende a reflecter le natural significato del tag (exempli gratia b pro bold, i pro italics, etc.)
The shortcut definition file must be named <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> and must contain at most one shortcut definition per line.
Le file definition del via breve debe esser nominate <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> e debe continer al maximo un definition de via breve per cata linea.

The shortcut definition syntax is the following: <c0><menu item code>=<shortcut></c0>, where <e1><menu item code></e1> is a code taken from the tables below and <e2><shortcut></e2> is a combination of pressed keys specified by the user

Le syntaxe de definition del via breve es le sequente: <c0><codice del commando del menu>=<via breve></c0>, ubi <e1><codice del commando del menu></e1> es un codice ex le tabellas sequente e <e2><via breve></e2> es un combination de percussiones de clave specificate per le usator
The shortcut selects the Nth match displayed in the match window (the first match is selected by default)
Le via breve selige le concordantia #N monstrate in le Quadro del concordantia (le prime concordantia es seligite per arrangiamento initial)
The shortcuts <k2>Ctrl+A</k2> and <k3>Ctrl+C</k3> work in panes, allowing to copy all or some of the information to the clipboard.
Le vias breve <k2>Ctrl+A</k2> e <k3>Ctrl+C</k3> opera in le quadros pro copiar tote o alcun del informationes al tabula del fragmento.
The simplest way to launch OmegaT, however, is to execute the <f0>OmegaT.exe</f0> program.
Le maniera plus simple per lancear OmegaT, tamen, es executar le programma <f0>OmegaT.exe</f0>.
The simplest way to launch OmegaT, however, is to execute the<e0> <a1>OmegaT</a1>.exe</e0> program.
Le maniera plus simple pro lancear OmegaT, comocunque, es exequer le programma <e0> <a1>OmegaT</a1>.exe</e0>.
The solution in our example is to copy the existing translation memory into the <f0>tm/tmx2source/</f0> subfolder and rename it to ZH_CN.tmx to indicate the target language of the tmx.
Le solution in nostre exemplo es de copiar le memoria de traduction existente in le sub plica <f0>tm/tmx2source/</f0> e renominar lo ZH_CN.tmx pro indicar le nove lingua de destination del TMX.
The solution in our example is to copy the existing translation memory into the tm/tmx2source/ subfolder and rename it to ZH_CN.tmx to indicate the target language of the tmx.
Le solution in nostre exemplo es de copiar le memoria de traduction existente in le sub plica tm/tmx2source/ e renominar lo ZH_CN.tmx pro indicar le nove lingua de destination del TMX.
The source and target encoding fields use drop-down menus containing all the supported encodings.
Le campos de codification fonte e de destination usa menus a tenta cadente continente tote le codificationes supportate.
The source and target encoding fields use drop-down menus listing all supported encodings.
Le campos de codification de fonte e de destination usa menus a tenta cadente que lista tote le codificationes supportate.
The source and target files can have different formats (for example, a <f0>.docx</f0> file can be aligned with a <f1>.pdf</f1> file).
Le files fonte e de destination pote haber differente formatos (per exemplo, un file <f0>.docx</f0> pote esser alineate con un <f1>.pdf</f1> file).
The source file language entered is invalid!
Le lingua del file fonte inscribite es invalide!
The source file name is one of the elements that characterize an alternative translation.
Le nomine del file fonte es un del elementos que characterisa un traduction alternative.
The source segment and the fuzzy matches must contain the same list of numbers
Le segmento fonte e le concordantias partial debe continer le identic lista de numeros

The source segment in the example below was <e0>Context menu command</e0>, as in the Fuzzy Matches example above, and the terms shown were found in the glossaries, available (Microsoft's Term collection and Slovenian Linux User group Glossary).

Le segmento original in le exemplo sequente era <e0>Commando del menu contexto</e0>, como in le exemplo de concordantias partial precedente, e le terminos monstrate esseva trovate in le glossarios, disponibile (Microsoft's Term collection e Slovenian Linux User group Glossary).
The source subfolder contains files to be translated.
Le subplica /source contine le files a traducer.
The source term can be a multi-word term.
Le termino fonte pote esser un termino multi-parola.
The source term does not have to be a single-word item, as the next example shows:
Le termino fonte non debe esser necessarimente de un sol parola, como monstra le exemplo sequente:
The source term is displayed before the " = " sign and the target terms after.
Le termino fonte es monstrate ante le signo " = " e le terminos destino postea.
The source text
Le texto fonte
The sources of the current version can be retrieved with a Git client from the repository <u0/> or directly on <u1>SourceForge</u1>.
Le fontes del actual version pote esser recuperate con un cliente Git ab le repositorio <u0/> o directemente sur <u1>SourceForge</u1>.
The sources of the current version can be retrieved with a SVN client from the repository <u0/> or directly on <u1>SourceForge</u1>.
Le fontes del actual version pote esser recuperate ab le repositorio per un application SVN <u0/> o directemente sur <u1>SourceForge</u1>.
The specified dictionary folder cannot be used.
Le plica specificate del dictionario non pote ser usate.
The specified dictionary folder does not exist.
Le plica specificate del dictionario non existe.
The specified files are not supported.
Le files specificate non es gerite.
The specified project is an OmegaT 3.6-style team project.
Le projecto specificate es un projecto de equipa in stilo OmegaT 3.6.
The specified translation direction is not supported
Le direction de traduction specificate non es supportate

The spell checker uses the target language code to determine the language to be used : if the target language is Brazilian Portuguese (PT_BR), the subfolder with vocabularies must contain the two vocabulary files, called <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.

Le corrector orthographic usa le codice del lingua final pro determinar le lingua a usar: si le lingua final es brasilian portugese (PT_BR), le sub plica con le vocabularios debe continer le duo files vocabulario nominate <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.

tu.note: Lingua final o lingua de destination?

tuv.seg: The spell checker uses the target language code to determine the language to be used : if the target language is Brazilian Portuguese (PT_BR), the subfolder with vocabularies must contain the two vocabulary files, called <f0>pt_br.aff</f0> and <f1>pt_br.dic</f1>.

Le corrector orthographic usa le codice del lingua de destination pro determinar le lingua a usar: si le lingua de destination es portugese brasilian (PT_BR), le sub plica con le vocabularios debe continer le duo files vocabulario nominate <f0>pt_br.aff</f0> and <f1>pt_br.dic</f1>.
The standard is still undergoing development; this is what the different versions refer to.
Le standard es ancora in evolution; i.e. al que se refere le differente versiones.
The statistics shown is available as a tab-separated <f1>project_stats.txt</f1> file (subfolder <f2>omegat</f2>), ready to be loaded into a spreadsheet program for the user's convenience.

Le statisticas monstrate es disponibile como un file 'separate per signos de tabulation' <f1>project_stats.txt</f1> (sub plica <f2>omegat</f2>), preste a esser cargate in un programma de folio de calculo pro le commoditate del usator.
The statistics window - accessed via <e0>Tools>Statistics </e0>- shows the statistics of the current OmegaT project, both in the summary form as well as in detail for every file to be translated.
Le fenestra del statisticas - accedite con <e0>Instrumentos>Statisticas </e0>- monstra le statisticas del projecto OmegaT actual, sia in le forma summario sia in detalio pro cata file a traducer.
The status bar displays work-flow related messages at the bottom of the main window.
Le barra de stato monstra messages pertinente le fluxo de labor al fundo del fenestra principal.
The supported file formats are those listed in <m0> <g1>Project</g1> <g2>Properties</g2> <g3>File Filters</g3> </m0>.
Le formatos de file supportate es illos in le lista de presentation in <m0> <g1>Projecto</g1> <g2>Proprietates</g2> <g3>Filtros de file</g3> </m0>.
The symbol for your macro should appear in the toolbar.
Le symbolo pro tu macro deberea apparer in le barra del instrumentos.
The syntax of the language pattern conforms to regular expression syntax.
Le syntaxe del schema del lingua conforma al syntaxe del expression regular.
The system maintains versioning for data shared
Le systema gere le controlo de version pro le datos in commun
The system will output details of the Java version already installed at system level.
Le systema emittera detalios del version de Java jam installate a nivello de systema.
The systematic pattern of such abuse occurs in the area of products for individuals to use, which is precisely where it is most unacceptable.
The systematic pattern of such abuse occurs in the area of products for individuals to use, which is precisely where it is most unacceptable.
The tab character ('\u0009')
Le character de tabulation ('\u0009')
The tag validation window detects and lists any tag errors and inconsistencies in the translation.
Le fenestra de validation del tag releva e lista omne errores del tag e contradictiones in le traduction.
The tags are displayed in a different font in order to make them less intrusive.
Le tags es monstrate in un differente typo de character pro render los minus intrusive.
The tags are highlighted in bold blue for easy comparison between the original and the translated contents.
Le tags es marcate in blau nigrato pro un facile comparation inter los original e le contentos rendite.
The tags consist of one to three characters and a number.
Le tags consiste de uno a tres characteres e un numero.
The tags in OmegaT are greyed, so they are easy to recognise.
Le tags in OmegaT son gris, assi illos son facile a recognoscer.
The target filename pattern uses a special syntax, so if you want to edit this field, you must click <e0>Edit...</e0>and use the Edit Pattern Dialog.
Le modello de nomine de file de destination usa un special syntaxe, assi si tu desira rediger iste campo, tu debe cliccar <e0>Rediger...</e0>e usar le Fenestra de dialogo Rediger modello.
The target filename pattern uses a special syntax, so if you wish to edit this field, you must click <e0>Edit...</e0>and use the <i1/>Edit Pattern Dialog.
Le modello nomine de file de destination usa un syntaxe special, assi si tu desidera modificar iste campo, tu debe cliccar <e0>Modifica...</e0>e usar le <i1/>Fenestra de dialogo del Modifica Modello.
The target filename pattern uses a special syntax.
Le modello de nomine de file de destination usa un syntaxe special.
The target text entered after that will be treated as an alternative translation of the source segment.
Le texto final inscribite post que essera tractate ut un traduction alternative del segmento original.
The team can also use the same subfolder structure for the target files.
Le equipa pote alsi usar le mesme structura de sub plica pro le files final.
The term "Move to inside segment" means, that the cursor moves to the beginning of the segment if it was previously before the segment, and to the end of the segment if it was previously after it.
Le termino "Mover al interno del segmento" significa, que le cursor se move al initio del segmento si illo esseva locate ante le segmento, e al fin del segmento si illo esseva postea.

The terms of this License will continue to apply to the part which is the covered work, but the special requirements of the GNU Affero General Public License, section 13, concerning interaction through a network will apply to the combination as such.

The terms of this License will continue to apply to the part which is the covered work, but the special requirements of the GNU Affero General Public License, section 13, concerning interaction through a network will apply to the combination as such.
The text could not be translated
Le texto non pote esser rendite
The text export function exports data from within the current <a0>OmegaT</a0> project to plain text files.
Le function Exporta texto, exporta datos ex le projecto actual de <a0>OmegaT</a0> in files de texto simple.
The text export function exports data from within the current OmegaT project to plain text files.
Le function Exporta texto, exporta datos ex le projecto actual de OmegaT in files de texto simple.
The text export function exports data from within the current OmegaT project to plain-text files.
Le function de exportation del texto exporta datos ex le projecto OmegaT currente in files de texto simple.

tu.note: Modificar o Rediger? Que es le differentia? In le menu de OmegaT sta Rediger.

tuv.seg: The text highlighted by the user, when <k0><k1>Ctrl</k1><k2>Shift</k2><k3>C</k3></k0> is pressed or <m4><g5>Edit</g5><g6>Export Selection</g6></m4> is selected (<f7>selection.txt</f7>).
Le texto marcate per le usator, quando es pulsate <k0><k1>Ctrl</k1><k2>+Shift</k2><k3>+C</k3></k0> o es seligite <m4><g5>Modificar</g5><g6> > Exportar le Selection</g6></m4> (<f7>selection.txt</f7>).
The text highlighted by the user, when <k0>Ctrl+Shift+C</k0> is pressed or <g1>Edit > Export Selection</g1> is selected (<f2>selection.txt</f2>).
Le texto marcate per le usator, quando es pulsate <k0>Ctrl+Shift+C</k0> o es seligite <g1>Modificar > Exportar le Selection</g1> (<f2>selection.txt</f2>).

tu.note: Qual version prefere tu? "....on entra un nove segmento" o "....un nove segmento es entrate"?

tuv.seg: The text in the file is replaced each time a new segment is entered.
*** Le texto in le file es substituite cata vice que on entra un nove segmento.
The text in the file is replaced each time this function is called.
Le texto in le file es replaciate cata vice que iste functiona es invocate.
The text is exported to a plain text file.
Le texto es exportate in un file de texto simple.
The text size exceeds the maximum
Le dimension del texto supera le maximo
The third column can be used for additional information.
Le tertie columna pote esser usate pro information additional (commentos).
The third option, i.e. installing an OmegaT version with Java included at local level, is always the "safe" option, and is recommended.
Le tertie option, id es installar un version de OmegaT con Java includite a nivello local, es semper le option "secur", e es recommendate.
The three matching percentages are in the following order:
Le tres percentages concordante es in le sequente ordine:
The title of the dialog reflects the file actually used (which depends on how many instances of OmegaT are running concurrently).
Le titulo del fenestra de dialogo reflecte le file actualmente usate (que depende de quante instantias de OmegaT es fluente insimul).
The tmx file can be given any name you specify.
Al file TMX pote esser date omne nomine que tu attribue.
The tokenizer plug-in was integrated into OmegaT in version 3.0.0.
Le plug-in tokenizer era integrate in OmegaT in le version 3.0.0.
The top match is 100%, because all words match.
Le concordantia summe es 100%, proque omne parolas concorda.

The traditional Wordfast translation memory file format is of particular interest owing to its simplicity: it consists of a plain-text file with a translation unit (segment) on each line in which the source and target are separated by a tab.

Le traditional formato de memoria de traduction de Wordfast es de particular interesse debite a su simplicitate: il consiste de un file de texto simple con un elemento de traduction (segmento) sur cata linea in le qual le origine e le destination es separate con un tabulation.
The translated file language entered is invalid!
Le lingua del file rendite inscribite es invalide!
The translated files will then need to be converted back to the original format.
Le files rendite necessitara deinde esser convertite a reverso al formato original.
The translated text can then be re-imported into Infix Professional.
Le texto rendite pote pois esser re-importate in Infix Professional.
The translation has changed.
Le traduction cambiava.
The translation in this tmx can be either
Le traduction in iste TMX pote esser o
The translation may for example be passed to a checker for editing.
Le traduction pote per exemplo esser passate a un corrector pro lo editar.
The translation stage is only part of the customer's workflow.
Le stadio del traduction es sol parte del fluxo de labor del cliente.
The translation work
Le labor de traduction

The translator can add notes to the opened segment, for instance to come back later to the segment and redo the translation, check that alternative translations are correct or to ask colleagues for their opinion.

Le traductor pote adder notas al segmento aperte, per exemplo pro retornar plus tarde al segmento e refacer le traduction, controlar que le traductiones alternative es correcte o pro demandar al collegas lor opinion.
The translator has a text containing the phrase "abc", and has completed a first draft of it, translating "abc" as "abc".
Le traductor ha un texto continente le phrase "abc", e ha completate un prime minuta de illo, rendente "abc" quam "abc".
The translator will be shown English translations for source segments in Dutch and use them to create the Chinese translation.
Al traductor essera monstrate traductiones anglese pro le segmentos fonte in nederlandese e usa los pro crear le traduction chinese.
The two entries required are available in your <u1>account page</u1> under Primary account key and Customer-ID:
Le duo entratas requirite son disponibile in tu <u1>pagina del conto</u1> sub clave del conto Primari e Customer-ID:
The two types of rules behave as follows:
Le duo typos de regulas conduce se como seque:
The underlined item "pop-up menu" can be found in the glossary pane as "pojavni menu".
Le termino sublineate del "menu pop-up" pote esser trovate in le quadro pro le Glossario como "pojavni menu".

The upper part is in the source language, in bold characters with a green background color, the lower part is the editing field, ended by a marker: <i0/>the marker is <l1><segment nnnn></l1> where nnnn is a number of the segment in the project.

Le parte superior es in le lingua original, in characteres nigrate con un color de fundo verde, le parte inferior es le campo de modifica, terminate per un marcator: <i0/>le marcator es <l1><segment nnnn></l1> ubi nnnn es le un numero del segmento in le projecto.

The upper part is in the source language, in bold characters with a green background color, the lower part is the editing field, ended by a marker: the marker is <l0><segment nnnn></l0> where nnnn is a number of the segment in the project.

Le parte superior es in le lingua fonte, in characteres nigrate con un color de fundo verde, le parte inferior es le campo de modifica, terminate per un marcator: le marcator es <l0><segment nnnn></l0> ubi nnnn es un numero de segmento in le projecto.
The user can therefore see immediately that a segment in grey, rather than black, has already been checked.
Le usator pote in consequentia vider immediatemente que un segmento in gris, plus tosto que nigre, esseva jam verificate.
The user group also serves as the main point of contact between users and the project team.
Le Gruppo del usator alsi servi como puncto principal de contacto pro usatores e equipa del projecto.
The user interface
Le interfacie del usator
The user interface and documentation were originally written in English.
Le interfacie de usator e le documentation esseva in origine scribite in anglese.
The user manual for OmegaT in PDF format ({{ site.data.versions.standard.name }}).
Le manual de usator pro OmegaT in formato PDF ({{ site.data.versions.standard.name }}).
The user manual is an HTML document with links to different chapters.
Le manual del usator es un documento HTML con ligamines a capitulos varie.

The user manual is located in the docs subfolder under the OmegaT installation folder, so you may can, for instance, view the English documentation by opening the <f0>docs/en/index.html </f0>file in your browser.

Le manual del usator es ubicate in le sub plica /docs sub le plica de installation de OmegaT, assi tu potera, per exemplo, examinar le documentation anglese per aperir le file <f0>docs/en/index.html </f0>in tu lector.
The user, however, may need to generate a set of rules, specific to the project in question.
Le usator, tamen, pote necessitar de generar un serie de regulas, specific pro le projecto in question.
The validate tags function detects changes to tag sequences (whether deliberate or accidental), and shows the affected segments.
Le function valida tags releva cambios al sequentias del tag (an deliberate o accidental), e monstra le segmentos affligite.
The version for installation by the user, familiar to existing OmegaT users.
Version pro le installation per le usator, familiar al usatores existente de OmegaT.
The vocabulary entry can have a comment added.
Al entrata del vocabulario pote esser addite un commento.
The warning takes the form of the text in the script window being highlighted in yellow.
Le advertimento sume le forma del texto in le fenestra de script marcate in jalne.
The web pages are not licensed for re-use.
Le paginas web non es concedite in licentia pro los reusar.
The whole process can be steered and controlled via Tck/Tcl-based scripting.
Toto le processo pote esser governate e controlate con scriptes basate sur Tck/Tcl.
The window that opens when <g2>Ctrl+Shift+V</g2> is pressed features a 3-column table with a link to the segment, the original segment and the target segment.
Le fenestra que aperi quando es pulsate <g2>Ctrl+Shift+V</g2> presenta un tabella a tres columnas con un ligamine al segmento, le segmento fonte e le segmento de destination.
The word [Fuzzy] is displayed on the source segment.
Le parola [Fuzzy] es monstrate sur the segmento fonte.
The word before the = sign is the source term, and its translation is (or are) the words after =.
Le parola ante le signo '=' es le termino original, e su traduction es le parola(s) post le signo '='.
The word or phrase is entered in the <e3>Search for</e3> box automatically.
Le parola o phrase es inserite automaticamente in le quadro <e3>Cercar pro</e3>
The word or phrase is entered in the <g3>Search for</g3> box automatically.
Le parola o phrase es inserite automaticamente in le quadro <g3>Cercar pro</g3>
The writable project glossary is located in the <l0/> folder by default and called <l1/>.
Per ordinario, le glossario del projecto que pote esser scribite se trova in le plica <l0/> e se appella <l1/>.
The writeable glossary file is not in the glossary folder.
Le file glossario scribibile non es in le plica del glossario
The writeable glossary file must be inside the glossary folder
Le file glossario scribibile debe trovar se intra le plica del glossario
The<u0> <a1>OmegaT</a1> web site </u0>contains links to numerous <a2>OmegaT</a2> resources.
Le sito web de<u0> <a1>OmegaT</a1> </u0>contine ligamines verso numerose ressources <a2>OmegaT</a2>.
Their contents will not be displayed for translation.
Lor contentos non essera monstrate pro le traduction.
Theme
Thema
Theme can also be added as plugins.
Le thema anque pote esser addite como plugins.
Theme:
Thema:
Then click on <e0>Search</e0> button to display all the corresponding occurrences.
Clicca alora sur le button <e0>Cercar</e0> pro monstrar tote le occurrentias correspondente.
Then click on <g0>Search</g0> button to display all the corresponding occurrences.
Clicca alora sur le button Cercar pro monstrar tote le occurrentias correspondente.
Then enter the launch command itself, and confirm with ENTER.
Ergo inscribe le commando ipse de lanceamento, e confirma con ENTER.
Then launch OmegaT normally.
Postea lancear OmegaT normalmente.
Then move the end of the highlighting one character to the left so that it does not include the paragraph mark.
Pois move le fin del marca un character al sinistra de sorta que on non include le marca del paragrapho.
Then on the right, under Macros, select levelformat (or whatever you called your macro).
Pois al dextra, sub Macros, selige "NivellarFormato" (o qualcunque tu ha nominate tu macro).
Then save the changes and re-export the PDF to the XML file (and change the file extension etc.), and reload your OmegaT project.
Pois salva le cambiamentos e re-exporta le PDF al file XML (e cambia le extension del file etc.), e recarga tu projecto OmegaT.
Then select "Paste Special" (Word 2003) or click on the arrow at the bottom of the "Insert" button (Word 2007) to obtain the extended Paste options.
Pois selige "Colla Special" (Word 2003) o clicca sur le flecha al base del button "Inserer" (Word 2007) pro obtener le optiones extendite de Collar.
Then tick the "Export the segment to text files" box.
Pois marca le cassa: "Exportar le segmento in files de texto".
Then type in:
Deinde scribe:
Then while translating from Canadian French your project will use all the rules defined for all the language chain in the correct order.
Alora in le traduction ab le francese canadian tu projecto usara tote le regulas definite pro tote le catena de lingua in le correcte arrangiamento.
Then you must put this TMX file in the /tm/ or /tm/auto/ folder of your OmegaT project.
Pois tu debe poner iste file TMX in le plica /tm/ o /tm/auto/ de tu projecto OmegaT.
Then you must use <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>M</k9> </k7> a second time, to insert the suggestion.
Pois tu debe usar <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>M</k9> </k7> un secunde vice, pro inserer le suggestion.
Then you need a translation in e.g. Chinese, but your translator does not understand Dutch; she, however, understands perfectly English.
Pois tu necessita un traduction in per exemplo chinese, ma tu traductor non comprende le nederlandese; illa, comocunque, comprende a perfection le anglese.
Then, after selecting a suitable menu, add a submenu/item with <e0>File - New</e0> Submenu and <e1>File - New Item</e1>.
Pois, post seligite un menu convenibile, adde un sub menu o un commando con <e0>File - Nove</e0> Sub menu e <e1>File - Nove Commando</e1>.
Then, on the command line, type:
Eo, sur le linea de commando, scribe:
There are 2 kinds of glossary files:
Il ha 2 sortas de files glossario:
There are a number of restrictions:
Il ha plure restrictiones:
There are actually three match estimates available (66/66/30 in the case of the match #4 above).
Il ha in veritate tres concordantia estimate disponibile (66/66/30 in le caso del concordantia #4 precedente).
There are at least 3 ways to specify your address:
Il ha al minus 3 manieras pro specificar tu adresse

There are at least three reasons why a customer may request delivery of a translation in a particular bilingual file format (rather than simply delivery of the translated file and possibly also the translation memory):

Il ha al minus tres rationes proque un cliente pote demandar le livration de un traduction in un particular formato de file bilingue (plus tosto que simplemente livration del file rendite e possibilemente alsi le memoria de traduction):
There are basically three ways to address this problem in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Il ha in fundo tres manieras pro abbordar iste problema in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
There are basically two types of file formats, plain text and formatted text.
Il ha basicamente duo typos de formatos de file, texto simple e texto formattate.
There are essentially two ways in which you can do this.
On ha essentialmente duo manieras pro lo far.
There are many plugins available for OmegaT online.
Il ha plure plugins disponibile pro OmegaT in internet
There are no local working copies in {0}.
Il ha nulle copias local functionante in {0}.
There are no terms in the current segment which match any terms in the glossary.
Il non ha nulle terminos in le segmento currente que concorda con alicun terminos in le glossario.

There are numerous ways of achiving this, but one practical solution is to use a script which "listens" for changes in the translated file(s) produced by OmegaT and then, when a change is detected, automatically launches the utility which converts the file(s) to html format in order for them to be read by the browser.

Il ha numerose manieras de obtener isto, ma un solution practic es de usar un script que "ascolta" le cambios in le file(s) rendite producite per OmegaT e alora, quando un cambio es detectate, automaticamente lancea le utilitate que converte le file(s) in formato html pro los render legibile al lector del tela.
There are several methods to specify the file's encoding so that its contents are not garbled when opened in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Il ha plure methodos pro specificar le codification del file de maniera que su contentos non es alterate quando aperte in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
There are two possibilities to run an SVN server: you can install SVN on your own server or you can use a hosted service.
Il ha duo possibilitates pro facer fluer un servitor de SVN: tu pote installar SVN sur tu proprie servitor o tu pote usar un servicio sur un hospite.
There are two strategies for segments that contain only such invariable text.
Il ha duo strategias pro le segmentos que contine solmente tal texto invariabile.
There are two ways of launching <a1>OmegaT</a1> using the command line.
Il ha duo manieras de lancear <a1>OmegaT</a1> per un linea de commando.
There are two ways of launching OmegaT using the command line.
Il ha duo manieras de lancear OmegaT per un linea de commando.
There is a strong possibility that at some points, your translation will be longer than the original.
Il ha un forte possibilitate que a alicun punctos, tu traduction essera plus longe que lo original.
There is however considerable scope within the project for users to suggest improvements and influence the course of future development.
Il ha totevia considerabile areas intra le projecto pro le usatores pro suggerer meliorationes e influentiar le curso de evolution futur.
There is no EXACT match between the glossary entry and the source text in your document - for instance plurals.
Il non ha concordantia EXACTE inter le entrata del glossario e le texto original in tu documento - per exemplo plurales.
There is no need to instruct OmegaT to use a particular spelling dictionary; OmegaT will use the correct language dictionary based upon the language codes of your project.
Il non ha alicun necesse a instruer OmegaT pro usar un particular dictionario orthographic; OmegaT usara le dictionario del correcte lingua in base al codices del lingua de tu projecto.

There is no way of translating a scanned PDF file other than to recreate the text, either by typing it out again or by OCR (optical character recognition), and to recreate the file layout from scratch.
Ma il non ha maniera de render un file PDF scandite altere que recrear su texto, o per lo dactylographar o per su recognition per un OCR, e recrear le file ex novo.
There may be a delay in publishing signed versions.
On pote haber un retardo a publicar le versiones signate.
There may be a delay in publishing the Notarized version.
On pote haber un retardo a publicar le versiones notariate.
There may be cases where you have done a project with e.g. Dutch sources, and a translation in say English.
Poterea esser le casos ubi tu ha facite un projecto con per exemplo fontes nederlandese, e un translation in anglese.
There may be older versions of the documentation and/or translation memories (TMX files) available for your language which are useful to your translation.
On pote haber vetule versiones del memorias de traduction (files TMX) e/o documentation disponibile pro le lingua, que es utile pro le traduction.
There should be three files, with extensions <e1>dz, idx </e1>and <e2>ifo</e2>.
Ibi deberea esser tres files, con extensiones <e1>dz, idx </e1>e <e2>ifo</e2>.
There should be three files, with extensions <f2>dz, idx </f2>and <f3>ifo</f3>.
Ibi deberea esser tres files, con extensiones <f2>dz, idx </f2>e <f3>ifo</f3>.
There was an error initializing LanguageTool.
Un error occurreva al initialisation de LanguageTool.
Therefore, by modifying or propagating a covered work, you indicate your acceptance of this License to do so.
Therefore, by modifying or propagating a covered work, you indicate your acceptance of this License to do so.
Therefore, press <k0><k1>Ctrl</k1><k2>Shift</k2><k3>V</k3></k0> before you generate your translated files, to validate that your tags are correct.
Eo, que tu pulsa <k0><k1>Ctrl+</k1><k2>Shift+</k2><k3>V</k3></k0> ante que tu genera tu files rendite, pro validar que tu tags son correcte.
Therefore, press <k0>Ctrl+Shift+V</k0> before you generate your translated files, to validate that your tags are correct.
Eo, que tu pulsa <k0>Ctrl+T+V</k0> ante que tu genera tu files rendite, pro validar que tu tags son correcte.
Therefore, the location of OmegaT's configuration folder cannot be reliably determined.
Pro isto, le position del plica de configuration de OmegaT non pote esser determinate con bastante confidentia.
Therefore, we have designed this version of the GPL to prohibit the practice for those products.
Therefore, we have designed this version of the GPL to prohibit the practice for those products.
Therefore, you have certain responsibilities if you distribute copies of the software, or if you modify it: responsibilities to respect the freedom of others.
Therefore, you have certain responsibilities if you distribute copies of the software, or if you modify it: responsibilities to respect the freedom of others.
These actions infringe copyright if you do not accept this License.
These actions infringe copyright if you do not accept this License.
These are the files present in the /source folder in a format that OmegaT is able to recognize.
Istos es le files presente in le plica /source in un formato que OmegaT es habile a recognoscer.
These are the files present in the <f0>source</f0> folder in a format that OmegaT is able to recognize.
Istos es le files presente in le plica <f0>/source</f0> in un formato que OmegaT es habile a recognoscer.
These control characters change directionality but are invisible.
Iste characteres de controlo cambia directionalitate sed es invisibile.
These define subsegments that are presented outside the segment in which they are contained (footnotes are a good example).
Istos defini sub-segmentos que es presentate foras del segmento in le qual illos es continite (le notas al pede del pagina es un bon exemplo).
These file filters are excellent, and the risk of damaging the formatting of a LibreOffice, OpenOffice.org, etc. file during translation in OmegaT is extremely low.
Iste filtros de file es excellente, e le risco de damnificar le formato de un file LibreOffice, OpenOffice.org, etc. file durante le traduction in OmegaT es extrememente basse.
These file formats are proprietary, binary, and until recently were not publicly documented, all characteristics which make them extremely difficult to handle in a CAT tool.

Iste formatos de file es proprietari, binari e usque al ultime tempore non esseva publicamente documentate, totos characteristicas que rende extrememente difficile los tractar in un application CAT (Traduction Assistite per le Computator).
These file formats are the equivalent of Microsoft Office's formats.
Iste formatos de file es le equivalente del formatos de Microsoft Office.
These files are copies of the file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>, i.e. of the project's main translation memory, excluding the so-called orphan segments.
Iste files es copias del file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>, id es del memoria de traduction del projecto principal, sin le si-appellate segmentos orphane.
These files record various internal state and program event messages generated while OmegaT is running.
Iste files registra varie messages del stato interne e eventos de programma genera durante OmegaT exeque.
These files won't be deleted automatically on the translator's side: you must ask them to delete the files manually.
Iste files non essera delite automaticamente sur le latere del traductor: tu debe requirer los pro deler le files manualmente.
These formats are formally known as "Office Open XML", and have the extensions .docx, .xlsx and .pptx respectively.
Iste formatos es formalmente note como "Office Open XML", e ha respectivemente le extensiones .docx, .xlsx e .pptx.
These option specify the way OmegaT creates tags from the XLIFF contents.
Iste optiones specifica como OmegaT crea tags de le contentos de XLIFF.
These segments are marked and delimited by special characters and MS Word formatting styles.
Iste segmentos es marcate e delimitate con characteres special e stilos de formato MS Word.
These settings apply to OmegaT level, to all projects.
Iste parametros es applicate a nivello de OmegaT, pro tote le projectos.
These three are certain: Death, taxes, and page not found You, victim of one
Iste tres cosas es certe: Morte, taxas, e pagina non trovate Tu, es victima de un

These three are certain:

Death, taxes, and page not found.

You, victim of one.

Tres es le cosas certe:

Le morte, le impostos, la pagina non trovate.

Tu, es victima de uno.
These translation memories can be very useful when a document that has already been translated needs to be updated.
Iste memorias de traduction pote esser multo utile in un documento ja rendite, que necessita solo de un ajornamento.
These units have been skipped.
Iste unitates esseva saltate.
These utilities enable OmegaT to be used to translate file formats for which XLIFF conversion filters are available.
Iste utilitates habilita OmegaT a esser usate pro render formatos de file pro le qual es disponibile filtros de conversion in XLIFF.
They all involve the application of file filters in the<e1> Options </e1>menu.
Illos omne implica le application de filtros de file in le menu<e1> Optiones</e1>.
They also improve glossary matching.
Illos meliora alsi la concordantia del glossario.
They are commonly created in word processors or HTML editors.
Illos son create communmente in applicationes de tractamento texto o editores de formato HTML .
They are defined as follows:
Illos es definite ut seque:
They are displayed as <EMPTY> in the Editor.
Illos son monstrate como <EMPTY> in le Editor.
They are not able to contain or retain information regarding the color, font etc of the text.
Illos non es habile a continer o servar information re le color, le typo de character et cetera del texto.
They are protected, so that you cannot modify their contents, but you can delete them, enter them by hand or move them around in the target sentence.
Illos son sin protection, assi tu pote deler los, inscriber los a mano o mover illos circum le phrase final.
They are terminology files in a format recognized by OmegaT.
Iste es files de terminologia in un formate recognoscite by OmegaT.
They are the files you deal with on a daily basis while translating.
Illos es le files que tu tracta sur un base quotidian dum tu rende.
They can be created and updated manually or imported from other projects.
Illos pote esser create e actualisate manualmente o importate de altere projectos.
They can be found in the folders of the corresponding compiled versions.
On los pote trovar in le plicas del versiones compilate correspondente.
They can be used to:
Illos pote esser utilisate pro:
They can share common material, like project translation memory and its glossary
Illes pote usar material in commun, como la memorias de traduction del projecto e su glossarios
They can then create their own projects and, deliver their own <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>, when finished or when a given milestone has been reached.
Illes pote ergo crear lor proprie projectos e, committer lor proprie <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>, quando finite o quando un certe petra milliari columna milliari esseva arrivate.
They carry appropriately changed names, so that its contents still remain identifiable, when used elsewhere, for instance in the <f1>tm</f1> subfolder of some other project (see below).

Illos porta nomines appropriatemente cambiate, de sorta que su contentos remane adhuc identificabile, quando alibi usate, per exemplo in le sub plica <f1>tm</f1> de alicun altere projecto (vide in sequito).
They contain text formatting information, but such information cannot be reused by <a0>OmegaT</a0> in order to create target files.
Illos contine informationes de formato de texto, ma tal informationes non pote ser reusate per <a0>OmegaT</a0> a fin de crear le files de destination.
They contain text formatting information, but such information cannot be reused by OmegaT in order to create target files.
Illos contine informationes de formato de texto, ma tal informationes non pote ser reusate per OmegaT a fin de crear le files de destination.
They contain the one and the same translation memory contents in different forms, to be used in future projects.
Illos contine un identic memoria de traduction in formas differente, pro ser usate in projectos futur.

They generally follow much the same pattern (for an example from the Regular Expression Tester see below): the regular expression (top entry) analyzes the search text (Text box in the middle) , yielding the hits, shown in the result Text box.

Illos seque generalmente multo le mesme schema (Per un exemplo ex le Probator de Expression Regular vide in sequito): le expression regular (entrata vertice) analyse le texto de recerca (Cassa del texto in le medio) , que rende le occurrentias, monstrate in le cassa de Taxo resultato.

They have however become an important phenomenon in translation workflows involving CAT tools, and theyoften present the greatest obstacle to compatibility between OmegaT and other CAT tools (or for that matter between CAT tools in general).

Comocunque illos es devenite un phenomeno importante in le fluxos del labor de traduction involvente applicationes CAT, e illossaepe constitue le obstaculo maxime al compatibilitate inter OmegaT e le altere applicationes CAT (o pro ille materia inter applicationes CAT in general).
They have the meaning, familiar to Word users:
Illos ha le significato, familiar al usatores de Word:
They must be modified manually.
Illos debe esser modificate manualmente.
They need no knowledge of Java; most if not all programming languages could be used instead, and useful functions achieved even with only relatively limited programming skill.

Illes non besonia de alicun cognoscentia de Java; le major parte, nisi omne, del linguas de programmation poterea esser usate in vice, e complite functiones utile etiam con maestria de programmation relativemente limitate.
They will appear as separate segments in the editor.
Illos apparera como segmentos separate in le editor.
They will appear as separate segments in the translation.
Illos apparera como segmentos separate in le traduction.
They will however always access the same user configuration files (unless launched from a different user account).
Illos totevia accedera semper al mesme files de configuration del usator (a minus que lanceate ab un conto del usator differente).
Third-party Java versions: until relatively recently, OmegaT ran only on Oracle/Sun's own Java.
Versiones Java de tertie parte: usque le tempore relativemente recente, OmegaT functionava sol sur Java proprie de Oracle/Sun.
Third-party software
Software de tertie parte

tu.note: Revisione completata il 19 01 2014

tuv.seg: Third-party software for use with OmegaT
Le software de tertie parte pro le uso con OmegaT
Third-party tools
Utensiles de tertie parte
Third-party tools have been produced to deal with the problem.
Applicationes de tertie parte esseva producite pro tractar le problema.
This
This
This will delete your local data and re-download the project contents from the server.
Isto delera tu datos local e re-discargara le contentos del projecto ex le servitor.
This API key has been blocked
Iste clave API ha essite blocate
This HOWTO aims to provide information in this area.
Iste GUIDA mira a fornir informationes re iste area.
This HOWTO describes OmegaT's compatibility with other software products.
Iste GUIDA describe le compatibilitate de OmegaT con altere applicationes.
This HOWTO describes the function and possible uses for it.
Iste GUIDA describe le function e su possibile usos.
This HowTo describes OmegaT's functions for automatic match propagation and one-to-many matching.
Iste Guida describe le functiones de OmegaT pro le propagation automatic del concordantia e le concordantia uno a plures.
This HowTo describes how to compile OmegaT from the source code.
Iste guida explica como compilar OmegaT a partir del codice fonte.
This HowTo describes how to configure the function in OmegaT.
Iste Guida describe como configurar le function in OmegaT.
This HowTo describes how to use OmegaT in conjunction with Atril's Dj Vu CAT tool.
Iste Guida describe como usar OmegaT conjunctemente con le application CAT Dj Vu de Atril.
This HowTo describes the general principles for setting up a preview function.
Iste Guida describe le principios general pro le preparation de un function de vista preliminar.
This HowTo describes the use of Priorview for <b1>Windows and Linux</b1>.
Iste Guida describe le uso de Priorview pro <b1>Windows e Linux</b1>.

Iste Guida explica como crear un nove file filtro pro uso con OmegaT, per le description del creation de un file de un filtro rudimentari pro le formato TMX.
This HowTo explains how to produce an "uncleaned RTF" file from an OmegaT project.
Iste Guida explica como producer un file "RTF non mundate" ex un projecto OmegaT.

Iste guida provide informationes re le uso de OmegaT e Iceni Infix pro traducer le files PDF.

Iste Guida forni informationes re le uso de OmegaT sur Linux
This HowTo provides tips on translating MS Office 2007 and later (Office Open XML, .docx) files in OmegaT.
Iste Guida provide suggestiones re le traduction in OmegaT de files MS Office 2007 (e plus tarde).

Isto pote esser complite in duo manieras:

On pote facer isto o in le application CAT concernite, o in qualque casos in un formato de file bilingue externe que le application sape leger.

Isto pote esser facite in duo manieras:

Isto potera facilemente esser restaurate novemente in le futuro.

This chapter describes the project properties, such as the source and target languages.
Iste capitulo describe le proprietates del projecto, como le lingua fonte e le lingua de destination.

Iste capitulo es designate pro usatores experte, que debe definir lor proprie variantes de regulas de segmentation o imagina elementos clave de recerca plus complexe e potente.

Iste combination codice/procedura non esseva ancora probate a fundo (ben que le reportos initial es promittente).

Iste collection de scripts pote esser utile al redactores de script con un cognoscentia de tcl/tk.
This command changes the folder to the folder containing the executable <a0>OmegaT</a0> file.
Iste commando cambia le plica al plica continente le file executabile <a0>OmegaT</a0>.

Iste commando cambia le plica al plica continente le file executabile OmegaT.

Iste commando non functiona si le segmento modificate ha essite validate.

Iste commando essera executate depost le Creation del documentos rendite.

Iste convertitor es disponibile pro Windows e pro Mac.

Isto copia le files seligite in le plica <f2>source</f2> e recarga le projecto pro importar le files nove.
This copies the selected files to the <f3>source</f3> folder and reloads the project to import the new files.
Isto copia le files seligite in le plica <f3>source</f3> e recarga le projecto pro importar le files nove.

Isto crea un plica nominate <e1> <a2>OmegaT</a2> </e1>.
This creates a folder called <f1>OmegaT</f1>.
Isto crea un plica appellate <f1>OmegaT</f1>.

Isto creara un plica <e2>./OmegaT_3.n.n_Without_JRE/</e2> in le plica de labor con tote le files necessari pro exequer <a3>OmegaT</a3>.
This creates an <f1>./OmegaT_4.n.n_Without_JRE/</f1> folder in the working folder with all the files necessary to run OmegaT.

This dialog enables you to set up the source filename patterns of files to be processed by the filter, customize the filenames of translated files, and select which encodings should be used for loading the file and saving its translated counterpart.

Iste fenestra de dialogo habilita te a preparar le modellos de files del nomine de file fonte a esser processate per le filtro, personalisa le nomine de files rendite, e selige qual codificationes deberea esser usate por cargar le file e salvar su pendant traducite.

This dialog enables you to specify the source filename patterns for files to be processed by the filter, customize the filenames of translated files and select which encodings should be used for loading the source file and saving the translation.

Iste fenestra de dialogo te pone in grado de specificar le patronos de nomine de file fonte pro le tractar le files per le filtro, personalisar le nomines de file del files traducite e eliger que codificationes debera esser usate pro cargamento le file fonte e salvamento del traduction.
This dialog is accessible by selecting <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Preferences...</g2> </m0>
Iste fenestra de dialogo es accessibile per selection del <m0> <g1>Optiones</g1> <g2>Preferentias...</g2> </m0>
This dialog is accessible by selecting <m0> <g1>Project</g1> <g2>Properties...</g2> </m0>
Iste fenestra de dialogo es accessibile per le selection de <m0> <g1>Projecto</g1> <g2>Proprietates...</g2> </m0>
This dialog lists available file filters, where the filters used by the current project are displayed in bold.
Iste fenestra de dialogo lista le filtros de file disponibile, ubi le filtros usate per le actual projecto es displicate in nigrate.
This dialog lists the file filters available.
Iste fenestra de dialogo lista le filtros de file disponibile.
This differences do not generally lead to compatibility problems.
Iste differentias generalmente non duce a problemas de compatibilitate.
This document is the official user's guide to OmegaT, the free Computer Aided Translation tool.
Iste documento es le guida official del usator pro OmegaT, le application gratuite de Traduction Assistite per le Computator (Computer Assisted Translation - CAT).
This documentation is intended both as a tutorial and as a reference guide.
Iste documentation es designate sia qual parve instruction, sia qual guida de referentia.
This enables the HTML segmentation rule to be used to choose whether or not segmentation should occur at these points.
Isto habilita le regula de segmentation HTML a esser usate pro seliger si le segmentation deberea occurrer a iste punctos o non.
This enables the document concerned to be released for translation by another translator.
Isto consenti de emitter le documento in question pro le traduction ex un altere traductor.
This enables the numerous suggestions to be managed more easily.
Isto habilita le tractamento plus facile del numerose suggestiones.
This enables the text to be exported to an XML file which can be translated in a CAT tool.
Isto habilita le exportation del texto in un file XML que pote esser traducite in un application CAT.
This enables the translation memories produced by other tools to be read by OmegaT.
Isto habilita le memorias de traduction producite per altere instrumentos a ser legite per OmegaT.
This ensures that the users' interests are protected, and has also resulted in OmegaT being awarded the <a0>Softpedia "100% FREE" guarantee</a0>.
Isto assecura que es curate le interesses del usatores, e ha alsi procurate le premio <a0>Softpedia "100% FREE" guarantee</a0> a OmegaT.
This external command cannot include "pipes", etc., which is why calling a script is recommended.
Iste commandos externe non pote includer "pipes", et cetera, pro le qual es recommendate appellar un script.
This feature is intended for gathering source files, but you're not restricted to source files.
Iste function es destinate a colliger files fonte, ma tu non es limitate al files fonte.
This feature makes use of the spelling dictionaries used in LibreOffice and OpenOffice.org.
Iste functionalitate usa le dictionarios orthographic de LibreOffice e OpenOffice.org.
This feature, however, is not implemented in OmegaT.
Iste characteristica, comocunque, non es implementate in OmegaT.
This file always exists in the project.
Iste file existe sempre in le projecto.
This file contains the <e0>original text</e0> from of the current segment when the <l1/> preference is enabled.
Iste file contine le <e0>texto original</e0> del segmento actual quando le preferentia <l1/> es activata.
This file contains the <e0>translated text</e0> from the current segment when the <l1/> preference is enabled.
Iste file contine le <e0>texto original</e0> del segmento actual quando le preferentia <l1/> es activata.
This file contains the login information for your team project repositories.
Iste file contine le informationes de accesso pro tu repositorios del projecto de equipa.
This file describes the overall OmegaT layout.
Iste file describe le disposition de OmegaT supertoto.
This file format enables OmegaT users to deliver bilingual files to users of Dj Vu DVX, who are then able to edit them further or to incorporate them into automated workflows.

Iste formato de file habilita le usatores de OmegaT a committer files bilingue al usatores de Dj Vu DVX, que es alora habile a rediger los ulteriormente o del los incorporar in fluxos del labor automatisate.
This file includes a number of important user preferences.
Iste file include plure preferentias de usator importante.
This file is very important and you should make sure you read it before launching OmegaT.
Iste file es multo importante tu deberea assecurar te que tu lege lo ante lancear OmegaT.
This file records Java error messages while <a0>OmegaT</a0> is running.
Iste file recorda le messages de error de Java durante que <a0>OmegaT</a0> es functionante.
This file stores the currently selected text when <l0/><l1/> is used.
Iste file salva le texto selegite actual quando se usa <l0/><l1/>.
This filter is the original OmegaT XLIFF filter.
Iste filtro es le XLIFF filtro original de OmegaT.
This folder can be set outside the project, enabling you to use it, or one of the specific subfolders, in other projects.
Iste plica pote esser definite foras del projecto, lo que te permitte usar lo, o un del subplicas specific, in altere projectos.
This folder contains a number of log files.
Iste plica contine plure file de registros.
This folder contains your spelling dictionaries.
Iste plica contine tu dictionario orthographic.
This folder is initially empty.
Iste plica is vacue ab initio.
This folder provides the standard location for manually installed OmegaT extension plugins.
Iste plica forni le position standard pro le plugins de extension del OmegaT installate manualmente.
This format can be converted easily to the TMX format by third-party utilities such as <a0>Wf2TMX</a0>.
Iste formato pote esser convertite facilemente al formato TMX per utilitates de tertie parte assi como <a0>Wf2TMX</a0>.
This format is the same as the tab separated one: source term, target term.
Iste formato es identic al formato separate per tabulation: termino fonte, termino de destination.
This format may be a practical interchange format for users of other CAT tools, particularly Trados and Wordfast Classic.
Iste formato pote esser un practic formato de intercambio pro usatores de altere applicationes CAT, in particular Trados e Wordfast Classic.
This formatting has been deleted.<segment 0001>
Iste formattation esseva delite.<segment 0001>
This function is specific to team projects.
Iste function es specific pro projectos de equipa.
This hands-off approach is described by the current OmegaT project co-ordinator as "delegated anarchy".
Iste approche a 'manos libere' es describite secundo le actual Coordinator del Projecto OmegaT como un "anarchia delegate".
This has repercussions for workflows in which CAT tool users (typically customers) expect to receive translation memory files and to have 100% matches inserted automatically.

Isto ha repercussiones pro le fluxos del labor in que le usatores de application CAT (typicamente clientes) expecta de reciper le files memoria de traduction e de haber le concordantias al 100% inserite automaticamente.
This has the effect of deleting the "alternative translation" status at the same time; the translation of the segment will therefore revert to that of the default translation.
Isto ha al mesme tempore le effecto de cancellar le stato de "traduction alternative"; le traduction del segmento revertera in consequentia a illo del traduction base.
This has the effect of making all instances of non-unique segments alternative translations (see "One-to-many matching" below).
Isto ha le effecto de render tote le instantias de segmentos non-unic traductiones alternative (vide plus avante "Concordantia uno-a-plures").
This includes preferences set from within OmegaT, any changes you have made to your <f1>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f1> file, and also your launch script (<f2>.bat</f2> file), if you are using one.
Isto include preferentias definite intra OmegaT, qualcunque cambios que tu faceva a tu file <f1>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f1> , e alsi a tu script de lanceamento (file <f2>.bat</f2>), si tu usa lo.
This includes preferences set from within OmegaT, any changes you have made to your<f1> OmegaT.l4J.ini</f1> file, and also your launch script (.bat file), if you are using one.
Isto include preferentias fixate intra OmegaT, qualcunque cambios que tu faceva a tu file <f1>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f1> , e alsi a tu script de lanceamento (file .bat), si tu usa ipso.
This incompatibility can be resolved by searching for and replacing the relevant language codes in the TMX file in a suitable text editor.
Iste incompatibilitate pote esser resolvite per cercar e reimplaciar le pertinente codices del lingua in le file TMX in un convenibile editor de texto.
This information applies only to the "Traditional" Windows versions of OmegaT.
Iste information se refere sol al versiones "Traditional" de OmegaT pro Windows.
This information applies to systems such as Solaris SPARC/x86/x64, Linux x64/PowerPC, Windows x64
Iste information refere al systemas assi como Solaris SPARC/x86/x64, Linux x64/PowerPC, Windows x64
This information applies to systems such as Solaris SPARC/x86/x64, Linux x64/PowerPC, Windows x64.
Iste information se refere al systemas como Solaris SPARC/x86/x64, Linux x64/PowerPC, Windows x64
This information is computed for segments as well as for words and for characters (without and including spaces).
Iste information es computate pro le segmentos, pro le parolas e pro le characteres (sin e con spatios includite).
This is a Git repository.
Isto es un repositorio Git.
This is a Subversion repository.
Isto es un repositorio Subversion.
This is a paragraph.
Isto es un paragrapho.
This is a valid project file.
Isto es un valide file de projecto.
This is acceptable, provided the enclosing group totally encloses the enclosed group.
Isto es acceptabile, a condition que le gruppo includente include totalmente le gruppo incluse.
This is also optional, but if you have been able to launch OmegaT with your localized bundle (see above), it will enhance the quality of your translation.
Anque isto es facultative, ma si tu esseva in grado de lancear OmegaT con tu pacchetto localisate (vide supra), illo meliorara le qualitate de tu traduction.
This is also the place to add members of the team to the project and assign them their rights.
Isto es alsi le loco pro adder membros del equipa al projecto e assignar a illes lor privilegios.
This is an advanced feature and some experience is required in order for it to be applied properly.
Isto es un function experte e necessita alicun experientia pro applicar lo debitemente.
This is an ordinary html file that, when opened in your Internet browser, directs you to the OmegaT user group hosted on Yahoo!
Isto es un file html ordinari que, quando aperte in tu navigator web, dirige te al gruppo del usator OmegaT sur Yahoo!
This is described as "free as in speech", in contrast to "free as in beer".
Illes dice: "gratuite como un discurso", in contrasto a: "gratuite como un bira".
This is effective upon <e1>Edit > Replace with Source</e1>, <e2>Edit > Insert Source</e2>, and when entering a segment when <e3>Options > Editing Behavior > [Insert] The source text</e3> is enabled.

Isto es effective su <e1>Rediger > Replaciar con le fonte</e1>, <e2>Rediger > Inserer fonte</e2>, e durante le insertion de un segmento quando <e3>Optiones > Comportamento de redactor > [Inserer] Le texto fonte</e3> es activate.
This is especially the case when a large file containing many segments is open in the editor, and/or slow hardware is used.
Isto es in modo special le caso quando un file grande continente multe segmentos es aperte in le editor, vel es usate hardware lente.
This is especially useful in case of languages that use pre- and postfix forms for the stem words.
Isto es in modo special utile in caso de linguas que usa formas con prefixo e suffixo pro le parolas stirpe.

This is especially useful when dealing with texts where inline formatting is not really useful (e.g., OCRed PDF, bad converted .odt or .docx, etc.) In a normal case it should always be possible to open the target documents, as only inline tags are removed.

Isto es specialmente utile in le tractamento del textos ubi le formattation in linea non es vermente utile (per exemplo, PDF ex OCR, .odt o .docx mal convertite, etc.) In un caso normal il deberea semper esser possibile aperir le documentos de destination, pois que es removite sol le tags in linea.
This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it
This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it
This is fundamentally incompatible with the aim of protecting users' freedom to change the software.
This is fundamentally incompatible with the aim of protecting users' freedom to change the software.
