This is important: when you export the XML file from the PDF, Infix makes a note in the file of where all the pieces of text ("stories") belong, so you must use this version of the file when re-importing the translated XML file.

Isto es importante: quando tu exporta le file XML ex lo PDF, Infix produce un nota in le file a ubi tote le pieces de texto compete ("historias"), assi tu debera usar iste version del file quando tu re-importara le file XML traducite.
This is likely to be a little too technical for complete newcomers to programming, but after working through one of the online tutorials, they should find it useful.
Isto es probabilemente un pauc troppo technic pro neophytos complete al programmation, ma post laborante a transverso de un del parve instructiones in Internet, illes deberea trovar lo utile.
This is much the same as the above example.
Isto es identic al exemplo precedente.
This is necessary even if there's only one combination available, like <l4>pt_BR</l4> in case of Brazilian Portuguese.
Isto es necessari mesmo si il ha un singule combination disponibile, como <l4>pt_BR</l4> in caso de Brazilian portugese.
This is necessary even if there's only one combination available, like pt_BR in case of Portuguese / Brazil.
Isto es necessari etiam si il ha sol un combination disponibile, como pt_BR in caso de portugese / Brasil.
This is no problem for files encoded in Unicode using a 16 bit character encoding set.
Isto es nulle problema pro files codificate in Unicode con un collection de codification de character a 16 bit.
This is not recommended, particularly if you are unfamiliar with Linux.
Isto non es recommendate, in particular si tu non es familiar con Linux.
This is required if you would like to enter any of the meta characters !$()*+.<>?[\]^{|} to match as themselves.
Isto necessita si tu amarea inscriber alicun del meta-characteres !$()*+.<>?[\]^{|} pro concordar con ipsos.
This is the <a0>recommended support channel</a0>, which users are strongly encouraged to join.
Isto es le <a0>canal de assistentia recommendate</a0>, que usatores es fortemente incoragiate a junger se.
This is the default.
Isto es le arrangiamento base prefixate.
This is the folder in which the spelling dictionary files will be placed.
Le dictionarios orthographic essera ubicate in iste plica.
This is the main focus of the OmegaT user community.
Isto es le foco principal del communitate del usatores de OmegaT.
This is the most common-sense alternative, sparing you problems in the long run.
Isto es le alternativa plus sensate, pro sparniar te problemas in le longe opera.
This is the standard behavior.
Isto es le comportamento standard.
This is the way text will look when displayed.
Le texto apparera assi quando illo essera monstrate.
This is useful for documents that contain trade marks, names or other proper nouns, or parts in a third language that do not require translation.
Isto es utile pro textos continente marcas commercial, nomines o altere nomines proprie, o partes in un lingua tertia que non require traduction.
This is useful for texts containing many trade marks or other proper nouns you which must be left unchanged.
Isto es utile pro textos continente multe marcas commercial o altere nomines proprie que debe restar sin alteration.
This is useful if you frequently use translation memories produced in the past, for example because they are on the same subject or for the same customer.
Isto es utile si tu usa frequentemente memorias de traduction producite in le passato, per exemplo quia illos son re le identic subjecto o pro le mesme cliente.
This is useful to run OmegaT on a server with TMX files automatically fed to a project.
Isto es utile pro exequer OmegaT sur un server con le files TMX que alimenta automaticamente un projecto.
This is useful when <i0>checking</i0> tag-heavy segments on the screen, since it is easy to overlook missing or double spaces, for example.
Isto es utile ubi on <i0>controla</i0> segmentos gravate per tag sur le schermo, pois que il es facile omitter perdite o duplice spatios, per exemplo.
This is useful when a translation is being checked, since only the first instance of identical segments may need to be checked.
Isto es utile quando on debe verificar le traduction, pois que pote ser necesse de verificar solo le prime occurrentia del segmentos identic.
This is where you type and edit your translation.
Isto es ubi tu scribe e modifica (edita) tu traduction.
This license allows you to do certain things with <a0>OmegaT</a0>, including modifying and distributing it.
This license allows you to do certain things with <a0>OmegaT</a0>, including modifying and distributing it.
This license covers the documentation.
This license covers the documentation.
This line defines GOOGLE_API_KEY.
Ce riga defini GOOGLE_API_KEY.
This list is for more technical discussion of features and development, and is intended for OmegaT developers and other interested parties.
Iste lista es pro le discussion plus technic re characteristicas e disveloppamento, e es designate pro le disveloppatores de OmegaT e de altere partes interessate.
This macro is useful for levelling the formatting of a whole paragraph that contains no visible formatting.
Iste macro es utile pro nivellar le formato de un integre paragrapho que non contine formato visibile.
This mailing list is for localizers of OmegaT.
Iste lista de posta electronic es pro le localisatores de OmegaT.
This makes it much easier for CAT tools to support it and edit it directly.
Isto rende plus facile pro le applicationes CAT los supportar e los rediger directemente.
This makes it possible to rename the file to be translated.
Isto rende possibile renominar le file a traducer.
This manual, however, would not be possible without the help and support from a number of people.
Ce manual, tamen, non esserea possibile sin le auxilio e le appoio de plure gente.
This marking has priority over <g0>Mark Translated Segments</g0> and <g1>Mark Untranslated Segments</g1>.
Iste remarca ha prioritate sur <g0>Marcar segmentos rendite</g0> e sur <g1>Marcar segmentos non rendite</g1>.
This marking has priority over Mark Translated Segments and Mark Untranslated Segments.
Iste remarca ha prioritate sur Marca Segmentos Rendite e sur Marca Segmentos non Rendite.
This may be confusing, so you may consider unchecking this option in this case.
Isto pote generar confusion, ita tu pote considerar de levar le marca a iste option in iste caso.

This means for instance that you do not need to exit a project you are currently working on if you decide to add another ancillary TM to it: you simply reload the project, and the changes you have made will be included.

Isto significa per exemplo que tu non necessitate exir de un projecto re qui tu actualmente labora si tu decide de adder a illo un altere TM auxiliar: tu recarga simplemente le projecto, e le cambia tu ha facite essera includite.
This means that as soon as a segment is translated, the same translation is automatically inserted into all identical segments.
Isto significa que si tosto que un segmento es rendite, le identic traduction es automaticamente inserite in tote le identic segmentos.

This means that if the source language is LTR and the target language is RTL, or vice versa, it may be necessary to toggle back and forth between RTL and LTR modes to view the source and enter the target easily in their respective modes.

Isto significa que si le lingua fonte es LTR e le lingua de destination es RTL, o vice versa, il pote esser necessari commutar in retro e in avante inter le modos RTL e LTR pro vider le fonte e inscriber le destination facilemente in lor respective modos.
This means that the source code of the OmegaT program is freely available, and that OmegaT's license gives its users considerable freedom in its use.
Isto significa que le codice fonte del programma OmegaT es liberemente disponibile, e que le licentia de OmegaT dona a su usatores un considerabile libertate a lo usar.
This menu displays entries only when a project is open.
Iste menu monstra entratas solo quando un projecto es aperte.

Iste methodo ha le beneficio particular de esser commode pro discoperir causas de problemas: si occurre un error durante le uso del programma, in le fenestra del terminal es emittite un message de error que pote continer information utile sur le causa del error.

Pro verificar si alicun version del JRE es installate sur tu systema Linux, aperi un consola (fenestra pro linea de commando) e scribe:
To check whether it works, you can place a TMX file in the /source folder of a project, or (more useful) perform a Text Search > Search files operation on TMX files.
Pro verificar si illo opera ben, tu pote poner un file TMX in le plica /source de un projecto, o (plus utile) effectuar un Cerca Texto > Cercar operation del files sur le files TMX.
To come back to the standard mode "<g2>Cursor lock on</g2>", press <k3>F2</k3> again.
Pro revenir al modo standard "<g2>Cursor blocate</g2>", pulsar ancora <k3>F2</k3>.
To contribute to <a0>OmegaT</a0>:
Pro contribuer al projecto<a0>OmegaT</a0> >:

Pro converter lo in un nove projecto de equipa, aperir lo in le GUI de OmegaT.

To create a left-to-right embedding in a right-to-left segment, insert a left-to-right embedding (LRE) character, type or insert the left-to-right text, and then insert the pop directional formatting (PDF) character.

Pro crear un incorporation de sinistra a dextra in un segmento de dextra a sinistra, insere un character de incorporation de sinistra a dextra (LRE), typa o insere le texto de sinistra a dextra, e postea insere le character de formattation directional pop (PDF).
To create a project-specific set of file filters, click on the <g0>File filter ... </g0>button, then activate <g1>Enable project specific filters</g1> check box in the window that opens.

Pro crear un serie de filtros de file specific del projecto, clicca sur le button <g0>Filtro de File... </g0>, pois activa le quadrato de controlo <g1>Habilita le filtros specific del projecto</g1>, in le fenestra que se displica.
To create a right-to-left embedding in a left-to-right segment, insert a right-to-left embedding (RLE) character, type or insert the right-to-left text, and then insert the PDF character.

Pro crear un incorporation de dextra a sinistra in un segmento de sinistra a dextra, insere un character de incorporation de dextra a sinistra (RLE), typa o insere le texto de dextra a sinistra, e postea insere le character PDF.
To create a shortcut in Windows:
Pro crear un via breve in Windows:
To create one, right-click in a segment, and select "<e2>Set empty translation</e2>".
Pro crear uno, clicca con le dextero in un segmento, e selige "<e2>Prepara le traduction vacue</e2>".

To customize the scripting feature, do the following:

To define a rule as a break rule, tick the Break/Exception check box.
Pro definir un regula quam regula de interruption, marca le quadrato de controlo Interruption/Exception.
To define a rule as an exception rule, leave the Break/Exception check box unticked.
Pro definir un regula quam regula de exception, lassa le quadrato de controlo Interruption/Exception non marcate.
To delete project specific file filters, uncheck the check box.
Pro deler le filtros de file specific del projecto, leva le marca al quadrato de controlo.
To delete project specific segmentation rules, uncheck the check box.
Pro deler le regulas de segmentation specific del projecto, dismarca le quadrato de controlo.
To delete tag groups, just remove them from the segment.
Pro deler le gruppos de tag, remove solmente los ex le segmento.
To display the <g0>Autocompletion</g0> contextual menu for the glossary matches, hit the OS dependant key (<k1>Escape</k1> for macOS, <k2>Ctrl+Space</k2> for the other platforms).

Pro monstrar le <g0>Autocompletion</g0> menu de contexto pro le concordantias de glossarios, colpa le systema operative dependente clave (<k1>Esc</k1> pro macOS, <k2>Ctrl+Spatio</k2> pro le altere platformas).
To display the instant start guide in the desired language, you need to specify both the language and the country.
Pro monstrar le guida de initio celere in le lingua desiderate, tu debe specificar ambes: le lingua e le pais.
To do so, attach the following notices to the program.
To do so, attach the following notices to the program.

Modificar le lanceator de OmegaT o vider le capitulo <l1>Installar e Facer Fluer</l1> pro apprender como lancear OmegaT per le linea de commando.

Pro facer isto pro le filtro TMX, insere le linea

Pro facer isto, aperi un terminal (alsi note como un consola o fenestra pro linea de commando; programmas commun pro isto es konsole (KDE) e gnome-terminal (GNOME)), e scribe:

Pro duplicar gruppos de tag, copia exactemente los in le position que tu desira.
To edit the files and encodings a filter is used for, select the filter in the list and click <e1>Edit.</e1>
Un filtro es usate pro rediger files e codificationes, selige le filtro in le lista e clicca <e1>Editar.</e1>
To edit the files and encodings a filter is used for, select the filter in the list and click <g2>Edit</g2>.
Un filtro es usate pro rediger files e codificationes, selige le filtro in le lista e clicca <g2>Editar.</g2>
To edit this file, you may need Administrator mode, or to move it temporarily to a different location on your hard drive.
Pro rediger iste file, tu pote haber necessitate del modo Administrator, o de mover lo temporaneemente a un differente ubication sur tu disco dur.
To edit what files in what encodings the filter will process, select the filter from the list and click Edit.
Pro editar qual files in qual codificationes le filtro los processara, selige le filtro ex le lista e clicca Edita.
To edit which files in which encodings the filter is to process, select the filter from the list and click <e1>Edit.</e1>
Pro rediger qual files in qual codificationes le filtro debe processar, selige le filtro ex le lista e clicca <e1>Modifica.</e1>
To enable MS Translator in OmegaT edit its launcher or see chapter <l0>Installing and Running</l0> to learn how to start OmegaT from the command line.
Pro habilitar MS Translator in OmegaT modificar su lanceator o vider le capitulo <l0>Installar e Facer Fluer</l0> pro apprender a lancear OmegaT per le linea de commando
To enable the spell checker, select <g0>Options > Spell Checking</g0> and tick the <g1>Automatically check the spelling of text</g1> check box (see above).
Pro habilitar le corrector orthographic, selige <g0>Optiones > Controlo Orthographic</g0> e marca le cassa de marca <g1>Controla automaticamente le orthographia del texto</g1> (vide ante).
To find out what the paragraph tags should be, examine a sample file in a text editor.
Pro discoperir lo que le tags de paragrapho deberea esser, examina un file exemplo in un editor de texto.
To find the version most suitable for you, follow the link below to the Download Selector.
Pro trovar le plus convenibile version pro te, seque le ligamine al Selector del discargamentos, infra.

Pro devenir implicate in le effortio de disveloppamento de <a3>OmegaT</a3> tu pote adherer al gruppo de disveloppatores, viaweb o con un email a <u4>omegat-development-request@lists.sourceforge.net</u4> con "subscribe" como linea de subjecto.
To get these translations, you must upload your source file <u1>on their site</u1> that generates a TMX file.
Pro obtener iste traductiones, tu debe cargar tu file fonte <u1>sur lor sito</u1> que genera un file TMX.

Pro identificar te quam un usator valide del servicios Google, tu usa tu clave unic private expedite a te per Google, quando tu ha registrate te pro le servicio.

Pro lancear OmegaT, tu debe normalmente scriber duo commandos.

Pro lancear plure instantias de <e0><a1>OmegaT</a1>.app</e0>, clicca duo vices le file <e2>OmegaT.sh</e2> localisate in <e3><a4>OmegaT</a4>.app/ Contentos/MacOS/</e3>.

Pro limitar le quantitate del datos, il es possibile eliger un dominio specific per <e0>Selige le dominio de recerca del terminologia TaaS</e0>.
To make an alternative translation the default translation, right-click with the mouse and select "Use as Default Translation".
Pro render como base un traduction alternative, clicca dextere le mus e selige "Usar como traduction base".
To make it possible (although Search and replace operates only on memory), OmegaT will copy the source segment to the target segment before the replace operation occurs.
Pro render lo possibile (ben que Cerca e reimplacia opera sol in le memoria), OmegaT copiara le segmento fonte al destination ante que occurre le operation reimplaciar.
To make launching OmegaT even more user-friendly, add it to your application launch menu, or place a launch icon for it on your desktop or in your desktop panel.
Pro render lanceamento OmegaT mesmo plus facile, adde lo a tu menu de lanceamento, o pone un icone de lanceamento pro illo sur tu scriptorio o in tu quadro scriptorio.
To make the macro available in all documents, select Normal.dotm in the "Store macro in" box.
Pro render le macro utilisabile in omne documentos, elige in le cassa "Salva macro in": Normal.dotm.
To make this possible, go to <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> and check the box <e3>Allow translation to be equal to source</e3>.
Pro render possibile isto, va a <m0> <g1>Optiones</g1> <g2>Comportamento del Modifica...</g2> </m0> e marca le quadrato <e3>Permitte traduction equal a fonte</e3>.
To make this possible, select this option.
Pro render possibile isto, selige iste option.
To modify a file filter pattern, either modify the fields directly or click <e0>Edit.</e0> To add a new file filter pattern, click <e1>Add</e1>.
Pro modificar un modello de filtro del file, modifica le campos directemente o clicca <e0>Modifica.</e0> Pro adder un nove modello de filtro del file, clicca <e1>Adde</e1>.

Pro modificar un modello de filtro de file, o modificar le campos directemente o cliccar <e0>Rediger</e0>.

Pro modificar un modello de filtro de file, o modificar le campos directemente o cliccar <g0>Rediger</g0>.
To modify the file extensions, target file name and encodings associated to a filter, select it in the list and click the <g0>Edit...</g0> button.
Pro modificar le extensiones del file, le nomine del file de destination e le codification associate con un filtro, selige lo in le lista e clicca le button <g0>Rediger...</g0>.
To modify the options select the filter from the list and click on <e0>Options</e0>.
Pro modificar le optiones selige le filtro ex le lista e clicca sur <e0>Optiones</e0>.

Pro modificar le optiones, selige le filtro in le lista e clicca <e0>Optiones</e0>.

Pro modificar le position de un o plus segmentos individualmente, elige le segmento(s) e pulsa <u0>U</u0> (<g1>Mover in alto</g1>) o <u2>D</u2> (<g3>Mover in basso</g3>).
To obtain OpenOffice.org or LibreOffice, follow the link from "Third-party software" button on the left.
Pro obtener OpenOffice.org o LibreOffice, seque le ligamine ex le button "Software de tertie partes" a sinistra.
To obtain more literal matches closer to 100%, select the <g0>Full text, including tags and numbers</g0> option.
Pro obtener plus concordantia litteral proxime al 100%, selige le <g0>Complete texto, includente le option tags e numeros</g0>.
To open a new search window, use <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>F</k2> </k0> in the Main window.
Pro aperir un nove Fenestra de Recerca, usa <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>F</k2> </k0> in le fenestra Principal.
To prevent the Source Files list window from automatically opening when a project is loaded, find <t0><project_files_show_on_load></t0> and replace <t1>true</t1> to <t2>false</t2>:
Pro prevenir que le fenestra del lista de files fonte aperi automaticamente quando un projecto es cargate, trova <t0><project_files_show_on_load></t0> e replacia <t1>true</t1> con <t2>false</t2>:
To prevent this, the GPL assures that patents cannot be used to render the program non-free.
To prevent this, the GPL assures that patents cannot be used to render the program non-free.

When <e1>Full/Half width char insensitive</e1> option is checked, searches for fullwidth forms (CJK characters) will match halfwidth forms and vice versa.
Quando es marcate le option <e1> insensibile al largessa del character </e1>, le recercas pro le formas plen (characteres CJK) concordara le formas a largessa medietate e vice versa.
When <g1>Full/Half width char insensitive</g1> option is checked, searches for fullwidth forms (CJK characters) will match halfwidth forms and vice versa.
Quando es marcate le option <g1>insensibile al largessa del character</g1>, le recercas pro le formas plen (characteres CJK) concordara le formas a largessa medietate e vice versa.
When OmegaT encounters a file in its <f0>source</f0> folder, it attempts to select the filter based upon the file's extension.
Quando OmegaT incontra un file in su plica <f0>fonte</f0>, il tenta de seliger le filtro basate sur le extension del file.
When OmegaT encounters a file in its source folder, it attempts to select the filter based upon the file's extension.
Quando OmegaT incontra un file in su plica fonte, il tenta de seliger le filtro basate sur le extension del file.
When a rule is triggered, the corresponding phrase will be underlined in blue in the Editor (see <e1>also </e1>and <e2>I didn't do nothing</e2> in the picture above).
Quando un regula es discatenate, le phrase correspondente essera sublineate in azur in le Editor (vide <e1>alsi </e1>e <e2>I didn't do nothing</e2> in le imagine precedente).
When a single file has more segments than this, additional segments will be loaded on-demand as you scroll.
Quando un singule file ha plus segmentos que isto, additional segmentos essera cargate sur-demanda, quando tu rola.
When active, <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> will insert the suggestion into the target part of the current segment.
Quando active, <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> inserera le suggestion in le parte destination del segmento currente.

When actuated, this launches your browser with a dummy page instructing you to set the automatic refresh function, which you should then do, and then to hit Ctrl+s, Ctrl+d in OmegaT to launch automatic updating of the browser.

Quando actuate, isto lancea tu lector del tela con un pagina simulacro instruente te a preparar le function de renovation automatic, quem tu deberea dunque facer, e pois pulsar Ctrl+s, Ctrl+d in OmegaT pro lancear le renovation automatic del lector del tela.
When an OmegaT segment containing this string is opened, the script outputs a warning.
Quando un segmento de OmegaT continente iste linea es aperite, le script emitte un advertimento.
When another window is on the foreground, click on the main window to bring it to the foreground or press <k0>Esc</k0> to close the other window.
Quando un altere fenestra es sur le prime plano, clicca sur le fenestra principal pro apportar lo al prime plano o pulsa <k0>Esc</k0> pro clauder le altere fenestra.
When checked, the items in the glossary auto-completer view will contain the source text, too.
Quando marcate, le elementos in le vista auto-completori del glossario continera alsi le texto fonte.
When enabled, all the formatting tags are removed from source segments.
Quando habilitate, tote le tags de formato es removite del segmentos fonte.
When hovering the mouse over the underlined phrase, an explanation will appear.
Quando on passa le mouse supra le phrase sublineate, comparera un explication.
When launched in console mode, no GUI is loaded ( it will work therefore on any console) and the given project is automatically translated.
Quando on lancea in modo consola, nulle GUI es cargate ( illo in consequentia operara sur qualcunque consola) e le projecto date es rendite automaticamente.
When looking for fuzzy matches, the remove pattern is ignored.
Quando on quere pro concordantias partial, le remover modello es ignorate.
When mode has been used, this option will specify the files to be processed automatically.
Quando ha essite usate le modo, iste option specificara le files a esser processate automaticamente.
When moving between segments, you may wish to populate the editing field with an existing translation in the fuzzy match pane or with the source text.
Movente te inter segmentos, tu pote desiderar de popular le campo de modifica con un traduction existente in le quadro del concordantia partial o con le texto original.
When multiple target terms are available, the first one (as shown in the Glossary pane) will be used.
Quando es disponibile plure terminos de destination, le primo (como monstrate in le quadro Glossario) essera usate.
When searching through files (as opposed to translation memories), OmegaT restricts the search to files in source file formats.
Quando tu cerca trans le files (al contrario que al memorias de traduction), OmegaT restringe le recerca al files in le formatos del file fonte.
When selected, LanguageTool checks the translations, and underline potential issues in blue.
Quando eligite, LanguageTool controla le traductiones, e sublinea le potential problemas in blau.
When started in console mode, no GUI is loaded (so it will work on any console) and the given project is automatically processed as requested.
Quando initiava in modo consola, nulle GUI es cargate (assi il laborara sur omne consola) e le projecto date es processate automaticamente como requirite.
When starting OmegaT from the command line, specify in the command:
Quando tu lancea OmegaT per le linea de commando, specificar in le commando:
When the option is unchecked, all non-unique segments are shown in grey except the first occurrence.
Quando le option es non marcate, tote le segmentos non-unic es monstrate in gris a exception del prime occurrentia.
When the translated document is created, its display direction will be the same as that of the original document.
Quando es create le documento rendite, su direction de monstra essera le mesme ut celle del documento fonte.
When the two columns are sufficiently aligned, click <g0>Save TMX...</g0> to create the resulting translation memory.
Quando le duo columnas es sufficientemente alineate, clicca <g0>Salvar TMX...</g0> pro crear le memoria de traduction resultante.
When the user exits <a0>OmegaT</a0>, this file is not emptied, in order to be consistent with usual clipboard behavior.
Quando le usator claude <a0>OmegaT</a0>, iste file non es vacuate, pro esser consistente con le comportamento usual del tabula del fragmento.
When the user exits OmegaT, this file is not emptied, in order to be consistent with usual clipboard behavior.
Quando le usator claude OmegaT, iste file non es vacuate, pro esser consistente con le comportamento usual del tabula del fragmento.
When this file is executed, the commands within it are automatically carried out.
Quando es exequite iste file, son exequite automaticamente alsi le commandos interne.
When this is done the panes display a tab at the top.
Quando isto is facite le quadros monstra un linguetta al summitate.
When this option is checked, the glossary will display pairs or groups of words (expressions) even if the words within them appear separately in the source text.
Quando iste option es marcate, le glossario monstrara par o gruppos de parolas (expressiones) mesmo si le parolas in le texto fonte appare separatemente inter illos.
When this parameter is added, tag validation is done prior to translation/aligning.
Quando es addite iste parametro, le validation del tag es facite ante que le traduction/alineamento..

When translating between RTL and LTR languages, correctly reading the tags from the source and entering them properly in the target may require the translator to toggle between LTR and RTL modes numerous times.

Quando on rende inter linguas RTL e LTR, legente correctemente le tags ex le fonte e inscribente illos debitemente in le destination pote requirer que le traductor commuta inter modos LTR e RTL numerose vices.

When translating software-related files, you can configure the Tag Validator options to also check programming (%...) variables or placeholders ({0}), if the file filter doesn't do it out of the box already.

Quando on traduce files associate al software, tu pote configurar le optiones del Utensile de validation del tags pro alsi controlar le (%...) variabiles o placeholders ({0}) de programmation, si le filtro de file non lo face jam.
When translating software-related files, you can configure the Tag Validator options to also check programming (%...) variables.
Durante que traduce files associate al software, tu pote configurar le optiones del utensile de validation del tags pro alsi controlar variabiles de programmation (%...).
When translating software-related files: Allows you to configure the Tag Validator options to check also programming (%...) variables.
Durante le traduction de files relative a software: consenti te configurar le optiones del validator de tags pro controlar alsi le variabiles (%...) de programmation.
When unavailable, the ID will be used as a fallback
Quando indisponibile, le ID essera usate qua fallback
When using an external service you must be aware of the possible implications in terms of confidentiality, since you are loading the original document on a server outside of your direct control.

Quando tu usa un servicio externe tu debe esser al currente del implicationes possibile in terminos de confidentialitate, pois que tu es cargante le documento original sur un servitor for de tu controlo directe.
When using regular expressions, the replacement string supports references to groups defined in the search string.
Con le expressiones regular, le fila de character de substitution supporta referentias al gruppos definite in le fila de character del recerca.
When we speak of free software, we are referring to freedom, not price.
When we speak of free software, we are referring to freedom, not price.
When working on a team project, this window allows you to define the mapping between remote folders and local folders (see examples <l0>here</l0>).
Quando on labora sur un projecto de equipa, iste fenestra te permitte de definir le mappa inter plicas remote e local (vider exemplos <l0>hic</l0>).
When writing purely RTL text, the default (LTR) view may be used.
Quando on scribe texto purmente RTL, pote esser usate le vista base (LTR).
When you are ready to view the final product, you can export the translated files, open them in the appropriate application and view the translation in the final format...
Quando tu es preste pro vider le producto final, tu pote exportar le files rendite, aperir los con su appropriate application e examinar le traduction in le formato final...

When you begin a new project on the same subject or for the same customer, navigate to the repository folder in the <g0>Project > Properties > Edit Project dialog</g0> and select it as the translation memory folder.

Quando tu initia un nove projecto re le mesme subjecto o pro le mesme cliente, naviga al plica repositorio in le <g0>fenestra de dialogo Projecto > Proprietates > Modifica Projecto </g0> e selige lo como le plica del memoria de traduction.
When you convey a copy of a covered work, you may at your option remove any additional permissions from that copy, or from any part of it.
When you convey a copy of a covered work, you may at your option remove any additional permissions from that copy, or from any part of it.

When you convey a covered work, you waive any legal power to forbid circumvention of technological measures to the extent such circumvention is effected by exercising rights under this License with respect to the covered work, and you disclaim any intention to limit operation or modification of the work as a means of enforcing, against the work's users, your or third parties' legal rights to forbid circumvention of technological measures.

When you convey a covered work, you waive any legal power to forbid circumvention of technological measures to the extent such circumvention is effected by exercising rights under this License with respect to the covered work, and you disclaim any intention to limit operation or modification of the work as a means of enforcing, against the work's users, your or third parties' legal rights to forbid circumvention of technological measures.
When you create a new project and commit that to a repository, the <f0>omegat.project</f0> file doesn't contain any mapping.
Quando tu crea un nove projecto e lo invia a un repositorio, le file <f0>omegat.project</f0> non contine ulle mappa.
When you create a translation project, OmegaT automatically creates a folder with the specified name, and a list of folders:
Quando tu crea un projecto de traduction, OmegaT crea automaticamente un plica con le nomine specificate, e un lista de plicas:

When you create the target documents in an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project, the translation memory of the project is output in the form of three files in the root folder of your <a1>OmegaT</a1> project (see the above description).

Quando tu crea le documentos final in un projecto <a0>OmegaT</a0>, le memoria de traduction del projecto es emittite in le forma de tres files in le plica radice de tu projecto <a1>OmegaT</a1> (vide le description precedente).

When you create the target documents in an OmegaT project, the translation memory of the project is output in the form of three files in the root folder of your OmegaT project (see the above description).

Quando tu crea le documentos final in un projecto OmegaT, le memoria de traduction del projecto es emittite in le forma de tres files in le plica radice de tu projecto OmegaT (vide le description precedente).
When you download the project, the project is converted to a team project locally and a default mapping is added.
Quando tu discarga le projecto, le projecto es convertite a un projecto de equipa localmente e un mappa predefinite es addite.
When you exit the project.
Quando tu termina le projecto.
When you have finished your translation, to import it into Wikipedia:
Quando tu ha claudite tu traduction, pro importar lo in Wikipedia:
When you have selected all of these, the Start button appears.
Quando tu ha seligite tote istos, compare le button Start.
When you left-click on the number, the selected script will run.
Quando tu clicca sur le numero, le script seligite essera exequite.
When you left-click the number, the selected script will run.
Quando tu clicca le numero, le script seligite essera exequite.

When you let OmegaT know the files that you need to translate, it looks for the files it understands based on file filtering rules, recognizes the textual parts within them, splits up the text groups according to the segmentation rules, and displays the segments one by one so that you can proceed with the translation.

Quando tu indica a OmegaT le files que tu debe traducer, illo examina le files del formatos que pote recognoscer, con le regulas de filtration del files, recognosce le partes textual intra illos, divide le gruppos de texto secundo le regulas de segmentation e expone le segmentos uno a uno, de maniera que tu pote proceder al traduction.
When you load a project, all changes in the repository are copied to the local project, including the <f0>omegat.project</f0> file with project settings.
Quando tu carga un projecto, tote le cambiamentos in le repositorio es copiate al projecto local, anque le file <f0>omegat.project</f0> con le parametros del projecto.
When you load a segmented TTX file, segments with source = target will be included, if "Allow translation to be equal to source" in Options Editing Behavior... has been checked.

Quando tu carga un file TTX segmentate, le segmentos con fonte = destination essera includite, si esseva marcate le cassa "Permitte traduction equal a fonte " in Optiones Comportamento del Modifica... .
When you move to another segment, the translation is validated and stored.
Quando tu move a un altere segmento, le traduction es validate e registrate in le memoria de traduction.
When you move to the next segment, the first fuzzy match (the one with the best matching percentage) is automatically selected.
Quando tu move al segmento proxime, le prime concordantia partial (illo con le melior percentage de concordantia) es seligite automaticamente.
When you release the right click, a dialog opens with a number of options.
Quando tu relaxa le button dextre, un fenestra de dialogo se displica con plure optiones.
When you translate your files, <a2>OmegaT</a2> stores all your progress in the translation memory <l3>project_save.tmx</l3> that resides in the project's <l4>/omegat</l4> subfolder.
Quando tu rende tu files, <a2>OmegaT</a2> registra tote tu progresso in le memoria de traduction <l3>project_save.tmx</l3> que reside in le sub plica del projecto <l4>/omegat</l4>.
When you translate your files, OmegaT stores all your progress in the translation memory <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> that resides in the project's <f1>omegat</f1> subfolder.
Quando tu rende tu files, OmegaT registra tote tu progresso in le memoria de traduction <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> que reside in le sub plica del projecto <f1>omegat</f1>.
When you wish to use the filter again, just tick the check box.
Quando tu desidera usar de nove le filtro, marca justo le quadrato de controlo.
Whenever the project is automatically saved, but also when it is opened, closed and reloaded, only two files are actually synchronised:
Quandocunque le projecto es salvate automaticamente, ma alsi quando illo es aperite, claudite e recargate, solo duo files es realmente synchronisate:
Whenever you finish a project, copy one of the three "export" translation memory files from the root folder of the project to the repository folder.
Quandocunque tu fini un projecto, copia uno del tres files memoria de traduction "exportation" ex le plica radice del projecto al plica repositorio.

Whenever you want to see what your translation will look like in its final format, press <k2>Ctrl+D</k2> to generate the translated documents, which will be created in the <f3>/target/</f3> subfolder of your project folder.

Quando tu vole vider lo que essera le aspecto de tu traductiones, in su formato final, que tu pulsa <k2>Ctrl+D</k2> pro generar le documentos rendite, que essera create in le sub-plica <f3>/target/</f3> de tu projecto. Si tu vole vider solmente le documento active, que tu pulsa <k3>Ctrl+Shift+D</k3>

Whenever you want to see what your translation will look like in its final format, press <k7><k8>Ctrl</k8><k9>D</k9></k7> to generate the translated documents, which will be created in the <f10>target</f10> subfolder of your project folder.

Quando tu vole vider lo que essera le aspecto de tu traductiones, in su formato final, que tu pulsa <k7><k8>Ctrl+</k8><k9>D</k9></k7> pro generar le documentos rendite, que essera create in le sub-plica <f10>/target/</f10> de tu projecto.
Where a paragraph contains desired formatting, you must restore the deleted formatting after levelling the paragraph.
Ubi un paragrapho contine formato desiderate, tu debe restaurar le formato delite post le nivellamento del paragrapho.
Where circumstances permit, unifying used fonts, font sizes, colors, etc. should be considered, as it could simplify the translation and reduce the potential for tag errors.

Unificar le typos de character usate, le dimensiones de typo de character, le colores, et cetera, ubi le stato de cosas permitte le, simplifica le labor de traduction e reduce le possibile numero del errores de tag.
Where paragraphs do contain inline formatting (bold, italics, hyperlinks, etc.), you can either:
Ubi le paragraphos contine formato integrate (nigrato, italico, ligamines, etc.), tu pote o:
Where possible, unifying the fonts, font sizes, colors, etc. used in the document simplifies the task of translation and reduces the possible number of tag errors.

Unificar le typos de character, le dimensiones de typo de character, le colores, et cetera usate in le documento, Ubi possibile, simplifica le labor de traduction e reduce le possibile numero de errores del tag.
Where routine tasks are concerned, volunteers working on the OmegaT project are generally given as much freedom as possible in determining the form of their contribution.
Re le labores routinari, al voluntarios laborante sur le projecto OmegaT es generalmente confidite tam libertate, in le determinar le forma de lor contribution, qua possibile.
Where the vendor of a software product claims that his product is compatible with another piece of software, this compatibility is seldom 100%.
Ubi le venditor de un producto software assere que su producto es compatibile con un altere pecia de software, iste compatibilitate es rarmente al 100%.

Where two segments also have identical preceding and following segments (for example when an entire page appears twice in the text), they cannot be translated differently from each other in OmegaT, i.e. it is not possible to make one of them an "alternative translation".

Si duo segmentos ha alsi identic segmentos precedente e sequente (per exemplo quando un pagina integre compare duo vices in le texto), illos non pote esser rendite in modo differente le un del altere in OmegaT, id es il non es possibile render un de illos un "traduction alternative".
Whether anti-aliasing is enabled (this is a command-line launch option, but you can also set it in the kaptain launch script)
Si es o non habilitate le anti-aliasing (isto es un option de lanceamento a linea de commando, ma tu pote alsi adjustar lo in le script de lanceamento kaptain)

Whether or not it is adopted depends firstly upon whether the development team considers it beneficial to OmegaT, and secondly, upon whether one of the developers is willing to do the work of implementing it.

Si il essera adoptate o non, dependera in prime loco de quanto le equipa de disveloppamento lo considera benefic pro OmegaT, e secundarimente, si un del disveloppatores es ben disposite a facer le labor de lo implementar.
Which files are used for alignment depends on if the file filter supports it.
Qual files es usate pro alineamento depende si le filtro de file supporta lo.
Which version do you want to keep?
Que version desira tu tener?

While the translation is progressing, additional files (<e2><f3>project_name</f3></e2><f4>-omegat.tmx, project_name-level1.tmx and project_name-level2.tmx</f4>) are created (and updated during the process of translation) in this folder.

durante que le traduction progrede son create (e renovate in le processo de traduction) in iste plica, additional files (<e2><f3>project_name</f3></e2><f4>-omegat.tmx, project_name-level1.tmx and project_name-level2.tmx</f4>).
Whilst Priorview is running, you can:
Durante que Priorview es functionante, tu pote:
Whitespace
Spatio blanc
Whitespace (i.e., spaces and newlines) will be preserved, even if this option is not defined in the document.
Le spatio in blanco (i.e., spatios e nove lineas) essera preservate, mesmo si iste option non es definite in le documento.
Whitespace - leading
Spatio blanc - initial
Whitespace - trailing
Spatio blanc - final
Whitespace outside the tags is considered non significant in HTML/XHTML.
Le spatios blanc foras del tags non es considerate significante in HTML/XHTML.
Whitespaces
Spatios blanc

Wildcards: Both exact and keyword searches support the wildcard characters * and ?.
Characteres generic: ambe le recercas per concordantia exacte e per parola clave supporta le characteres generic * e ?.
Will Helton: his final reading of the draft has spared me a lot of embarrassment.
Will Helton: su lectura final del minuta me ha sparniate un lot de embarasso.
Will be synchronized next time.
Essera synchronisate le proxime vice.
Will display a list of segments with tag errors and possible inconsistencies.
Monstrara un lista de segmentos con errores de tag e possibile contradictiones.

Le usatores de Windows qui non usa jam Firefox pote <a1>lo discargar lo ex www.mozilla.org</a1>; le major parte del usatores de Linux lo habera jam installate, o lo pote installar ex lor repositorios de distribution.

Usatores de Windows:

Version con JRE 64-bit
With <e3>TransTips/Exact Match </e3> checked, only complete words will be checked, otherwise parts of words will be matched as well.
Con <e3>TransTips/Concordantia Exacte </e3> marcate, sol parolas complete essera verificate, alteremente essera anque concordate partes del parolas.
With JRE
Version con JRE
With links to more detailed HOWTOs.
Con ligamines al GUIDAS plus detaliate.

With that option, no locking occurs.
With that option, no locking occurs.
With the "aggregate tags" function enabled, this is not possible.
Con le function "aggrega le tags" habilitate, isto non es possibile.
With the advent of Microsoft Office 2007, Microsoft Word, Excel and Powerpoint have new default file formats.
Con le advenimento de Microsoft Office 2007, Microsoft Word, Excel e Powerpoint ha nove formatos de file.
With the appearance of OmegaT Version 2.1.8, the handling of this file format in OmegaT also became much more user-friendly.
Con le apparentia de OmegaT Version 2.1.8, le tractamento de iste formato de file in OmegaT deveni mesmo multo plus facile.
With this command you can move backward one segment at a time, to return later to the current segment using <g0>Forward in history... </g0>command below.
Con iste commando tu pote regreder un segmento a un vece, pro retornar al segmento currente per le commando sequente <g0>Avantia in chronologia...</g0>
With this command you can move backward one segment at a time, to return later to the current segment using <g0>Forward in history...</g0>command below.
Con iste commando tu pote regreder un segmento a un vice, pro retornar al segmento currente per le commando sequente: <g0>Avantiar in chronologia...</g0>
With this command you can step forward to the segment, you have previously left by the <g0>Back in history</g0>... command.
Con iste commando tu pote facer un passo avante al segmento que tu ha previemente lassate per le commando <g0>Retroceder in chronologia...</g0>
With this command you can step forward to the segment, you have previously left by the <g1>Back in history</g1>... command.
Con iste commando tu pote facer un passo avante al segmento que tu ha previemente lassate per le commando <g1>Retroceder in chronologia</g1>...
With this command you can step forward to the segment, you have previously left by the <g1>Back in history</g1>...command.
Con iste commando tu pote facer un passo avante al segmento, que tu ha previemente lassate per le commando <g1>Retrocede in chronologia</g1>...
With this method, you may also download the "Windows without JRE" version, since the new installation will use your existing JRE.
Con iste methodo, tu pote discargar le version "Windows without JRE", perque le installation nove usara tu JRE existente.
With this version, future updates will be installed automatically.
Con iste version, le futur nove versiones essera installate automaticamente.
With/without JRE
Con/sin JRE
Within a given language pair it is best to keep different subjects and/or clients as separate repositories as well.
Intra un par de lingua date il es optime servar subjectos vel clientes differente como repositorios separate.
Within a segment, the first group (pair or single) receives the number 0, the second the number 1 etc.
Intra un segmento, le prime gruppo (par o singule) recipe le numero 0, le secunde le numero 1 etc.
Within that reference glossaries folder, you can create multiple terminology subfolders organized by topic, client, or any other category that suits your workflow.
In ille plica de glossarios de referentia, tu pote crear plure subplicas de terminologia organisate per thema, cliente o qualcunque altere categoria que adapta al tue fluxo de labor.
Without JRE

Without preparation in this way, the original file format may be accessible to the translator.

*** Tu pote ordinar le filtros per nomine o per si illos es activate/habilitate.

Tu pote alora cliccar sur le traduction ideal pro inserer lo in le segmento final al position actual.

Tu pote alora cambiar a retro al Fenestra de Recerca pro trovar le segmento successive, per exemplo pro controlar e, si necesse, corriger le terminologia.

Tu ha complete libertate re como traducer.

tu.prop: doc_src/Dialogs_Preferences.xml
Only integers and simple floats (using the period as a decimal character, e.g. 5.4, but not 5,4 or 54E-01) are considered.
Documents for translation may contain trade marks, names or other proper nouns that will be the same in translated documents.

tuv.seg: Allow translation to be equal to source
Permitter le traduction equal al fonte

tu.prop: doc_src/Dialogs_Preferences.xml
Dictionary
Clear this option to deactivate automatic searching if dictionaries are too long, for example.

tuv.seg: Automatically search segment text in dictionary
Cerca automaticamente in le dictionario le texto del segmento

tu.prop: doc_src/Dialogs_Preferences.xml
Glossary
Uncheck this option if the context description shown for each glossary entry is unnecessary or too long.

tuv.seg: Display context description for TBX glossaries
Monstrar le description contextual pro le glossarios TBX

tu.prop: doc_src/Dialogs_Preferences.xml
Contains options for displaying texts and modification information in different ways.
Check this option to display all non-unique segments (repetitions) in grey.

tuv.seg: Include the first non-unique segment when marking non-unique segments
Includer le prime segmento non-unic quando es marcate Segmentos non-unic

tu.prop: doc_src/Dialogs_Preferences.xml
Select this option if you want the glossary to display words that have the same root.

If both this option and the <l0><g1>Insert the source text</g1></l0> option are selected, all words with a corresponding glossary entry will be translated automatically when the source text is inserted.

tuv.seg: Replace glossary hits when inserting source text
Replaciar le exitos del glossarios quando on insere le texto fonte

tu.prop: doc_src/Dialogs_Preferences.xml
You can then create an access key on the page <u0>https://term.tilde.com/account/keys/create?system=omegaT</u0>.
If this option is selected, OmegaT will not remember the access key between sessions.

tuv.seg: Store for this session only
Salvar pro iste session solmente

tu.prop: doc_src/Dialogs_Preferences.xml
You must then press <k6> <k7>Ctrl</k7> <k8>M</k8> </k6> again to insert the suggestion.
Check this box to send only untranslated segments to the machine translation services.

tuv.seg: Untranslated segments only
Solmente segmentos non rendite

tu.prop: doc_src/Dialogs_Preferences.xml
Clear this option to deactivate automatic searching if dictionaries are too long, for example.
Select this option if you want dictionaries to display words that have the same root.

tuv.seg: Use fuzzy matching for dictionary entries
Usar le concordantia partial pro le entratas del dictionario

tu.prop: doc_src/Dialogs_Preferences.xml
Uncheck this option if the glossary displays too many false positives.
Select this option if you want the glossary to display words that have the same root.

tuv.seg: Use stemming for glossary entries
Usar le radices pro le entratas de glossario
